name: Beautiful Area Single Room
summary: FREE PICK UP TAXI CAR WITH 6 OR MORE DAYS BOOKING!!Best Place of the city in the residencial area of les Corts, just 15 minutes to the city center by metro.  Near University, ESADE, Nou Camp, many shopping near by.

host.about: Spanish guy living in Barcelona, working in the retail field. I like sport and I'm very healthy person, when I have free time I like to go to the swimmpool. Happy to give to my guess information about Barcelona city and the best things to do.

reviews.txt: El piso es ideal y muy bien situado en una zona tranquila y llena de facilicidades.El trato con Marcos fantastico, muy servicial y atento en todo momento .Merci Marcos.

I had a busy 5-day stay in Barcelona and Marcos provided me with a great place to stay. The location is good, not touristic but where local people live, very safe and clean neighborhood. It was easy to get from the airport to the apartment by train and metro, costing just one trip. Metro station was quite close. The apartment was nice, Marcos was very helpful and flexible and let me use his wifi. The room is small but cosy, just enough for one guest, so it's great value for the price!

I stayed Marcos' flat for 15 days and it was great. The flat is clean and comfortable. The neighbourhood is quiet and safe. Easy to access tram and metro. You can find supermarkets, shops, bars, restaurants nearly. Marcos is very friendly. He is always ready to inform about Barcelona and help about any issue.

I really enjoyed my holiday while I was staying at Marcos's place. He's so sweet guy who's willing to help you whenever you need. The room is clean as well as the entire flat. This tidy flat shows how great this guy is!

Marcos is a very polite, friendly and respectful host.  He welcomed me with a map and useful directions, patiently answered all my questions, and in general was very accommodating whenever I needed something. His apartment is small but cozy, and the area is indeed quite charming and very well-connected. The metro is a few minutes away, and all "tourist attractions" are accessible within 15 minutes to maximum half an hour. The night bus stop is also nearby. I really enjoyed my stay in Barcelona, and would definitely like to stay in Marcos' apartment when I visit again. I recommend all travelers to do so!

Nice city, nice flat, very nice Marcos! :)
So its perfect place for really great holidays.
Although we didn't spend much time together, everything was ok and the apartnent is pretty nice located!!! Thanks
Marcos is a friendly host and it's really a nice stay at his place. The room is clean and quite. It's in a very safe neighborhood and very close to the metro stantion. Highly recommend it!

Marcos was a great host! very helpful and went out of his way to provide me with anything I needed to know

sincerely recommend this listing, if you're staying in this amazing city.

The neighbourhood is relatively safe and is about a 10 minute subway ride to the city centre

La estancia en casa de Marcos fué genial. La casa esta situada en un barrio muy tranquilo de Barcelona, y tienes el metro  muy cerca para ir a cualquier sitio de la ciudad. La habitación, aunque es pequeña, es cómoda, y no tiene ruidos, con lo que se duerme muy bién.
Y con Marcos, coincidí sólo un día, pero es una persona atenta, amable, y que seguoro que hará vuestra estancia en Barcelona sea muy agradable. Os lo recomiendo!!

Muchas gracias, Marcos


My stay at Marco´s house was great. The flat is located in a very quiet neighbourhood in Barcelona, and metro station is very close, so you can go easily to any part of the city. The room is small, but comfy and peacefull, and will help you to get a good sleep.
Marcos its a very nice, helpfull and very kind, im sure he will help you with any doubt you had in Barcelona, and will make your stay easier.

Highly recommend, thanks, Marcos!

From the moment you arrive, Marcos does an excellent job getting you situated to get the most out of Barcelona. He had great suggestions of what to try out, and was always on hand if you had any questions regarding navigating the city.
Where he's located is convenient to shops, a market, public transport and very close to a lovely plaza with surrounding neighborhood with friendly locals.
And I couldn't have been happier with the room and hospitality! Marcos will make you feel at ease immediately and that definitely has a wonderful affect on your time in Barcelona!
I had stayed for a weekend in BCN. Also, I was pretty familiar with the City, Marcos was really helpful in specific details. In general he is very flexible, very polite and awesome person!

Marcos was a great host during my short stay in Barcelona. My previously booked accommodation fell through and I found myself needing a room at 8pm! Marcos was prompt and helpful, and I made a good decision to book with him. he was even accommodating when I turned up a little later than planned.

The room itself is basic - it has everything necessary but not much more - So it's suited to a budget conscious traveler. The area is quite nice, and well located. I can highly recommend this room and this host.
I stayed with marcos for 4 days. Marcos is an exeptionally friendly, welcoming person and very helpful if you need some informations about the city. I can warmly recommend to stay with him!
Marcos è il top...sempre disponibile x qualsiasi cosa!!posizione ottima x visitare (Website hidden by Airbnb) consiglierei a tutti!!!quando tornerò a Barcellona,saprò dove andare

Все очень понравилось. Удобное расположение: рядом метро  (ветка проходит через самый центр, легко добраться до всех достопримечательностей), рядом несколько торговых центров, кафе, супермаркет. В общем всё, что нужно. Комната небольшая, но уютная и чистая. Рядом санузел (чистый), что тоже удобно. Отсутствие кухни - не проблема. Белье меняется, 2 полотенца, каждый день в холодильнике вода. Всем рекомендую. Мне понравилось! И Еще, очень приятный хозяин, отзывчивый, всегда поможет!

Schöne kleine Unterkunft in sehr guter Lage. Sehr gut angebunden! Marcos ist ein sehr freundlicher und zuvorkommender Gastgeber. Es war ein toller Aufenthalt und ich würde das Zimmer sofort wieder buchen.

name: Bondi-Tamarama BEACHFRONT Apartment
summary: This gorgeous 3-bedroom apartment is directly across the road from the beach. It's very light, beautifully decorated and all within minutes of Bondi, Bronte, restaurants, shops and buses to the CBD. Watch the waves as you have a drink on the balcony.

host.about:
Hi there,

My name's Wayne. I live in Sydney, Australia with my fiancé, Kate.

I'm a management consultant, an author, a commercial helicopter pilot and I've recently developed a real love of travel with time in LA, Turkey, Greece, London, Vietnam, Thailand, Camboodia, Bali, Hong Kong and France all in the last 12 months.

We've done quite a lot of share living both at home and abroad so we'd like to think we know what makes a good environment in a home.

Hope to meet you soon!

Wayne and Kate

reviews.txt:
The apartment exceeded expectations.  
First, the location was incredible.  Literally overlooking the Tamarama beach and a beautifull balcany to sit on and watch the world go by.  
Secondly, the apartment itself was perfect.  It is clean, with great entertaining spaces and very welcoming.  You don't feel like your invading another persons home but it still feels homely - if that makes sense!  The beds, couch and linen were all clean, fresh and comfortable.
Third, it's only a 10 min walk to Bondi!
Finally, Wayne is lovely and immediately responded to all my questions.  We only booked the apartment a few days before, and it was my first time dealing with airbnb, so we really appreciated the quick responses.  Also, we had a bottle of champagne and chocolates on arrival which was a lovely surprise!
I would highly recommend this apartment.  It is the perfect place for people who want to hang out, relax and and enjoy one of Sydney's premier beach locations.  
I will definitely go back if I need a place in Sydney.

We had a great stay at Wayne and Kate's place. We travelled to Sydney for a family long weekend and from the moment we opened the door we felt at home. Their home is open and airy with a fantastic view of the beach. The location is perfect, we went on walks along the "ocean walk" to Bondi and the opposite direction to Coogee and Bronte. It was great sitting on the balcony looking out at the beach and the many energetic people pounding the pavements and in the water enjoying the waves. Wayne and Kate were great hosts emailing and messaging us with directions to their home and suggestions of places to visit. Nothing was too much trouble. The champagne and chocolate they left for us was also well received . We can not wait to return. Thankyou Wayne and Kate for sharing your beautiful home with us.

Wayne and Kate were wonderful to deal with, quick responses in the lead-up to our stay and comprehensive instructions on how to get the key when we arrived. As soon as we walked in we knew we were in for a lovely stay. The view is magnificent and the apartment is spacious and airy, and well-represented in the photos on the website. The kids loved the big TV which meant more time on the deck for us! Great walks and easy parking which is not easy to come by in Sydney. Would thoroughly recommend this place.

Holy moly what an apartment. Actually better than the photos! The vibe is clean, open, breezy, sophisticated. After a picnic lunch at Bronte, We enjoyed dinner together at the table and an evening swim. We were a party of 6, and all of us slept comfortably and felt like a million dollars the entire time. The kitchen was awesome to cook in and the balcony a peaceful breakfast spot. It could not have been more perfect.

Everything went smoothly and Wayne and Kate were very easy to deal with. The apartment is stunning, wonderful views of the beach, and although I only spent the afternoon there, my Mum and her friends who stayed over found everything they needed and were raving about the location. I'll be back! :)

We had an absolutely wonderful time staying at Wayne and Kate's place.. you cannot beat waking up to the sounds of the ocean! We had friends travelling from overseas for our wedding, and we could not have asked for a better place to stay; 2-10 mins walk to any of Sydney's great beaches, and all the anemities that you need in an apartment to make the place as comfortable as possible. Wayne and Kate were fantastic in getting back to us on any inquiries and were very thoughtful and approachable. The perfect hosts! now we need another excuse to rent out the place again ;) Thanks for everything!

We had a great time staying at Wayne and Kate's place. It is an absolutely beautiful apartment in an amazing spot. It was great to fall asleep listening to the sea.
Me and 5 girlfriends stayed for a weekend and we were all blown away. The apartment had everything we needed, we just added a few bottles of champers to sip on the balcony and soak up the Tamarama atmosphere. 
Thanks Wayne and Kate :)

From the first contact with Wayne and Kate my first experience using AirBNB has been fabulous! Their regular and thoughtful communication was perfect and we were so excited to stay at their beautiful apartment overlooking Tamarama Beach. We arrived to find cold bubbles in the fridge, a block of chocolate and a 'house and area manual' to assist use with everything we needed to know during our stay. The apartment was perfect! Great size for a larger group and it was so nice to have the home comforts right at our fingertips. I cannot recommend this experience enough and look forward to staying at Wayne and Kate's apartment again in the near future!

We had a wonderful stay at Wayne and Kate's Tamarama apartment. Excellent communication and experience from the very start. Checking in was simple and we arrived to a lovely bottle of bubbles! The view and location are absolutely unbeatable, and the apartment is terrific. The photos do not do justice - it's an amazing apartment! Great lighting, very comfortable, and well furnished. The flat has all the amenities you need and truly makes you feel at home.  

We had a very small issue with the internet dropping out periodically but Kate went above and beyond to ensure things were fixed.  And… left us another bottle of bubbles for our troubles, which was so incredibly nice!

The apartment was a short walk to Bondi, Bronte and Coogee beaches.  The walk from Tamarama to Bondi is breathtaking.  We were lucky enough to catch the Sculptures by the Sea the week of our stay.

Our experience was outstanding and highly recommend Wayne and Kate’s place. We did not want to leave! We look forward to staying at Wayne and Kate’s in the future. Thanks again for everything, Wayne and Kate!  :)

Fantastic spot although the weather was not on our side!

I arrived late on the weekend, so Wayne and Kate were super accommodating with my friend John. Place is very secure, has an amazing outlook over the beach. Café’s and restaurants are a short walk away, and transport easily accessible. 

Great experience and would love to stay there again!
Thanks Wayne and Kate we had a lovely time at your apartment. Was clean, beds comfy and great view of the beach!!

What an absolutely fantastic apartment and view! The hosts were fantastic to deal with and gave quick and very helpful replies! The apartment had everything we could need for a girly weekend away. Thanks so much, we all had a ball =)
Wayne and Kate's apartment is in a fabulous location right on the beach of Tamarama. It is clean, well maintained and suited our needs with 2 teenage boys. Thumbs up!

We had a great time, the apartment was lovely, clean, the views were spectacular and all expectations from the posting were met! They even left us bubbly!
The owners were very kind and even left us tips for the area.
I recommend this apartment and experience highly.

-Boyana

Absolutely perfect place to stay in Sydney! The beach is quite literally, across the road! The views are to die for day and night. Short and beautiful walk to Bondi or Bronte for restaurants, bars and bigger beaches if you want them. The apartment is clean and very comfortable,  it has everything and more you could want. And the hosts are extremely kind and accommodating. We had a ball staying here!

Wayne and Kate’s beachfront apartment is simply amazing. From the moment we made an inquiry about the place, Wayne and Kate went above and beyond when responding to our questions and requests regarding the place – even replying within minutes when we sent a message at midnight!

Stepping foot into the place, you might have to take a second to realise that you’re not actually in a designer home magazine. All of the amenities are in great condition and all three of the bedrooms were large with the beds comfortable and extremely clean.

After settling in and making a cup of tea and coffee with the stocked kitchen, we decided to take a look at the lengthy list of activities that Wayne and Kate had compiled just for us. You can never undervalue local knowledge!

While Wayne and Kate’s place is extremely fun, it’s also the perfect place to get some work done. We popped down to Tamarama Beach Café (across the road!) and bought back some coffee and sat and worked at the breakfast bar overlooking Tamarama Beach with our laptops – using the speedy wifi that was provided, of course.

Simply, Wayne and Kate are amazing hosts and their stunning apartment is perfect for work, play and everything in between!

We loved staying at Wayne and Kate's beautiful apartment right on the beach. The apartment is beautifully furnished and we felt right at home. Wayne and Kate were fantastic hosts and were in regular contact to make us feel welcome. We can't stress enough how good the location is, being able to walk across the road for a swim at a moments notice is amazing. Highly recommended!
Beautiful location, nice hosts, close to Bondi and Bronte for cafés and restaurants. We had a great time! Thanks Kate and Wayne.
Wonderful apartment and extremely responsive hosts. Wish I were back on the beach!

Fantastic apartment, fantastic location, fantastic hosts! Everything was thought of for us and we had a wonderful stay. The best equipped apartment we have ever stayed in...enough of everything, and more!
 thanks guys!  xx

name: Cozy Room w/ Office | The Plateau Mont-Royal
summary: The Plateau Mont-Royal: At once, Quiet, Cozy, and Lively.  - Beautiful Parcs. - Great Places to Eat & Drink. - In proximity to Downtown, the Mile-End, and the Old Port. See the 'Interactive Map' for nearby Eateries. Ask me directly for additional information!

host.about:
Easy-going, average cook, and continuing education (Urban Planning).
Interests include: Cities, Landscapes, Gardening, Music, and other things.

Just looking to provide you with a cozy retreat.

reviews.txt: Shane welcomed us in with open arms, he was very friendly and helpful. Stayed up to chat with us, suggested some places for us, and worked very hard to be sure we were having a good stay. First thing he did when we walked in the door was offer us food. Cozy, affordable, and pretty close to a lot of cool stuff.

Le gars est brillant! Et l'appart tout autant;  on s'y sent, immmmédiatement comme chez soi. "Hautement recommandé", si on veut non seulement dormir quelque part, mais rencontrer quelqu'un.

The guy is brilliant, and the house too. Feel immediatly at home. Highly recommended. Opportunity to sleep somewhere and to meet a human being. Thank you Shane!

Shane was a GREAT host.  When my father and I arrived, there was a lack of bed space for the two of us and Shane voluntarily gave up his bed so that we could be comfortable.  He went above and beyond to make sure we had a great stay.  I felt safe and secure and was able to live according to my odd schedule and hours without any problems !

Nice, Nice, Nice. European and artistic but well organized and covenient house. Perfect location. A block away from great street filled with international restraunts and grocery stores. While you arw enjoying the scene, you will get to the Metro or Bixie bikes. I did write this because of Shane. He is a kind and good guy. He will give you a full support while you are staying his place. So have a nice time!!

Shane was a a great host. He is very accommodating, communicative and fluent in both French and English. I never felt I was intruding in his space and I felt at ease sharing his kitchen and bathroom. His place is situated in a quiet neighborhood that is safe, charming and short commute to downtown. It is a short walk from his place to restaurants, bars and shopping (produce and clothing). I highly recommend this listing.
Shane was very helpful and amenable with check in time. The apartment is very clean, spacious and centrally located to food and drink. We loved our time in Montreal and Shane was very helpful!

Shane was an AWESOME host! I couldn't have asked for anything better; the place was cozy, close enough to everything I needed (I did have a Bixi membership for the month though which was also great), and I felt perfectly comfortable and safe. I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone :)
Un grand merci à Shane pour sa disponibilité et sa fiabilité ! Logement très bien situé et agréable.

name: Cozy Art Top Floor Apt in PRIME Williamsburg!
summary: My Apt it's right in the middle of the best and hot spots in the heart of REAL Williamsburg on Bedford Ave. Close to everything. 4 Subway stations (L/G/JMZ) around, same distance all! Very chill and cozy! 2 people only. No kids and pets please.

host.about: I'm a Photographer and I love music, travel and good food! I speak Spanish, Italian and English!

reviews.txt:
Adela's apartment is fantastic – perfectly located in the heart of Williamsburg, very clean, nicely furnished and convenient.
Definitely one of the best New York apartments I stayed in recently.
Adela was very helpful and easy to communicate with.
Highly recommended!

Ade has an AWESOME apt in Williamsburg -- location is nuts, a reasonable price considering the location, and a great vibe.  Close to about everything in Williamsburg.

Wouldve stayed longer if i couldve.

Very nice Apt. in the hearth of Williamsburg and Bedford, wich is like the coolest place in Brooklyn, but in a very quiet and safety street. The apt, is in a 4th floor (no elevator) very clean and luminous.

You have two subway stations at 10'walk, and is really cool also if you want to bike the city.

Ade is really nice, will let everything ready for you and give some suggestions, se can speak Spanish too and in general all was as I expected, I would def. Recommend this place.
The apartment is nice (a bit small). Great location in Williamsburg. Nice bars and restaurants near by. 3 minutes from the subway
Ade was a perfect hote. She was there for everything. Her appartement is nice, clean and the location is perfect. Thank you Ade.

Adela's apartment is perfect, just as it looks in the photos, and was immaculately clean. The bed is comfy, the heating is warm ( we stayed in mid November)  and the location is really good, close to all the bars restaurants and shops of the local area but the street is quiet so you will sleep well!  It is only a short walk to the L train subway, and there's also 2 other subway lines a little further walk away so it's easy to travel around the whole of NYC from here. We loved staying here! Adela is easy and quick to communicate with and very kind, she gave us a fantastic list of recommendations for food and other things in the local area. Thank you Adela!

Ade fue una muy buena anfitriona y super agradable. El departamento mejor de lo que esperaba, mucho mas amplio de lo que mostraban las fotografías y mucho mas acogedor. El departamento mostraba el espiritu  de su anfitriona, mezcla de fotografía y música.
Ade was super nice and a very good host. The department was better than I 
expected, much wider than the pictures showed and more cozy. The department 
shows Ade's spirit, a mix of photography and music.

Ade is an excellent hostess. It was great to meet her upon checking in, and to get her awesome list of local recommendations which we immediately put to use from the fist night. The apartment is in a great location, close to the L train which is a 10min ride into the city. Not that you need to leave Williamsburg, we had some of the best food and drinks there during our NY visit! Ade's place is clean, with an eclectic decor, it's comfortable and surprisingly quiet. Communication with Ade was easy, and everything went very smoothly over our week-long stay. Thanks again for having us, Ade :)

Clean, quiet and perfectly located. From the list of local places of interest, to the willingness of Ade to assist us with any problems during our stay, we felt very well taken care of. I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone wishing to stay in Williamsburg!
Ade's apartment is one of my favorites in Williamsburg, cozy, clean, bright and perfectly located steps away from all nice restaurants, bars and subway stop. Highly recommended!
The reservation was canceled 38 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lovely little apartment in the heart of Williamsburg.
Ade is super nice and really accommodating.
Book it!

Super logement en plein dans williamsburg. Ade est très sympatique et nous a accueilli chaleureusement. Elle nous a aussi donné plein de bonnes adresses de resto et de sorties dans le quartier. L'appartement est bien situé à quelques minutes du métro Bedfort avenue, à un arrêt de métro de Manhattan. Il est pratique, mignon et calme. Le lit est hyper confortable. Il y a même la TV avec Netflix pour regarder des films ou séries. Vraiment parfait, nous recommandons ce lieu. L’appartement de Ade est un super bon plan pour qui veut passer une semaine à  New York au calme. Merci Ade!

Adela's place was awesome.  The location could not be beat - close to everything in Williamsburg including the waterfront and both the JMZ and L Trains for easy access to Manhattan.  Her unit is decent sized and quiet.  The bed was very comfortable and the furniture and decorations nice.  It was also very clean.  While I never met her, check in and communication were a breeze.  We would not hesitate to stay at her place again.

Ade's apt was really well-decorated, clean & cosy. Besides, it's so well-located in the heart of Williamsburg surrounded with a lot of restaurants and bars and close to Manhattan(1 stop - Metro L Bedford 5-minute walking). If you want to discover Brooklyn, it's the perfect place. Ade will give you the name of all the places she likes around her flat. We had the chance to meet Ade our last day and she'is as her flat : really nice and charming :) She let us leave our luggages very late as our plane was at midnight whereas she has already came back from her trip and was jetlag! Thanks a lot Ade for everything! Do not hesitate to rent her flat

We had a great time staying at Ade's apartment.  The place was very comfortable, exactly like on the photos.  It was a hot week in New York but the air con worked fine.  The bed was comfortable and the decor made you feel instantly at home.  Wifi was excellent and a decent sized TV with Netflix which we didn't use once because there were more exciting things to do.

As mentioned, the apartment block is very quiet ... amazing given how close it is to the main road of restaurants, shops and bars of Bedford Avenue.  

We walked around day and night in perfectly safe environment.  We took Ade up on some recommended places to eat and they were all great local places, well researched.

It was easy walking distance to all points of interest in Williamsburg, from the vintage market to the regular street food festival and East River Ferry, providing access to other parts of Brooklyn, downtown NYC and Governor's Island.  

The short walk to different subways meant getting into the city was very fast, particularly areas such as East Village and Park Slope.  We regularly went from the heart of the city back to the apartment within 20-30 minutes, a good escape when the crowds got too much in  Manhattan.

Ade welcomed in and helped us up with the bags on day 1.  There is no lift but compared to subways, a few flights of stairs was not a problem.  Again, on departure day she was very accommodating letting us leave the bags and helping us with getting them down again.

Ade's place was terrific.  Its location is lovely in Williamsburg and brilliant for getting in to Manhattan. The apartment is clean and comfortable. Ade is a friendly and helpful host. The top floor location really does make it quiet.  This is a great place to stay, whether you want to spend time in Williamsburg or Manhattan.
Ade's apartment was great. We're booking a lot through airbnb and her apartment was definitely a winner. Our collaborator loved to stay there and we'll definitely book it again!
The place was really great!! Best location ever and very friendly host. Thanks again

Location location location: Ade's apartment is perfectly situated in the best part of Williamsburg, making it so easy to hit the bars, the waterfront, and the metro.  With a location this great, you can walk two blocks in any direction and find fantastic food and entertainment.  Super hip Greenpoint is a lovely stroll away, and the East Village is just one stop away on the subway.  Ade's place was the ideal home base for exploring Brooklyn and Manhattan.  Ade herself was very cool, friendly, and helpful throughout the trip.

name: Au cœur de la Petite Patrie
summary: Logement de 3chambres pouvant accueillir jusqu'à 6 personnes. Cuisine rénovée et complètement équipée. Wi-fi et cable. Près du cinéma beaubien et du parc Molson, au cœur d'un quartier vivant de Montreal et près d'un métro. Il me fera plaisir de vous suggérer des endroits à découvrir dans le quartier.

host.about: Je suis entrepreneure et mère de deux enfants. J'adore voyager et découvrir le monde et toutes ses saveurs. Je suis mariée depuis 9 ans avec un cubain, nous parlons espagnol et français. Nous voyageons le plus souvent possible et nous aimons vivre auprès des gens du pays visité plutôt que dans des hôtels. Nous sommes toujours respectueux de notre environnement. Au plaisir!

reviews.txt: What you see is what you get.  The place was very clean and no problem with parking.  It's fully furnished especially the kitchen. The neighbourhood is peaceful.  Zoe was very prompt in answering my questions and very accommodating.  Check in and out was a breeze with no hassles. I have marked this place as one of my fav and would rent it again.

Really nice place to stay, very modern and clean. We stayed with 4 adults and it was perfect. It is a bit further out of town, yet metro is nearby (10 min walk) and the area has a few nice restaurants and cafes. Highly recommended.

Great apartment in a very good location.  Zoé home is well equipped with lots of amenities and very comfortable. It is close to good restaurants and cafés, grocery stores and convenience stores. Parking was easy and the metro is a 10-15 minute walk.  Zoé is a great host and very quick to respond to any questions.  Check-in and check-out is very convenient. A great place to stay in Montreal.

Zoe was very nice and very responsive to any questions I had. The place was very modern, comfortable, and clean. I am a big clean freak so this place made me very comfortable in the cleanliness aspect. The only thing that was just a little frustrating at times was the lack of AC. Some rooms (at the front) were very hot if the doors were closed come morning time. However, seeing as most of us were out (not home) doing activities during the hot days, the nights were cool enough to open the windows, and Zoe provided a few fans, so it was manageable. Other than that, I highly recommend this place. Clean, comfortable, modernized, close to bus stops and subways, bike rental access across the street, not too far from downtown, and lots of restaurants and cafes in the area.
Simplement parfait! Propreté ,emplacement et communication étaient au rendez-vous!
Bel appart dans un beau quartier­. Et on est bien accueilli.
Zoé a été très réactive et accueillante. Très bel appartement et bien situé. Expérience à renouveler ! Je recommande.
Lovely place with a large living/dining/kitchen area. Easy on street parking a bonus.
Fantastic host, great apartment.

Logements très bien situé dans un quartier agréable.  Le métro est cependant un peu loin.
Hôte sympathique et discrète.

Zoe was very nice and was pretty quick with fixing the unfortunate leak that was caused from the neighbors upstairs. But be aware there is NO WORKING A/C, there are only a few fans. My friend was bitten by bed bugs in the smallest room. Also expect to not have any cups available. Don't even bother with finding parking. The location was not bad.
Je vous le recommande!!! Très confortable et super bien placé!!!
Appartement très bien, comme à la maison, on s'y sent bien. Zoé est tres accueillante et à l'écoute. Appartement bien situé. (Bus, metro, dépanneurs...)

name: Charming Spacious Park Slope Studio
summary: Spacious and inviting garden level studio apartment in townhouse with separate entrance and large kitchen located in Park Slope, very near the F and G subway and Prospect Park, and only a few steps away from 7th Avenue, with its many fine shops and restaurants.

host.location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.txt:
Ildiko and her space were nothing short of great.

I had rented out the space under unusual circumstances, likely out of the ordinary compared to most Airbnb reservations. Ildiko was super accommodating and understanding throughout our time in her space.

Ildiko met me at the apartment and personally showed me around the space. The apartment is quite a bit larger than the photos made it seem, and I was very comfortable here. It's also on the first floor, which is nice if you have heavy suitcases (it gets difficult lugging stuff up three flights of stairs). Even though it's on street level, the street is a quiet / residential one, and the entrance is some distance from the sidewalk—so noise is not an issue. There are very nice restaurants and cafes less than a block or two away. Ildiko went the extra mile in stocking the apartment with essential items, including a fully stocked first-aid kit(!). Although I had office space in Manhattan, I spent all of my time working from home, because I didn't want to leave the house or this neighborhood. Prospect Park is also very close, which makes for a nice place to go for a walk and clear the mind. Definitely one of the nicest and most pleasant airbnb experiences I've had so far!

This was a spacious, clean apartment in a great neighborhood. The area is quiet, but with many small shops, restaurants and cafes. The owner was friendly and available if needed, and checking in and out was a breeze. I highly recommend staying here.

A fantastic place and the perfect base for time in New York.  Downtown Manhattan is but 25 minutes by the F train (a four minute walk from the apartment) and Ilkido could not have been more helpful.  A really lovely space and I'd highly recommend it - next time I'm here, I'll be checking this place out first!

Apartment is excellent! Good space and very clean. Bathroom is very quite comfortable. The location is very good if you want to wonder around Park slope and other areas of Brooklyn. 

Ildiko was always attentive and helpful.

My wife and I enjoyed staying at lldiko's apartment. It was quite comfortable for us although we did not spend a lot of time there. It was very convenient to come and go and we appreciated the privacy and independence. Ron Walker

Ildiko est très accueillante ! Le quartier super , l appartement très confortable avec les commodités a porté de mains  ( restorants , métros ) 
Une adresse a ne pas manquer  !

My mum had wonderful time at this lovely suited apartment in Park Slope. It was her first airbnb-booking and she loved it. The spacious rooms were clean and tidy. The kitchen and dining area are huge and the whole apartment can easily be used by more than one people. Ildiko was very helpful with every step of our journey and easy to talk to. We highly recommend a stay at this apartment.

Great place to stay in Brooklyn! Very spacious, looked bigger than pictured, very clean and had everything I needed. It also had an outside patio, which I thought was great. It is located in the nice Park Slope area, which is very quiet, safe and has a lot of nice restaurants nearby.  Ildiko  personally welcomed me and showed me everything, she was constantly checking to see if I was comfortable. Such a great lady! Overall perfect experience, wonderful host! Definitely will be staying there next time I am in NY.
the apt was very nice decorated and spacious. very clean. bed was comfortable. neighborhood is great. the host is very nice. I def recommend this apt to enjoy brooklyn!
Terrific stay. The apartment was very clean and uncluttered, owners were extremely responsive and helpful.  Will definitely stay again.

Our stay at Ildiko and Chris's comfortable, convenient, and accommodating Park Slope apartment was great. The neighborhood was quiet and family oriented. Excellent markets and eateries were right around the corner. The subway was just a few blocks away. Ildiko and Chris's apartment was clean, comfortably furnished, and well equipped for a short or extended stay. We hope to return when we're next in New York City.

This studio worked out well for us. It was clean, spacious, and the central air conditioning was a nice perk. We didn't meet Ildiko, but she and her husband were accommodating and provided a comfortable place to stay after busy days enjoying the city.
Ildiko welcomed us, told us about the neighborhood and some of her favorite spots. The neighborhood was fantastic-walking distance to charming shops, grocery stores, the subway, and many restaurants.

Lovely studio, spacious, clean and with a great location (metro stop on the express line) and the hosts are really nice and helpful.
Highly recommanded.

Ildiko's appartment was absolutely perfect. It is big, bright, fully furnished, ideally located and completely spotless. Idilko was very easy to communicate with and we were pretty sad to leave even after 13 days spent there! Overall we had a wonderful experience and would definitely love to stay in this place again! Thank you for having us!

Our stay at this spacious studio was outstanding. There was plenty of room and the location was terrific. It is near subway lines and plenty of food choices. Not to mention, Prospect Park is extremely close. The process of getting in contact with the owners was simple and they were helpful and hospitable. I would definitely come back to this place. Thanks for making our stay in Brooklyn a ton of fun.

I really enjoyed my stay here! The apartment itself is very clean, well-decorated and spacious. Just a stone's throw from a grocery store and minutes from the subway, you really can't beat the location. Ildiko was really accommodating and worked with my schedule. Highly recommend it!

Very beautiful quiet neighborhood, close to great restaurants.  The apartment is very spacious, and quiet/ and nice to look out into the back garden.  The hosts were very accommodating and responsive; and at the same time allowing me my privacy.

We had a great stay at Ildiko and Chris's place.  The accommodation is spacious and clean, the water pressure in the shower is good and strong, and the outdoor space is a big plus.  Even though the apartment faces the street, it is very quiet, and the neighborhood is great.  Plenty of shops and restaurants, and just 4 short blocks to the subway.  The only drawback would be the lack of cable and a radio or cd player.  But really, this is NY - there's not much time for tv.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay would definitely stay here again.

name: Artist Garden Duplex Ft. Greene - 2.5 Bedroom
summary: Beautifully renovated Brownstone garden duplex - BEST BLOCK in Ft. Greene (S Portland Ave). High end renovation: full kitchen, private entrance, master bedroom with Queen bed, glass partition, study (extra bed - the "half bedroom"), glass doors to patio/garden. Living room sofa opens to Queen. Cellar: TV room, extra sleep quarters (3 twins or  king), bath w shower . Perfect for 1 - 2 couples or families.  5 minutes to BAM, subways, restaurants, park, farmer's market. Superb base for NY vacation.

host.location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.txt: Beautiful place, would definitely come back!

Great apartment, great location! The flat is newly remodeled and everything is brand new and clean. It is very spacious- perfect for our group of 2 adults, 2 small children. The location is a very safe neighborhood, beautiful block and very near restaurants, parks. Miriam was readily available and her list of restaurants, shops was helpful. The check in/out was seamless. We will definitely stay there again- hopefully for longer.
Our family of 4 enjoyed staying at Miriam's. Very close to subway or trains, it is a nice and calm location if you wants to visit NYC (20 mins from Wall St) and Brooklyn wich is a very nice aera.

Miriam was excellent. It was my first time using airbnb and it was for work colleagues of mine.  I can only go by what my colleagues said and it was  absolutely awesome. They were able to cook dinner and save us money instead of having them eat out everynight. They loved the space and wanted to stay longer.  It was nice and convienent to our marina on pier 5!

I used to live in the neighborhood and can attest Miriam's place is on a top notch street in an amazing location! She did a great job furnishing the apartment and making the place comfortable for a family stay. Miriam was also very accommodating and didn't hesitate to turn up the heat for our unseasonably cold visit. We'd love to stay here again on our next Brooklyn visit!

Miriam ha estat una bona amfitriona. La comunicació sempre ha estat immediata i positiva. Ha estat molt respectuosa amb la nostra intimitat i ens ha obsequiat amb diferents detalls.
L'apartament ocupa la part baixa d'una típica casa "Brownstone". Disposa d'un jardinet al darrer ideal per les èpoques de temperatura suau.
La ubicació és immillorable. Hi ha moltes línies de metro a tocar de l'apartament. En 20-25 minuts s'arriba a Manhattan. Està ubicat a un barri de Brooklyn molt ben situat. L'ambient és molt bo i està ple d'opcions al voltant.
Cal tenir en compte que disposa d'una habitació doble per allotjar a dues persones i que la resta s'hauran d'acomodar en un sofà llit i en uns futons a terra en el soterrani de l'habitatge. En el soterrani, sense finestres, s'ubica la sala de màquines, canonades, un traster i un petit bany.
A la penúltima nit hi va haver una inesperada fuita d'aigua al soterrani que Miriam i la seva família van resoldre molt ràpidament.

Hem estat 12 dies a l'apartament i, en general, ha estat molt positiu.

We had a wonderful stay at Miriam's apartment in Ft. Greene.  She made us feel perfectly welcomed from the beginning and throughout our stay.  The apartment was perfect for our family of 4 as it was clean, comfortable, and spacious. Miriam was also very flexible in allowing us to have a small celebration for my 40th birthday with friends and family at the apartment.  The apartment proved to be perfect for our gathering because of its amazing location (especially with its proximity to the park, playgrounds, and other local businesses) and its spaciousness and comfort.  We would happily stay at Miriam's apartment on future trips to Brooklyn and strongly recommend it to others.  Thank you Miriam!

Míriam is a marvelous host. 
Also her apartment is amazing! We rented there for 10 days. 
Everything is exactly what she described, and more. 
If you want to experience the Brooklyn life style, here you will have it!  Beautiful markets, facilities, subway, neighborhood.

We made this apartment our Christmas Central gathering spot. The kitchen is very well equipped for cooking as well as serving-dishes and glassware enough for our crowd. The little things were appreciated-enough hangers in the coat closet to stow our coats, dishwashing detergent under the sink, so we didn't have to buy that at the market. Really nice linens on the beds, plenty of towels, good lighting. Amazing main bathroom shower-we took pictures of it! 
Great closet space, again with coat hangers. Off of the main bedroom, there is an away space-office type room. My husband used it to meditate, but it'd be great for any kind of quiet space. We didn't use the courtyard, but it would be so nice to utilize in milder weather. 
We didn't see Miriam, but she was very good at communicating by email.
Great host and excellent communication.
Very modern, clean, comfortable. Bathroom drain did not work and Miriam addressed it immediately on a Saturday.

We had a great stay at Miriam's place. It was a great location, lots of fab restaurants close by & easy to get on the subway!
Miriam was a great host answering any questions. We would definitely recommend this apartment & hope to visit again!!!!
Plenty of room for my family. My 17 year old son loved the lower level space.  Great access to transportation and local restaurants.
Great location, family friendly had a wonderful time staying at Miriam's home
Beautiful home and very close to restaurants and night life activities, however there isn't much street parking!
The place was very warm and welcoming.  Miriam was very responsive and a great host.  We would stay there again with no hesitation.

This property exceeded our expectations.  We have spent a lot of time in New York City in the past and I was amazed at how quiet this place was.  It's on a lovely street in a very beautiful and safe area.  We traveled to Manhattan every day and the subways were close and convenient.  The property was so much more spacious than I expected and was perfect for our family of 4 .  There is close access to restaurants and markets.  We were impressed and would definitely stay again.  My only disappointment is that it wasn't the right time of year to enjoy the beautiful courtyard in the back.
très agréable logement très bon accueil de Myriam
Such a great place!  Fantastic location with comfortable beds and enough space for two couples to have their own areas.

The stay at Miriams home was very umcomplecated and friendly. The apartment was very clean and well-appointed. We loved cooking in the commodious kitchen or going to one of the restaurants recommended by Miriam (ecspecially the mexican one not far away from the house) .

name: A Casa Alegre é um apartamento T1.
summary: Para 2 pessoas. Vista de mar a 150 mts. Prédio com 2 elevadores. Tem: - quarto com roupeiro e cama de casal (colchão magnetizado); - cozinha: placa de discos, exaustor, frigorifico, micro-ondas e torradeira; casa de banho completa; - sala e varanda.

host.about:
Sou uma pessoa que gosta de viajar, conhecer museus, visitar exposições e cinema.
Também gosto de passear pelas zonas históricas das cidades e contemplar as suas edificações.

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Manuela was a great host! She and her son even picked us up from the airport. Her son travelled with us in the subway to bring us to the apartment.  This was really welcoming. He showed us the apartment, which was perfectly clean and felt right away as a comfortable home. 
In the fridge Manuala left us milk and her husband picked out an outstanding local port! 
The ocean is less than a two minut walk and there are some great (fish) restaurants around the corner. 
Thank you for everything Manuela, when ever we come back to Portugal we will make sure to visit your lovely apartment!

Bom dia.... adorei o apartamento,o sítio... tudo foi bom.. a simpatia as comodidades tudo otimo... pretendo voltar a repetir. .. Obrigada por estes dias que foram maravilhosos.... atenciosamente. .. 
Até a próxima. ...

Manuela a été très accueillante, très attentionnée. Le logement répondait à toutes nos attentes. Très bien situé avec une belle vue sur la mer, commerces et restaurants à proximité.  Nous le recommandons.

Très bon accueil de Manuela.Elle est venue nous chercher ,avec son mari, à l'aéroport.L'appartement est semblable aux photos et description du site,il est rustique mais très propre.Balcon avec vue sur la mer dommage qu'il ne soit pas ensoleillé.Bouteilles de vin et porto en guise de bienvenue.Manuela a également jouer le rôle de guide pendant une après-midi dans la très jolie ville de Porto, nous la remercions encore pour ces explications éducatives et sa disponibilité.
Um muito obrigado a Sra Manuela pois nos recebeu com muita simpatia, estava tudo dentro das expectativas recomendo vivamente pois a paisagem é magnifica obrigado  mais uma vez.

Hieno huoneisto lähellä merta. Kauppa ja leipomo vastapäätä. Porton metroon pääsi kätevästi vartin kävelyllä.
Ja vieressä meri!

Apartamento bem localizado, funcional e limpo, tudo 5 estrelas. O único aspecto a melhor é a agua quente, que se escasseava rapidamente, mas nada de problemático. Realço a simpatia e disponibilidade da Manuela, que teve a amabilidade de nos deixar fazer o check-out mais tarde que o suposto. Recomendo vivamente!

Appartement propre, tres agréable et bien situé, Manuela est très accueillante.
Sylvie, Oscar
Recomendo vivamente este espaço tudo cinco estrelas.

Àppartement très propre fonctionnel. Bonne situation avec les commerces nécessaires pour le quotidient.
Merci à Manuela qui est super gentille et arrangeante..

Manuela ha sido una anfitriona encantadora, nos recibió en su casa de maravilla. El piso tiene una ubicación ideal para disfrutar de vila do conde, de la playa y de oporto... Una ciudad impresionante, que conocimos gracias a las recomendaciones de manuela! Tanto guille como yo quedamos encantados y esperamos volver algún día! Gracias por todo

name: Copacabana Studio -  5* Reviews, 5 mins to Beach
summary: IMPORTANT: CARNIVAL - MINIMUM BOOKING 4 NIGHTS. Great location/AirCon/Strong Wifi/24 hr Doormen/Breakfast Pack/5* Service Beautifully-designed studio 5 minutes walk to Copacabana beach in tree-lined residential street with personal touches and high quality finishes.   We really understand our guests' needs and will help you have a memorable experience.  You'll receive our detailed written guide to Rio, welcome food, benefit from our local knowledge and feel at home before you even arrive!

host.about: We're a happily married Scottish couple who fell in love with Brazil when we lived in Sao Paulo a few years ago. We love Rio so much we decided to buy a little studio here so we could spend some months a year in Copacabana, working from here and enjoying the city.  We sometimes rent it out when we're not here.  We hope you enjoy Rio and living in our studio as much as we do.  We'll do as much as we can to make your stay easy and memorable.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
This is a great little apartment on a quiet tree-lined street about two and a half blocks from the beach.  It is close to everything including the Siqueira Campos Metro stop which is a big plus if you need to get to downtown Rio. There are parts of Copacabana that are quite a trek from the Metro. There are all sorts of restaurants within a block in all directions and of course the beach a 5-minute walk away.

Everything is brand new and the apartment feels modern and cozy at the same time. It is however quite small. I was there by myself for 4 nights and it was perfect. Great for a couple as well if you get along really well. I wouldn't try to put 3 people in this place. When the bed is unfolded there is very little floor space left. The little space there is actually feels a lot bigger because it is very organized. It is easy to keep tidy since there is really only one place to put each thing. The handy apartment guide shows you where things go, how to unfold the sofa into the various configurations, and has some tips on the area. 

There is both wired and wireless Internet which was fast and worked perfectly for me. There is a nice little flat screen TV with satellite channels and easily accessible hdmi ports so you can hook up your laptop and play your own content. Sometimes wall-mounted flat screens make it really hard to get to the hdmi ports, but not in this case.

Note that power outlets in Brazil come in about 4 different flavours and you can never really be sure whether it is 110V or 220V. So bring adapters and make sure anything you plug in won't be fried by being plugged into a 220V outlet. In this apartment all (and there are surprisingly many) the outlets are IEC-906-1 type plugs at 220V. It is 3-pronged but still 2-prong Europlug compatible so if you are coming from most of Europe you won't need adapters. If you are coming from North America, bring some regular US-Euro adapters.

The view of Cristo Redentor (Christ the Redeemer statue) is especially nice at sunset and in the evening when it is lit up. There is a shot of it at sunset taken from the window of the apartment here: (Website hidden by Airbnb) 

Alan and Catherine were lightning quick to respond and made the process extremely smooth.

All in all this was a perfect and relaxing 4 nights in Copacabana for me.

Hola a todos!! Estuvimos en el Studio Apartment de Catherine y Alan a fines de junio de 2011 con mi marido. Fue una excelente elección, gracias Alan y Catherine!!
La UBICACION del depto es ideal, ya que estás cerca de todo (queda en Capacabana) y te podés mover en omnibus a todos lados sin problema.
La ZONA es muy seguro, tranquila y con lugares para comer y comprar comida cerca. Siempre nos sentimos MUY seguros.
El DEPARTAMENTO está buenísimo! Es tal cual las fotos. Todo nuevo, impecable y con diseño- Está todo pensado hastá el mínimo detalle! Tiene todo lo necesario y más!  El wifi anda perfecto; la pantalla plana es GRANDE, no como dice el comentario de Marcus. El sillón camo es muy cómodo, tanto como sillón tanto como cama(más cómodo que muchas camas de hotel). El baño está impecable!!! El depto está buenísimo para ir con pareja o con un amigo.
Tiene SEGURIDAD LAS 24HS.
ALAN y CATHERINE son muy organizados y amables. Siempre contestaron rapidisimo y nos dieron datos para la llegada que nos sirvieron mucho,  MUCHAS GRACIAS POR COMPARTIR SU CASA EN RIO CON NOSOTROS!!!
LES RECOMENDAMOS a todos los que quieran conocer Rio, quedarse en el Studio Apartmente de Alan y Catherine!!!
Saludos,

 (Website hidden by Airbnb) Patricio & Mercedes

The studio is really nice and comfy, modern and well-equiped in a nice building, in a great area of Rio - its location, a few meters away from Copacabana beach, is really central and convenient. There are a lot of shops, coffee places, bakeries, restaurants etc. nearby, and the area is really safe.
Alan and Catherine have every thing prepared to make of your stay a great time - all you have to do is to enjoy!

Pase mucho tiempo buscando por AIRBNB algún lugar en el cual pudiera pasar mis vacaciones. En cuanto vi las fotos del Studio, me di cuenta que era un lugar agradable y acogedor. Cuando me puse en contacto con Alan & Catherine, me di cuenta que eran personas muy amables y atentas. Siempre se mostraron dispuestos a resolver mis dudas y ayudarme a encontrar sitios en Rio de janeiro. El Studio es muy bonito y muy comodo, me gusto la vista que se tiene del Cristo Redentor desde la ventana. Muy recomendalbe el Studio! muy simpatica Lelita y muy cordiales los Porteros! Rio es una ciudad magnifica su gente es muy agradable!

My rating is 5 out of 5!!!!! This studio is simply amazing!

Alan and Catherine's studio is a beautiful place to stay. The creative design and artistic details are inspiringly put together. It is also wonderful because it is situated in the heart of Copa. Very close to the shops, the beach, the metro, and major tourist attractions. Location and design are the perfect combo to make your stay comfortable and rewarding!

Alan is such a kind, polite and thoughtful person! I will not forget his kindness. He went above and beyond to make my stay a happy one. In fact, he went well and beyond my expectations of a land lord. He even helped me organise a taxi to leave and booked it for me. Alan also arranged to get the apartment cleaned mid-stay. I did not ask him to do this. In sum, you could not want nicer person to deal with! Alan is a rare gem! He responds to emails in a timely manner and is a generous, helpful and wonderful!  He thinks of everything to make your stay a happy one!

The apartment building is nice and the couple that work at the door and look after the cleaning are such warm, kind and beautiful Brazilian people!!! They helped me so much with many things. When I arrived my luggage was missing, so they rang the airport and even offered to drive me to the airport! They even helped me go shopping for electrical goods so I could use my computer. Outstanding kindness!!!  It was a joy to come and home and say hello to them on the way to the elevator. I will miss them very much!

The apartment is comfortable because every last detail has been very well considered. Coming from Australia, I found the internet speed very fast and easy to connect. The cable TV is excellent and nice to watch after a long day touring Rio! The kitchen is perfect and is a delightful place to make yummy breakfast etc. The bathroom is very well designed. While the living room and bedroom is a joy to be in due to the artwork and beautiful use of form and light. The use of colour in the studio is visually sophisticated and joyful. I really loved the use of design to create atmosphere and mixed with Brazilian art, this is a real treat to enjoy! Loved it!!!

I really enjoyed dealing with Alan and Catherine. They are perfect hosts and I will be coming back to stay again for sure! Thank you so much Alan and Catherine for letting me stay in your beautiful home. I had the best time and will always remember how lovely your home and your wonderful kindness! 

Thank you!!!!!!

The pictures really shows what you get: a modern and cozy studio. At first may look tight and small, however the decoration work done by the owners are very smart and find for every single free space an appropriate use. The location also could not be better. Just one remark: the street is very peaceful, but Rio de Janeiro is a very noisy place. And the studio is placed between two very busy streets. Finally, Alan,  Catherine (the owners) and Lelita (the maid) are extremely friendly and attentive. The will do whatever they could to help your stay to be the best.

Perfect ! The studio is a a Little gem In Copacabana In a quiet tree-lined street NeXT to The métro. Very tastefully decorated  
Communication with Alan and Catherine was great. They are perfect hosts. 
100% recomended

Pasamos una semana maravillosa en el studio de Alan y Catherine. Realmente han pensado en cada detalle para hacerlo funcional, cómodo... y muy bonito!! Tiene todo lo necesario para disfrutar al máximo. 
Además esta ubicado en el mejor rincón de Rio, en el centro de Copacabana, con todas sus tiendas, restaurantes, transporte y vida urbana, pero en una calle tranquila y silenciosa. Un lujo.
Comentamos varias veces durante nuestro viaje la suerte de haber encontrado este lugar para quedarnos. Alan y Catherine fueron siempre muy atentos y accesibles por mail, excelentes anfitriones a distancia. Recomendamos 100% este studio!!!!!

I had such a lovely experience here. Alan and Catherine were extremely helpful and quick to respond to any questions. Everything was IMMACULATE and looked exactly like it does in the photos. Although the space is small, the furniture and set-up made it very comfortable for two people. Such great use of the space. Loved the location...short walk to the beach. Neighborhood was friendly and felt very safe. Alan and Catherine provided suggestions for places to visit and also stocked some key items in the fridge. Amazing!  If I return to Rio I would love to stay here again and recommend it to everyone.

We stayed at Alan and Catherine's studio in November for 6 nights and had wondeful time.  From the point of booking, Alan and Catherine made sure that we were prepared for our stay in Rio.  They shared their thoughts and recommendations with us, this helped us enormously.  The studio is exactly as described, and the location is great. We are more than happy to recommend this studio to our friends and family and we will definitely stay again when we return to Rio.

tuvimos una excelente estadia. Alan y catherine han sido muyamables, nos han dejado el departamento super equipado con todo lo necesariopara disfrutar unos hermosos dias en rio. !muy cerca de laplayay del centro. excelente ubicacion

muchas gracias por todo!

Alan and Catherine entrusted me with their apartment for a whole month and I would not be too surprised if I were to learn that they had nightmares about this. I am a newcomer to this fantastic forum and had no recommendations or much detail in my profile while the apartment that Alan and Catherine entrusted me with truly is their home in Rio. It is a lovely designed little gem in Copa. It is amazing to see how much thought this couple spent in developing this small apartment into a little home where everything just fits perfectly. 

The apartment is light during day and the sofa transforms into a most comfortable bed at night. When I read the description of the apartment I initially had my doubts about the sleeper coach but chose this apartment as all other things just sounded perfect. Well, it turned out that the sleeper couch is as perfect as the apartment proved to be. The most comfortable sleeper I have ever experienced!

The apartment was recently totally renovated and is kept in such good shape that it still feels new. One of the apartment's big asset (apart from its beautiful furniture and interior) is the large shower! And of course the aircon for the hot Rio summer nights!

The apartment is nearby a vast range of fair, good and excellent restaurants and various supermarkets and shops.

The special treat is the welcome pack which allows you some time to study the wonderful recommendations and tips Allan and Catherine provide you with in a little info brochure to assist you in finding your own way in the surrounding area. Alan also offed a Kyle chat to assist me finding my way, but I found the info provided so detailed that this was not necessary.

As with most apartments in Rio, security is tops with a watchfull 24/7 door guard, who by the way is always keen to help where he can.

The Wifi is pleasantly fast and reliable! 

I can only recommend Alan's and Catherine's home in Rio. It is stable for short term, for long term, for business or for just visiting Copa (which, if i may stray off the point :) ) should be on everyones list of things to do while you still can!!!!!)

Thank Alan, thanks Catherine! Your apartment and I will meet gain :) !

A fantastically located, very neat and carefully designed studio!  

The location is excellent, very safe with extremely friendly door-men, lots of good eating and drinking places within easy reach of Copacabana beach (and nice walk to Ipanema beach) as well as the underground to get into central Rio.

The studio is very well designed, and makes excellent use of a small space with everything you could need; a comfortable bed, desk, a kitchenette including full fridge, good bathroom, good internet access and a wide range of TV channels including 3 in English.

Catherine and Alan are excellent hosts, have provided lots of useful information about their local area and its haunts, and have been prompt in all their dealings through Airbnb.

I cannot recommend this place strongly enough! Thanks Catherine and Alan.

The studio is fantastic and I had a great stay! Highly recommend to anyone going to Rio! Great location, in a quiet street and yet close to everything you need in Copacabana! The hosts Alan and Catherine are great and the communication was always clear and the are very attentive people! Thank you so much Alan and Catherine! Looking forward to staying with you again! 
**
O studio é fantástico , super bem localizado, numa rua tranquila, mas ao mesmo tempo perto de tudo em Copacabana. Recomendo a todos que vão ao Rio! O Alan e a Catherine são ótimos, a comunicação  super clara e eles muito atenciosos. Obrigada Alan e Catherine e espero me hospedar com vocês novamente!

Samba,Sun and  Rio Carnival!

Alan and Catherine were absolutely exceptional hosts who went above and beyond their responsibilities as hosts and we could not recommend them more highly. They were extremely fast in responding to our quires and we had a good few especially as it was over carnival (They even responded to out quires during our week in the apartment and helped us with a problem we were having booking flights to Iguazu falls). The studio is ideally situated in a very safe area (although we found nearly everywhere in Rio to be very safe) that is perfect for exploring Copacabana and the surrounding areas. The city itself can be somewhat overwhelming at first but Alan and Catherine’s starter and information packs gave us the confidence to venture all over they city without hesitation. Carnival is an amazing time to go and it is good to have somewhere private to go back to after a long day or night at a bloc party (which you will run into everywhere). As a first time couple using this site we could not have been more happy with the outcome and it really made our trip to Rio carnival one we will never forget. So all that’s left to say is go and in stay in Alan and Catherine’s beautiful apartment, don’t believe the negative things you hear about Rio and bring a wig or a hat for carnival as you wont see a local without one :)

Our experience with Alan and Catherine's apartment in Rio was a dream experience.  Our first time in Rio, we were faced with a 1:00 AM arrival at GIG.   Already wary of what I had read about airport taxi, I wondered how we were going to deal with this one.  No problem, everything was promptly arranged with their trusted driver who was at the airport promptly with our name and a reaonsable cost. 

The apartment is on a beautiful quaint street in the heart of Copacabana.  Building security is fantastic with trusted 24 hr porters,  restricted access to the floors.  We felt much safer than in a hotel -- but Rio  not to be construed as an unsafe city.  We felt fine everywhere we went.  The metro is clean and efficient.  

Everything in the apartment is well organized and works.  The high speed internet permitted flawless (Hidden by Airbnb) calls at all hours - a great stress reliever when you're on business.

Alan and Catherine responded immediately to al communications, offered tons of helpful information about the area, checked in frequently to see if anything needed.  Its just goes on and on.  In short, they "get it".   Its not about the apartment, rather the total experience. 

Put this on your A list and consider yourself lucky if it books..

Tom and Cecilia Kessler
Guadalajara, Mexico

We had a wonderful time in Rio! The studio is great! It is very well designed. Everything works perfectly well and Internet is faster than what we have in Switzerland! The location is great too! About 5 minutes walk to the beach of Copacabana, and located in a safe neighborhood. The bus station to go to the Sugar Loaf is about 10 minutes walk and the subway and the supermarket are only 3 minutes walking distance. Ipanema is only a 30 minute walk or you can take the subway (2 stations). Catherine and Alan were very helpful in helping us organize our trip. They were very patient with all our questions and fast in responding emails. They also helped us book our transportation to the apartment and all went very smoothly. We also loved the handbook loaded with all sorts of recommendations. We tried out a few restaurants and were not disappointed. We also went to Churrascaria Carretao (10 minutes walk) as my husband loves grilled meat (very touristy, get there early to avoid the tourist buses!). The hotel Othon has a restaurant on the top floor with a beautiful view of the beach of Copacabana. The food is rather pricey but the view is definitely worth it! The restaurant Colombo in the Fort of Copacabana is supposed to be good too, unfortunately we ran out of time! There are some very nice markets on Sundays. When heading to the hippie market in Ipanema stop at this very small market off Avenida Atlantica just before the Fort of Capacabana! They sell great pastels and the best caldos de cane! There is also an information center on Copacabana only a few minutes  towards Leme... And all this in short walking distance from the studio! 
We highly recommend this place!

Estuvimos en el estudio de Alan & Catherine por 5 días y todo fue perefecto. El estudio es precioso, en un ubicacion muy comoda, cerca de la playa, el metro y muchos buses para diferentes puntos de la ciudad.
Ellos fueron muy amables con nosotros, enviandonos recomendaciones de actividades cerca del estudio y en todo rio!
Fue nuestra primera experiencia con airbn y realmente nos fue muy bien!
De volver a Rio no dudaríamos en volver aqui!!! :)
...............

Were in the studio of Alan & Catherine for 5 days and everything was perefect. The studio is beautiful, in a very comfortable location near the beach, the metro and many buses to different parts of the city.
They were very kind to us, sending us recommendations of the study activities near and around the river!
It was our first experience with airbn and really was great!
Ww hope go back here! :)

I stayed in the studio for 4 days with a friend and it was perfect! It was recommended to me by my cousin Mercedes who had stayed there previously. She talked wonders about the hosts and the place and fortunately it was all true and more! Before going, Catherine made sure that we had everything we needed. All our communications were really helpful and clear. Such attention to detail and genuine concern to make our stay smooth is hard to come by! The recommendations she sent us with places to go to were amazing, especially the restaurants! The studio itself is well located, near the beach, the metro and in a safe area. Everything inside is new and works perfectly. Internet connection is wonderful! Porters are nice and inclined to help. All in all, a perfect stay in Rio!!

We stayed for just under a week at Catherine and Alan's place in Copacabana.  Catherine was very easy to communicate with, and was incredibly helpful with tourist and non-tourist things to do in Rio.  I couldn't believe that they provided us with tea, coffee, fruit and cereal for our stay -- I haven't had better hospitality in some 5 star hotels.  Other reviewers have mentioned that the place is "cosy" (which I confirm), but for us it was fine.  On top of everything, Catherine and Alan have tastefully decorated the apartment and have quality appointments.  I would definitely love to stay here again, and would highly recommend it to others.

name: 2 Bedroom Ocean Front Condo in Honokowai - Sleeps 6 - Hale Mahina #B404
summary: This elegant 2 bedroom, loft style unit has its semi-private master bedroom and bathroom upstairs and guest bedroom downstairs. Features bamboo flooring in the loft bedroom, tile in the living areas and carpet in the guest bedroom. The guest bedroom has a stall shower only, no bath tub but there is a shower-tub in the master bedroom.

host.about:
Chase ‘N Rainbows (CNR) Real Estate, Inc. is a Maui-based, family-owned company established in 1980 with two divisions: vacation rental management and real estate sales. For the past twenty years, CNR has been offering visitors and Kama’aina alike, affordable and luxury accommodations at a very competitive price. All of its vacation rental units are carefully selected, meticulously inspected, attractively furnished and well maintained to the highest standards. CNR is committed to providing the finest product and unsurpassed personalized service in the industry. These condominiums come highly recommended by leisure, business, and family travelers with distinctive tastes. A significant number of satisfied, return guests speak for the company’s service commitment and quality product. Chase ‘N Rainbows is a proud member of the Hawaii Visitors & Convention Bureau (HVCB), The American Society of Travel Agents (ASTA), Maui Visitors Bureau (MVB), Hawaii Association of Realtors, Maui Chamber of Commerce, and Vacation Rental Managers Association (VRMA).

*Please note we are a licensed and bonded professional management company and we DO NOT advertise on Craig s List

reviews.txt: Everything was exactly as promised or better. This was a wonderful location in a family friendly setting.  We would stay here again for future visits.

name: MODERN CONDO WITH VIEW - GRIFFIN
summary: Enjoy your stay in Montreal by relaxing in this brand new condo with a lot of great amenities in the building :) You will love the view, the balcony, and the free coffee/tea in the morning ! Feel free to borrow a travel guide and go explore the city!

reviews.txt: My sister and I just got home from an amazing weekend away in Montreal! This was the first time we used airbnb and Manon was a wonderful host. She was prompt to answer any questions we had. The condo was spotless and beautiful and looked just as the picture described. The neighbourhood was lovely. Was only abou a 7 minute drive to downtown and we used uber! It was a locked and secure building. We have only amazing things to say about our stay and the host. Thank you again Manon!

name: Charming StanleyBeachFlat w/rooftop
summary: A charming,funky cool 1 bdrm flat in older walk up bldg close to Stanley beaches,mountain trails. A huge shared BBQ rooftop. No lift, 4 floor stairs Light,airy floor/ceiling windows. Buses at door,cafes.shops.wireless.full cooking kitchen.great spot!

loc.address: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Marcos had been most helpful, trying his best to make my stay a pleasant one even when he was away on holidays. The apartment was very cozy, the bed was especially comfortable and the place was warm even in the winter. Just opposite the busstop, with plenty of restaurants around.

It was the second time I was renting a flat from Marcos. No surprise. Marcos is a great host. Always available if you need anything and making your stay as nice as possible.
The flat is of perfect size with its separate bedroom and good living room space. The walk through dressing room is also very convenient. Plenty of room to put your stuff (which is not always the case in Airbnb flats in HK).
Stanley is great, you'll meet people easily just by going down at one of the bars. I recommend Verns for their beers and Smugglers for the atmosphere. ;)
Marcos's flat is in a good location. It is easy to find and very convenient to go to downtown. I like Stanley very much and will stay in his place again in the future.
很方便的地點,很舒適的屋子!

We found the appartment as advertised on airbnb. The place is cosy, clean (for long time visitors: the cleaner comes once a week), and the location could not be better (5 minutes walk to the beach, restaurants, shops, Stanley market; half an hour by public bus to central Hong Kong).

Marcos is a very nice and helpful person. He answered all our questions quickly both before and during our stay. He even came up with a few beach toys for our children and offered them participating in a tennis lesson for kids free of charge.

Perfect appartment offering value for money, perfect host, perfect stay - thanks!
It's such a nice place for a holiday, the location is great and the beach is just 10 mins walk, Macros is very nice and helpful, we had a good time at Stanley.

Very nice flat, in the heart of Stanley village. Home away from home, the flat is very cosy. Thank you Marcos for your welcoming and your advices about Stanley. We could not have gas in the kitchen, but that was a minor problem given all the very nice restaurants around very very close, eg in Stanley plaza.

Marcos gave very specific instruction on the location of the flat before our arrival via phone and message.  Altough we made some misunderstanding about "the room on left side of the stair" , no one answered while knocking the exact door (with TV noise). And we found a key in the running shoe for the other room as instruction. That confused us.  But he is warm and very nice after all.

Except the air condition is a little noisy, the room is as comfortable as our home and extremely convenient, close to the bus station and shopping area,with a wonderful rooftop.

Marcos' place was terrific. A comfortable 1-bedroom, an incredibly comfortable bed, and an awesome location right next to Stanley Market. It was the second time Marcos was kind enough to host me. He's quick to respond, and has an easy-going personality as well. I'd highly recommend a stay there. Thanks again, Marcos!
Really good place to stay. Great host

Nice one bedroom flat in one of the best neighborhoods in Hong Kong. A good  escape from the busy city centre but still with easy access to everything. Marcos is a nice host. He kept checking if things were ok during our stay. Thank you for hosting us, Marcos.

Marcos' place is a perfect location for being in Stanley, right near the market, waterfront restaurants, the bus station and shopping.  We were not able to use the grill, which was disappointing, but his place was clean and adequate for our stay.
This was a great location in Stanley, near bus depot, coffee, and market. Bed was very comfortable. Ma cos was easy to get in touch with via email.

We had a great time in Stanley staying at Marcos' flat!  Awesome location... walk to both beaches and restaurants and shops and bars and the market and coffee houses and... well, everything!  For trips to the city, the bus stop that takes you right to downtown Hong Kong is literally across the street and very easy to navigate.

Marcos is a great host, very friendly and welcoming and there to answer any questions you have and/or give you great recommendations.  Would definitely recommend.

The property is very well located in Stanley market. Short walk to the Beach. Instructions were accurate and made it easy to locate - it's on the 5th floor with a nice staircase. Marcos apartment was neat & clean, exactly like the pic and I enjoyed my stay with him. Thanks.

Marcos, the host, has been extremely kind and helpful during our stay.  The flat is excellent and exactly what we need for a mini family vacation in a quiet seaside place. We love Stanley very much, and Marcos' flat would be our definite choice for our next trip there.

We are a family of three with a young toddler. Marcos was very friendly and he prepared a teddy for our daughter to play with during the stay. He upgraded us to another apartment of the same building and he attended to our requests even at night time. Thank you.
Had a little confusion with the key, but the overall place was very nice. Great location as well

Marco's place …is simply perfect!! A very nice place for stay-cation! Located at a great location which allow accessing bars around pier, the beach and the market in walking distance. 

For the house, it's with artistic decoration and fully equipped kitchen! The rooftop makes the perfect place being incredible!!

I enjoy my time there so much and would definitely return!!
Marcos was a great host and always responsive. The flat is very nice. Would recommend to stay there!

name: Barra da Tijuca: cobertura ESPETACULAR
summary: Localizada em bairro nobre do Rio de Janeiro, totalmente mobiliada, com sauna, em um condomínio contando com diversas facilidades (piscina, academia, portaria...), disponível pela primeira vez para locação. TUDO NOVO. Super caprichado!

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Localização ideal. Apartamento novo. Preço justo.

name: New apartment - 1 room
summary: New and cozy apartment with 1 room available.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
Oi! Sou Gabriela, administradora de Belo Horizonte. Moro no Rio de Janeiro há 10 anos, e estou alugando um ótimo quarto. Gosto de livros, cinema, arte, ginástica, e claro, de viajar!

Hi! I am Gabriela, a brazilian administrator from Belo Horizonte. I live in Rio de Janeiro for 10 years and I am renting a beautiful bedroom in Rio. I'm addicted in books, movies, gym and, of course, travelling.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: O apartamento da Gabriela é incrível. Super bem cuidado. Estava organizado, limpo e ainda recebi um kit de boas vindas :) Me senti muito bem acolhida. A localização é muito boa. Recomendo.

name: Porto.arte downtown apartment 3PAX
summary: This Porto´s typical apartment, on a classical house, has recently been restored and is fully equipped (including Air Conditioning and Wifi). It was decorated to comfortably accommodate couples and travelers (up to 3 people), either on recreation or business. The atmosphere is warm and serene, with a remarkable natural light in every room.
