Safa was very responsive and helpful.  Our accommodations were clean and cozy and perfect for a beach weekend getaway! Very close to the beach and boardwalk, and places to get food and go surfing!
房间崭新舒适,交通便利｡房东热情好客

This was the perfect place for a beach getaway. It felt more like a studio apartment than a room in someone's home, just without a full kitchen (microwave and fridge though!). The room was incredibly clean and the AC was strong and quiet. 5 minute walk from the beach. So great!
Highly recommend staying at this property. Extremely clean, great location minutes from the beach. Host was very courteous. Definitely booking this property again soon!
Clean,  easy, and a quick walk to the beach.  Basically like a hotel room. Safa was quick to respond and very helpful.
Place was convenient, clean and comfortable.  Safa was a pleasure to deal with.
Very nice and clean room! Perfect location for seightseeing New York and a little bit relax on the beach!
Ordentliches, zweckmäßiges Zimmer. Ideal für die Nacht vor dem Rückflug vom JFK Flughafen. Sehr nah zum Rockaway Beach. Die Kommunikation war gut, Ein-und Auschecken haben sehr gut geklappt.

We booked this place for one night based on very good reviews. I had a half marathon race in the next early morning. When we arrived, Derek (the premise manager) welcomed us and everything looked nice, comfortable and clean. The location is also good (close to the A train station and the beach). 
However, it was not quiet during the night sleep. We were woken up by constant loud noises ( between 12am and 2:30am ) from the tenant family (apparently, who also rent and stay in the house but on a different floor or room). We had no choice but called Derek around 12:16am and later with SMS, but the situation was not under control. The tenant's kids kept speaking loudly and running around, we could not get any sleep between 12-2:30am at all. We felt exhausted and bad in the next morning due to disruptions of night sleep (remember, I also had 13miles race to run).  Definitely, it requires further improvements.

The unit was exactly as advertised and it fit our plans for Rockaway perfectly. 

Derek, who was filling in for Safa, was very attentive to make sure everything was in order.

Very clean room, good amenities, no kitchen, but a microwave and toaster. 

The only issue was the noise: the neighbors were very noisy all weekend
It is a great suite.  Everything is perfect. And Safa is easy to communicate

This room was exactly as advertised. It was very clean and the bed was comfortable. Safa was responsive and professional. However, we were only there 2 nights and we hardly slept the first night because the neighbors in the adjacent unit were in the hallway yelling running up and down the stairs until about 3am. It seemed like there was no sound proofing between our room and the stairwell. If not for the noise, I would definitely recommend this room.
Great place, magical location. Private and cozy.
A good inexpensive place to stay. It's a bit out of the way so definitely important to have a car.
The room was clean and exactly as described. We enjoyed our stay.
We stayed for two days with my wife and two kids and the place is exactly how it is advertised . Safa was very responsive and I would definitely stay next time .
very easy check in and communication. short walk from train and beach. walls are thin but otherwise a very nice sunny pleasant room!

name: Triple Room  - Ocean's 7 Hotel
summary: Hotel is perfectly located in the heart of Istanbul's Sultanahmet district-which is the mark of turkish hospitality and culture and easy access to all public transports and allows you to get to all main touristic atractions by walk.Set in the old town of Sultanahmet, place is just a short walk from the Hagia Sophia, Topkapi Palace and Blue Mosque, Grand Bazaar. A great choice for travellers interested in sightseeings,in monuments, architecture and history.Couples particularly like the location.

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Chic City Pad with Leafy Outlook
summary: Recently renovated and truly spacious studio apartment in the heart of Potts Point. Within walking distance to some of Sydney's best attractions and an easy 8 min walk to Kings Cross Train Station. Beautifully renovated and appointed, you will have access to free Wi-Fi, the new kitchen with cooking facilities, washer & dryer and the building's stunning pool!  The space works for solo adventurers and business travellers, with the comfortable queen sized bed making it perfect for couples.

host.about: Hi I'm Vickie! I am an avid traveller who loves my city and Airbnb allows me to share it with you and!!! I truly enjoy meeting new people and look forward to welcoming you to my beautiful city.

reviews.txt:
Spend a great 2 nights at Vickie's studio. Well decorated, had everything we need and surprisingly spacious. It was my first time in Sydney, so the location was just perfect; many good cafes and restaurants near by.

Vickie is an amazing host, she made sure we were comfortable and well adjusted. Great person to communicate with.

Merci Victoria pour votre charmant accueil, votre appartement est charmant dans un quartier animé avec des cafés et restaurants à proximité. 15 mn à pied de CBD et de l'opéra de Sydney. La vue de l'appartement est dégagée et très bien exposé.
Merci pour vos messages de compassion suite aux attentants de Nice. Je vous recommande cette adresse.
Fabienne

What a fabulous Studio in the centre of Potts Point. I was lucky enough to be one of the first to stay here. Everything is lovely, fresh and new. It's quiet, but at the same time has everything on the doorstep. Vickie is a wonderful host and made sure I was comfortable.

Vickie was a lovely host and did everything she could to help and make our stay enjoyable. The apartment is in an excellent position - close to restaurants and cafes as well as walking distance from the city. The apartment itself is great with a very comfortable bed and has everything you need.

Vickie is an amazing host with a beautiful apartment. Location is incredible- right by lovely restaurants and bars, and only a quick ride into the city. The apartment itself was gorgeous- so clean, light and airy. Queen bed is super comfortable as well. I highly recommend this apartment, and would love to stay here again. Perfect Airbnb experience.

The apartment was exactly like the photos, brand new and very clean.
The bed was a fold out from the wall, very comfy and the pillow and blankets were amazing.
Perfect apartment! Great local restaurants and supermarket across the road. Perfect and professional communication from the host. Well done. I will stay here for business again.

Great location! A very nice area with lots of bars, shops and restaurants close by and a nice stroll to the city. Clean, modern and comfortable apartment. Very friendly and helpful hosts who were great at communicating and made us feel very welcome. We would definitely stay there again!

The studio was clean and nicely furnish. The sofa and bed are comfortable, and the apartment has a ledge by the window with chairs to people-watch in the day. It has everything necessary for a short term and long term stay. There is a big TV with chromecast that was so useful when my partner and I simply hung in the apartment after a day of exploring.

Victoria was prompt in responses and prepare materials abt the area and the facilities that were very useful. Check-in process was very easy. 

Highly recommended, and will be very happy to be hosted by her again when I visit Sydney.
Apartments is small but it is nice and well located. The street is good and plenty of good restaurants and just 5min walking to king cross station

We really enjoyed our stay at Victoria's place. It was a beautiful apartment in a fantastic location; close to all shops and amenities. Kings cross is only a short walk away but most days we walked through the beautiful botanic gardens to Central Quays. 
We really appreciated being able to stay until after lunch on our leaving day. The apartment was beautifully clean and although cosy had everything we needed.
Vickie was an excellent host and responded to any queries very promptly despite being away at the time.
I would definitely stay at this apartment again if visiting Sydney.

We stayed at Vickie's apartment for five nights and we enjoyed it a lot. The apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures and it's well-equipped, beautiful and cozy (the bed is especially comfortable). 
Victoria was very friendly and easy to communicate with. When we had issues with the wifi, she immediately came over and sorted everything out, although it was already 8 or 8.30 in the evening. She also gave us a lot of information about restaurants, bars and sights in the area. All of her recommendations were really good too!
We had an amazing time in Sydney, thanks to our great host Vickie and her lovely apartment. We can definitely recommend this place! :)

Victoria è un Host perfetto. Ci siamo sentiti molto spesso per cordinare il viaggio. La casa è molto vicina al centro molto pulita e graziosa.  Se dovessi tornare a Sydney sicuramente sceglierò nuovamente questo appartamento.

Vickie is The perfect host. She is very nice and polite. The apartment was cute and clean. The location of the flat is good and Vickie gives you recommendations of were to have good meals next to it. We would definetly come back there if we ever came to Sydney again!

Victoria's Chic City Pad was an an excellent stay!! She made my friend and I feel really welcomed from the start! She communicated clearly about the arrival time and gave us great advice about the city. She also checked in regularly to ensure we were enjoying our stay. The neighbourhood is very posh, a less than 30 minute walk from the Opera House and Harbour Bridge, as well as the Botanical Gardens. It was easy to find from Kings Cross train station and we loved the modern feel and look of the flat.
Great apartment close to everything. Vickie was really easy to communicate with on our arrival and knowledgable of the area too! highly reccomend.
The apartment was amazing. Perfect location. So comfortable and had everything we needed. Victoria was communicative and attentive. Would love to come back.
Awesome location and great host. Flexible with arrival and departure needs too. Thanks for a great stay Vickie!

Victoria was super quick to respond to all questions, the location is amazing, great area for cafes and bars, also very central to close to the train so it's very to get around.  Lovely and clean space, it was a pleasure to stay

Check in was very easy. Victoria was there to meet me, explained the area, where everything was and was very helpful in letting me check out later. It was a great stay, definitely recommend the space for any solo travellers and the area for anyone who is looking for great food, and a nice relaxing atmosphere.

name: A GEM IN THE HEART  OF BYZANTINE  ISTANBUL
summary: The apartment is 94 squared meters on the third floor of an apartment building. It is  300 meters away from İstiklal Cd, the well known pedestrian walkaway of the City, and 500 meters from the Metro station of Sishane on Istiklal. This is a lovely place with an excellent view of the Golden Horn waterway and the entire Ottoman and Byzantine Istanbul. The apartment is a lovely retreat for business travelers, and families (with kids), and couples on their Honeymoon.

host.about:
I am cinematographer 
I love traveling
I am fanatic about mountain biking
I am in love with Istanbul's old part of the city

reviews.txt: L'appartement est idéalement situé avec une vue à couper le souffle. Il a été décoré avec beaucoup de goût et on s'y sent comme chez soi. Madame Margarita qui a fait le lien avec Chronis est vraiment très sympathique et nous a aidé. Le seul bémol : les coupures d'électricité et d'eau plusieurs fois par jour dans plusieurs quartiers de la ville et qui ont aussi touché l'appartement.

Nicely decorated apartment in perfect location with a stunning view over Istanbul! The host was great, there was no problem with an earlier check in and communication was perfect. Next time I am in Istanbul I'll definitely try to stay in Chronis's apartment!! Thank you

Chronis's apartment is absolutely delightful with magnificent views over the Golden Horn.  It is in easy reach of public transport although we walked to all the major sites and enjoyed the atmosphere of Istanbul.  There are loads of great restaurants close by and we found the local ahopkeepers really friendly.  I would thoroughly recommend staying here.
A lovely place with all the required amenities and a view to die for. Perfect for enjoying a drink after walking the streets of the bazaar. A real pleasure.
Great location, beautiful apartment and views better than anywhere else

The apartment is well located for easy access to tourist sites, shopping and transport. It is spacious, well-appointed and immaculately clean. It has a stunning view (over terra-cotta rooftops, the waterways and skyline of fantastic mosques) with beautiful furniture and a marble bathroom. All communication with the host was timely with clear information and support. I would definite stay here on any future visits.

Where to start? The location? 
The cozy neighborhood? 
The carefully and tastefully decorated apartment with all you need to feel at home?
The view? Morning, afternoon, evening, late at night ... I couldn't get enough of it!!!! If you want to get a glimpse of the beauty of Istanbul then welcome to the most amazing settings. 
Fully equipped Kitchen ... believe me it's worth it when you have fresh ingredients at the corner store (open 24/7 and they speak Farsi and English) 
Restaurants, bars, shops, coffee, tea, buses, metro… everything is literally seconds or minutes away walking from the apartment.
Chronis has been fantastic at coordinating everything, from checking to checkout to perfection, to coordinating with Margarita in Istanbul (by the way she is a Gem)... This is what I call Hosting! 
I would not wish to stay anywhere else in Istanbul for the rest of my life!

Beautiful appartment but...
1) Frequent water shortage. Something which Chronis did not mention beforehand. When we brought to his attention, he says that "this is a usual Istanbul problem. It's not my house problem". A great way to wash his hands off the situation in my opinion. 
2) Cancellation and refunds will not be entertained. Initially, we wanted to change the dates but his appartment was not available on those dates. We had asked if we could get a refund since it's not available but he did not respond. So we went with the initial dates. Second time we asked for a refund was after the water shortage incident. We didn't stay throughout, and had 6 nights remaining. Once again we asked for a refund but he did not respond. 

If you're ok to infrequent water supply and a host that does not respond to refund then the appartment will suit you just fine.

Very spacious and quiet. Excellent view from the large window in living room. Good kitchen amenities. Very clean except for a bit dusty floors for barefoot walking. Wifi worked very well. About 200m walking to a bus stop where many buses pass by. Another 100m lead to a popular commercial street where there are a lot of shops and restaurants. Downstairs is a store for basic groceries but sophisticated groceries were nowhere around. Host's unwillingness to supply toilet paper in addition to a small leftover caused some inconvenience as it was not easy to buy a single roll. We have not met Chronis but communicated often with the caretaking lady who was nice and responsive. Overall the 4 of us had a very good stay of 8 days. I especially enjoyed reading the book about the history of Byzantium on the shelf -- many thanks for providing.
Sehr schöne Wohnung mit einer Traumhaften Aussicht. Kommunikation mit dem Gastgeber war unkompliziert. Lage ist sehr zentral. Gerne nochmal!
It was great. Beautiful view. Cozy apartment. You can feel youself like its your home.
Our second time in this beautiful apartment with a stunning view and great interior. Would definitely recommend! As myself...next time in Istanbul I am staying here !
Extremely nice place to stay with magnificent view on Golden Horn. Good location. Stylish enjoyable interior with attractive dimmable lighting.

what makes a place great in the first place, is the owners mood and hospitality.
Chronis and Margarita were always there for any question or suggestion even when offering a late check out.
the apartment is for sure better than the photos, nothing will deceive u. clean and modern and the space with this panoramic view overlooking the Bosphorus, bridges and old istanbul make it hard for u to leave home.
it is a super place to relax and had a cool vacation and to do some work as well as the internet connection is super. 
the neighborhood is safe and just few steps from the main road where any uber can be late more than 3 min... its 4 min walking from Galata Serai School in Istiklal 
for sure i will be visiting again

We stayed in Chronis's appartment for 17 days. Appartment is stylish, has high ceilings, very light and big. Kitchen is  super equipped! Of course the main is - the amazing view from a big window in living room!!!))) Margarita and Chronis were always on-line to help about all the questions. Thank you very much!!!
Perfect solution for your stay in Istanbul. Amazing view of the city, nice design, everything provided in the kitchen and very spacious. Definitely recommended
Beautiful flat. Decorated with a lot of elegance. The view is spectacular. Accessible location, with the charming 24/7 store right opposite it.

Do you want to have one of the best views in Istanbul while enjoying a glass of "cay" (turkish tea)? Is good communication to your host and a warm welcome important to you? Ever wanted to stay in an amazingly designed, old Istanbul-apartment? Then you found your location to stay! My friend and I, both of turkish decent, stayed in this apartment for a week during March (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Two days before our flight to Istanbuk, Chronis contacted us and gave us thorough information on address and what we should be careful about, like not being too loud with music for the sake of the neighbors. Furthermore he told us, that his assistant Ms. Margarita will welcome us at our arrival, since he was not in Istanbul during that time. He gave us Ms. Margaritas and his phonenumer to contact them upon arrival via phone or (Hidden by Airbnb) Messenger. After our arrival we contacted Ms. Margarita on (Hidden by Airbnb) and told her our approximate time of arrival in front of the apartment. She responded quickly. Upon arrival at the apartment we rang the bell of the flat, which Chronis told us in before and were quickly welcomed by Ms. Margarita. She gave us a very friendly and warm welcome and informed us on everything important about the flat. She had only prepared one bed in the big bedroom, since she assumed we'd be a couple. After having told her, that we need two seperate beds, the quickly prepared the second bed in the small bedroom, without any hesitation. Furthermore she informed us about possible issues like water failures, which is normal in Istanbul during this season, because of heavy rains and a bad water infrastructure. She even prepared water canisters in case, so that we could still finish the shower or use the toilet. Because it was already very late when we arrived, we agreed on asking further questions via phone or (Hidden by Airbnb) . The following days, she wrote us on (Hidden by Airbnb) to check if everything's ok. During our stay we made mostly good experiences with the flat. The most mentionable ones are the following: 1) The bed in the big bedroom is very comfy. 2) There are lots of fresh towels and duvet covers in case that you like to change very frequently. 3) The kitchen is equipped with everything needed for a decent meal. The stove is new and there is a dishwasher, if you like to use one. 4) The view from the living room is AMAZING! I doubt, you can find many other apartments with such a nice view in central Istanbul. 5) The water actually never failed ;) There were also some SMALLER points, which could improve. The most important ones: 1) The bed in the smaller bedroom is directy next to the radiator, which can make sleeping there during the cold season very hot. If you shut off the heating, the floor and flat itself can get quite cold, since it's an old building with wood battens. 2)...

Very nice apartment. 
Nice location and enjoyable walk to the action, spacious, decorated very nicely.  Didn't personally meet owner but very nice and helpful via email. 
Epic view with massive glass windows.  Very comfy bed.  Nice desk if you have any work to do.  Bathroom is very small but practical enough.
Thanks for a great place to stay in wonderful Istanbul!

Amazing flat in an amazing location. Very well planned and super clean. A gem in istanbul. 

My only addition would be securing a person who would help with luggage at a fee as the stairs are steep. 

I will definitely stop by everytime am in istanbul

Thanks
Ahmad

name: Be Happy in Porto
summary: Be Happy Apartment is an amazing space. Renovated and comfortable apartment, located in a building dating from the nineteenth century in one of the most emblematic streets of the Porto city "Rua do Almada".  Be Happy Apartment is located in the city center, able you to visit the historic center only by foot, being very close of majority points of interesting of the Porto City. Be Happy Apartment is located close of central Station MetroTrindade.

host.location: São Félix da Marinha, Porto, Portugal
host.about:
Olá o meu nome é Fábio Ramos tenho 32 anos.
Sou uma pessoa animada, divertida e altruísta, tenho inúmeros prazeres nesta vida um dos quais é viajar e conhecer pessoas de outras nacionalidades culturas. 
Enquanto anfitrião prometo ser o mais prestativo possível, tanto nos primeiros contactos como quando forem meus hóspedes, estarei sempre disponível para ajudar e dar todo o suporte necessário para que passa uma estadia super agradável e interessante na cidade do Porto.

reviews.txt:
Fábio has everything you can look after for a host!
The apartment is very nice and its location is perfect, we strongly recommend for your stay in Porto!

The apartment is perfect for two people. It is clean, well equipped and has a super comfortable bed. The interior is new and tasteful.  We didn't miss anything and felt like home. The location is in the center and perfect tfor sightseeing.
Fabio is a very nice and helpful person and a great host. I totally would recommend this apartment for an unforgettable visit in Porto.

Listing as described. Well location. Fabio was always in touch. Just small issues with tv, but had lots of options to make this up.   Definitely a listing I would stay again and recommend Fabio as a host!

Fabio was the epitome of how warm and friendly Poruguese people are. He made me feel not as a tourist but as a friend. Fabio wanted to make sure that i will visit the most interesting places in Porto that's why his recommendations were truly useful! His place is also spotlessly clean ad very cozy!

Fábio given us all the attention, since the reservation until the delivery of the keys on arrival. The announcement corresponds to reality, the photos do not cheat. The apartment is very cozy. I strongly recommend to stay in this accommodation.

Foi uma viagem de trabalho que trouxe-me até ao Porto.
No entanto, o espaço deu-me a possibilidade de mesmo depois de chegar tarde ao apartamento, ainda encontrar muitos cafés e restaurantes à volta!
Não poderia ter melhores coisas a apontar ao apartamento e ao anfitrião.
É um apartamento muito espaçoso e muito bem equipado e com um aspecto muito moderno.
Obrigado pela atenção, e espero ficar aí muitas mais vezes! :)

Nous avons été parfaitement accueillis par notre hôte. Celui-ci était présent à notre arrivée. Il nous a présenté la disposition de l'appartement ainsi que les fonctionnalités. L'appartement correspondait tout à fait à la description. L'intérieur a été totalement refait et surtout bien fait (totalement refait à neuf avec porte bien sécurisée, même si le quartier pourtant ne craint pas du tout). La cuisine est bien aménagée et bien équipée. La salle de bain est pratique. 
La localisation est idéal à vrai dire : à deux pas de la place de la liberté et très proche de la station Trindad (liaison direct aéroport). Enfin, proche de toute commodité et des animations. Le double vitrage et le volet intérieur protège bien de la rue, qui est somme toute très calme. On y reviendra!

Estive no Porto com o meu namorado durante 4 dias e o apartamento, que é tal e qual como aparece no anúncio, foi muito adequado. Está situado numa zona histórica e central e por isso foi possível passear sempre a pé pela cidade. É uma zona calma e a menos de 5 minutos é possível chegar ao supermercado, ao metro e a diversos centros turísticos e lojas. Tem as condições básicas e estava tudo limpo e organizado. O Fábio foi sempre atencioso e prestável desde o momento em que chegámos. Ideal para duas pessoas e para uns dias de descanso! É, sem dúvida, uma experiência a repetir.

Appartement très bien situé, avons tout fait à  pied.15mn de la ribiera, 7mn de la'bouche de metro trindade.
Quelques restaurants peu excessifs, atypiques par leur decor et tres bons à  proximité.
Fablio, tres accueillant, nous attendait à  L appartement.
 il a pris son temps pour nous expliquer ce qu' il y avait à 'visiter. Très disponible pour répondre à  nos questions durant le séjour.
Appartement est similaire aux photos. Dans la cuisine, il y a tout pour cuisiner.
A recommander.

Fabio, nous a très bien accueillis. L'appartement est très bien situé, il est exactement comme sur les photos. Fabio est un hôte disponible, qui donne pleins de bon conseils. Encore merci. On y reviendra.

We had a lovely stay in this flat and it made a huge difference to my holiday in Porto. Beautiful and fully equipped apartment in the city center. Fabio was a great host. I would definitely recommend staying here!

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Fabio qui a pris le temps de donner des idées de choses à faire à Porto à notre arrivée. L'appartement est neuf, charmant et très bien entretenu. Nous vous le conseillons.

Apartamento com excelente localização, próximo ao metro, supermercado e o centro turístico de porto. O apartamento é exatamente como ilustrado nas fotos e a limpeza também muito boa! Se tem algum ônus, é na hora de tomar banho, a aguá quente dura cerca de 7 minutos e existe a necessidade de esperar 1 hora de intervalo para ter água quente de novo.
Fábio é um excelente anfitrião!
Fabio is a great host, I had a really nice time in Porto thanks to him. His flat is nicely positioned between the train station and city centre. I would come again.

Fabio nous a bien accueilli  et nous  a conseillé .
L'apparat était tel que décrit.
La situation parfaite et sur une rue pleine de fêtes.

L'appartamento è molto bello e confortevole, di recentissima ristrutturazione, con arredamenti, sanitari ed elettrodomestici nuovi; la cucina è delle giuste dimensioni, funzionale e completa di tutti gli utensili necessari; il bagno è un po' piccolo, ma non scomodo, completo e funzionale; due grandi finestre assicurano un'ottima illuminazione e queste si affacciano su una via del centro che comunque non è molto trafficata ne rumorosa nelle ore serali e notturne. Posizione perfetta, praticamente in centro, a pochi minuti a piedi da molti siti di interesse. L'accoglienza è stata ottima, Fábio è molto simpatico e disponibile, ci ha fornito valide informazioni sui luoghi da frequentare, oltre a lasciarci un contatto telefonico per contattarlo in caso di necessità.

Foi um fim-de-semana magnifico. O Fábio e toda a sua equipa foram fabulosos connosco desde o início ao fim da estadia. O espaço é tal e qual as fotos relatam. Muito confortável, espaçoso, ideal para duas pessoas. A localização não poderia ser melhor. Quase sempre optámos por comer na rua. As referências são as melhores. As únicas questões a apontar são o facto da casa de banho ter estado com alguns problemas aquando da nossa chegada e só fomos alertados então. Gostaríamos de ter sido alertados antes de ter lá chegado. No entanto foi tudo resolvido e ficamos contentes por isso. Obrigada e até à próxima.

Appartement conforme aux photos et extrêmement bien situé dans Porto  : emplacement calme et près de toutes commodités. Les prestations sont TOP : équipement, qualité de la literie, taille de la chambre,etc..
Fabio a été un hôte attentif, toujours disponible pour répondre à nos questions et très sympathique :)

Fabio is great host with kind attitude and was very kind to meet us at the flat even earlier than agreed check-in time. He gave us all the tips for our stay. Place itself is perfectly located to all the central attractions of the city, everything was very clean and smells nice, linens are fresh and the bed is very comfortable for a good rest after the long walks in lovely Porto city. I definitely recommend Fabio and his place to everyone.
Fabio is very welcoming and helpful and The appartment is great !

name: Amazing Ocean View Condo in Wailea!
summary: This amazing 3 bedroom/2 bath condo has +1,700 sq ft of living space with a huge wrap-around lanai for enjoying whale watching, ocean breezes, and beautiful sunsets. The condo has a warm inviting homey feel that appeals to both adults and children.

reviews.txt: Although a short stay, it was an unforgettable memory to our family. Good location, beautiful house, clean status, and all the convenient things. It was better than the photos. We enjoyed Maui so much. I wish I could come again. Thank you.

Jim was so welcoming and easy to work with! All instructions for check in and check out were provided early. He even sent me a welcome packet that gave lots of useful information for me to plan my trip. 
The condo itself was clean, spacious, and well-stocked. Our group of 8 had no issues fitting here. While you are required to post parking permits, I didn't have any difficulties having guests over for dinner after our long days. Our guests were all very impressed by how nice the condo was, especially considering the price we paid for it! 

All in all, I would love to be back and will recommend this condo to any of my friends looking to rent in Maui.

We had a wonderful stay in Wailea courtesy of Jim. His condo is one of the most tastefully decorated and well-appointed that we have stayed in anywhere.  Huge master bedroom and good sized 2nd and 3rd bedrooms (one with Queen, one with two twin beds). Great living space with a large lanai. Well supplied kitchen with everything that you could need if you want to cook in.

Parking right outside the door, walking distance to Ulea beach and a short drive to other beaches, great shopping and superb restaurants.

Jim couldn’t have been more friendly and easier to talk with, and was very accommodating of our travel schedule being a little out of sync with his standard check-in/out times.

Jim’s was one of the best places we have had the privilege of staying at and we highly recommend it

We had an awesome time at the condo! The location was really great and peaceful. Jim was very accommodating and allowed us an early check-in since we landed early. The condo slept 8 people easily and we had a great time lazing on the balcony enjoying the views. Would definitely recommend the place!

Fantastic location and Jim was great at communicating quickly and made the whole experience very smooth. The Condo was very clean and well presented. It is is a fantastic location, close to beach and shops with nice pools and security on site. I would recommend this as a great base to explore Maui.
Great place!

We were made to feel welcome right from the beginning.  The information provided was very helpful.  This a beautiful condo in a beautiful location.  I would definitely recommend this condo to everyone.  Very homey and has everything you could need.

We had an excellent time at Jim's condo. It was exactly as described! The master bed and bath were amazing! We had a larger group of people and were perfectly accommodated. Jim answered all of questions before & during the stay. Would definitely stay again.

Had an amazing time in Maui while staying at Jim's Condo. He was very responsive and accommodating during our stay. Great location and within walking distance to a nearby shopping mall with good eats. We borrowed the house's Road to Hana cd for our trip up the coast for an easy guided tour. There's a tennis club next door so if you enjoy tennis, this is an ideal place. Two pools very close to the condo with BBQ grills for use as well. All in all, we had an excellent time during our stay, with the help of Jim. Thanks for everything!!
The room is spacious, lots of beach accessories which are very helpful.
Great condo for a family getaway! Very clean, convenient location and comfortable accommodations! Beautiful view - great hosts!
Our stay and Jim's was amazing!! We felt right at home and it was perfect for a family vacation. We didn't need for anything. We will definitely be coming back

Jim's place was a very comfortable and relaxing place to stay in Wailea. Our family of 8 stayed comfortably in this condo, with the use of the fold out lounge, which was very comfortable. It was great to have access to beach umbrella's, chairs, boogie boards, snorkelling equipment, beach towels etc. when visiting from overseas. We were able to make the most of the beautiful beach in Wailea. We were able to park both of our hire cars right at the front door of the condo, which made getting around Maui so much easier. The condo is in a great location, only a 3 minute drive to the beach and a stroll to some great restaurants and shops. There is a supermarket 10 minutes up the road which was good to be able to make use of the fully equipped kitchen. The washing machine and dryer were a bonus. Jim was extremely efficient with all communications prior to and during our stay and made the entire trip a breeze. I would recommend this place for families wanting a relaxing holiday.
Jim's place was lovely! We felt so relaxed from the moment we walked in! Good way to start our trip :)
It was a fantastic stay and had a very comfortable condo.

We loved the condo and am so grateful Jim hosted us. We loved having all the space to ourselves and the condo provided a great view! The space was huge and perfect for large families and I appreciated the extras like beach chairs, umbrellas, and sand toys for our 4 year old. Communication was easy and the check in process was also easy. Overall we would definitely love to stay there again and recommend this place to family and friends! Mahalo Jim!

As you know, 3 br condos that are affordable are hard to come by in Maui. Jim's place was clean, easily accessible and offered many extra amenities (pool access, toys, washer/dryer, AC in each room, large lanai) that you don't realize are awesome until you actually have them! We would absolutely stay here again.
Beautiful, updated, well appointed and spacious home in a gorgeous, well maintained community. Anything you need is already here. Exactly as described and excellent communication with the host.
Great quality and host!

Would like to thank Mary and Jim for their wonderfully furnished and comfortable condo. 

Great access to the beach and restaurants; enjoyed the local golf courses, particularly the Emerald. Overall a great stay! 

Mahalo!

name: Eliseos Luxury Apartment HUTB-001281
summary: Beautiful 100m2 apartment decorated with designer furniture throughout. Large living room open kitchen area with bay window. It has 2 double & 1 single bedrooms & 2 full bathrooms. The master bedroom's ensuite leads to a large & sunny terrace. Centrally located, 1 block from Paseo de Gracia, restaurants, boutiques and bars within walking distance. Close to metro stations, bus stops, casa Batllò, La Pedrera etc Fully equipped kitchen- safe box. Ideal for families, groups or professionals

reviews.txt:
thank's for everything
it was

Absolutely wonderful place to stay at. Very nice location, and the apartment itself looks even better in real. 'Coming home' after a long day in Barcelona was always a pleasure.  Upon arrival we got a warm welcome and introduction to the apartment and the city itself. Very clean, no complaints whatsoever.

Two girlfriends and I had an amazing stay at Heike's flat in Barcelona. The location couldn't be better, just blocks from the main shopping & attractions street. It was spacious, clean and inviting and Heike was incredibly responsive throughout our stay. I would highly recommend and would see if it's available next time I'm in Barcelona - thank you Heike!

If we could have slept properly, I would have given it 4 or 5 stars. The location was amazing and made up for what the flat lacked in sound sleep and thorough cleanliness. Heike was great, however, and deserves a lot of credit!
Great apartment in an amazing location.
L emplacement de l appartement est idéal, bien centré et ds un superbe quartier. Par contre, logement tres bruyant, tant en journée que durant la nuiT.

The location of the house is very convenient and central. Walking distance to La Rambla and other shopping streets. The house has a nice small terrace to relax and enjoy your travelmates. We really enjoyed staying thank you!

Schwarz was right on time, although we had a late checkin and she was very helpful. The flat is really beautiful with a great terrace. Location is perfect if you want to be close to luxury shops and restaurants. I would definitely recommend to stay here...
Excellent location and lovely spacious apartment in Eixample area.  Large kitchen and living space for our family.  We hope to return again soon!  Heike was a fantastic host!
Beautiful apartment and great host

The apartment is exactly as the pictures show, we loved the place! It was very clean, comfortable, quiet and a great location. There is a small restaurant below the apartment, where every morning we enjoyed to get a quick coffee and breakfast. We highly recommend staying at this apartment!
Fantastic location. Great patio and apartment. Helpful hosts. Thanks Heike and Alex.
Tres bon séjour agrémenté par un logement agréable et un tres bon accueil ...

Apartamento lindo, grande, buen ubicado
Paseo de gracia a una cuadra, mejor imposible
Todo muy limpio y ordenado
No nos faltó nada! 
Heike, es súper recomendable!!!

Heike and Alex are great hosts to deal with  Very responsive to communications and quick to resolve any issues. Alex speaks perfect English! The two apartments that we experienced (Eliseo & Juliet) were very stylish and comfortable. Juliet is probably quieter amd more homely with fantastic artworks and a selection of books  Location is perfect for shopping at the best stores on Gracias. Very central to the major attractions too. The perfect apartments for those of us who enjoy something more spacious and luxouious  Five stars.

This place is awesome. Excellent location, pretty close to La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. Metro station at walking distance. Plenty of restaurants around. I was traveling with my family (wife and four kids) and Schwarz was a super host. She answered all my messages in minutes and at check in, she brought some chocolates for my kids, and some local food items (olive oil bottle, rice, chocolate and salt).

Great location for restaurants and shopping. Nice and large place for my friend and I. Very nice terrace area but this time of the season perhaps a bit coldish to take advantage of it. Heating works great!
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Booked for some colleagues to stay for a conference in Barcelona, great communication from the host
Great location, apartment, and hosts.  Highly recommended!

name: Brooklyn Artist Loft / Fun Location
summary: Private room can sleep 2, shared bathroom. Nice and quiet, private room in the back of the home. Great to have an extra bed for friends and family that may want to visit you for a nice week end). Table by window with two chairs and two dressers a comfortable chair and a big closet. This great for internships, actors and college grads. It has been used by nurses, actors, opera singers, med school interns. Plenty of privacy and good vibes. Long term private room rental with Wifi .

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: I enjoy meeting new people, I am very easy going and love to cook Italian food.  I welcome all my guests w a home cooked meal. I make really nice lasagna !  I work as a stand up comic and actor. I have few commercials on youtube. Love the Big Crunch and Joey Guacamole. My home is very colorful and full of good vibes. All my beds are comfortable with plenty of pillows. I give out subway maps and keys and explain to you how to get around the city. I will explain to you how to do 5 to 6 main attractions per day. This way you can really enjoy yourselves and take in the sites. A lot of free fun things to do. like walking over the Brooklyn Bridge,  and walking up into Chinatown and Little Italy.  Taking the free ferry to Staten Island, which takes you right by the Statue of Liberty ! Central Park and Times Square ! Museums and much much more. Fun and exciting. Pack your bags and welcome to my home. Happy Day !

reviews.txt: Joseph is an energetic, interactive and very solicitous host. When we arrived he had pizza, soup and dessert for us.  His home is very eclectic with many pictures of his family. On our second morning he fixed breakfast for us.  After finishing some dental work he allowed us to stay later than the usual checkout time.  He was very helpful with finding things, providing maps for us and recommendations for restaurants.

We had a great time at Joe's apartment:)
Joe was very helpful and make our journey easy.He took his time to give his advice and directions to places we like to go 
The room was comfy, food delicious, Joe thank you again for a great time :)))
Joe is the best host !!!!
Joseph was a great host! Had food ready when I arrived, gave tips about the area and what to see and do, made it easy and very welcoming. I would stay here again.

Joseph was a fantastic host! He offered to prepare dinner and breakfast, took me to the location of a half-marathon I was running nearby and stayed around until the end to cheer me on! I could not ask for a nicer host. Nothing to point out about the accommodations: cozy and tidy, everything was as described. I would certainly stay again with Joseph should I return to the area.
Joe's a great host. Makes food, tells stories, and keeps things running smoothly.

Joseph's home is BRIGHT and CHEERY and full of LIFE!  Everything is clean and placed well.  Joseph was very communicative, and went out of his way to meet me outside the building to help me when I first arrived.  He went beyond expectations to prepare a full dinner my first night, and was very patient with my ever-changing business trip requirements.

My business trip requirements changed, and Joseph was gracious enough to accommodate me to rent the room for an additional night, even though this placed him at some inconvenience with his own plans, and I definitely appreciate his flexibility and hospitality.

In all of NYC, I wound up having the best host. I am certain of it. I came to his wonderful apartment jet lagged & exhausted from a 36 hours of flight & travel time. He personally greeted me warmly with a comforting plate of Italian pasta with kidney beans and smoked cheese. It was quite good. He gave me all the subway info I needed easily, and all his info was accurate. As if this guy hadn't done more than enough already, he ended up giving me a pair of tennis shoes bc my luggage didn't make it and I had no shoes suitable for walking the streets of NY. This place is awesome. You should consider yourself lucky if he has an opening for you.

Joe is a nice host. We really enjoy our first airbnb stay with him. Clean room, tasty breakfasts, and even sweet gifts. Moreover, Joe is always willing to communicating and giving good tips for your travel in NYC. Highly recommend.
Excellent host, great human being, a lot of food and laughs shared.  Highest recommendations for AirBNB stays in NYC.

Joseph is an awesome host. He always had breakfast and clean towels. He's a trip & makes you laugh and helps you find anything that you need. It was well worth the stay, well worth the pay and I feel like I made a friend. I can't wait to go back to the city and stay with Joseph again.

I cannot say enough about Joseph as a host. His apartment is AMAZING, he provided wonderful food and he was so friendly. We spent some time together and had a blast. I am looking forward to a return visit. I highly recommend Joe as a host!

Handsome Joe Hanley is not only a gracious host with a nice place, but a great cook, a funny stand-up comic, and a wonderful guide for bay ridge and beyond. Truly one of the kindest people I've ever stayed with, he put up with me for a whole month and was truly above and beyond the whole time! Thanks for the good food and good memories!

name: MONTJUIC FOUNTAINS APARTMENT
summary: Excellent apartment situated opposite Barcelona Fair and Conference Centre complex.

host.about:
Barcelona Bedroom es una pequeña empresa familiar con más de 50 apartamentos propios repartidos por toda la cuidad de Barcelona.
Estaremos encantados de recibirte y ayudarte en todo lo necesario para que que tengas una agradable estancia. No dudes en contactar con nosotros. Gracias y esperamos verte pronto.


Un saludo!

reviews.txt: We were 4 people on business travel and the place was absolutely perfect! Clean, quiet (nothing if you want to party), central and a fantastic view and surrounding.

Very bright and clean apartment in front of the Fira Center and next to the Crown Plaza it can't be more convenient for a business trip. The view is very nice and all rooms and bedrooms are very practical.

Hola,

El apartamento está en general muy bien. En nuestra opinión se nota que es una empresa de apartamentos y no una casa de un particular. Muy mal que para un apartamentos de 6 personas sólo den un juego de llaves! 
Estaría bien que hubieran dejado los mínimo: Papel higiénico suficiente, agua, café.

Great apartment set in the heart of Barcelona and just a stone's throw from Espana Plaza. Apartment is spacious with everything we needed. Clean, great views of the city and close to transport links. Host was fantastic at allowing us to extend our stay by a day and have lots of great tips on how to explore the city. Barcelona was amazing and will definitely come back - would stay here again in a heartbeat.

L'appartement est très bien situé, bien desservi par les transports en commun.
Il est bien entretenu, et propre.Il offre une belle vue à toutes les fenêtres ( fontaines de Montjuic, centre de Barcelone). L'ascenceur est pratique pour l'appartement qui est au 6ème étage. Il y a tous les commerces nécessaires à proximité.

Par contre, l'isolation par les fenêtres et à revoir car on entend beaucoup les bruits de circulation de la rue qui est passagère y compris la nuit. On ne peut pas remonter les volets jusqu'en haut sinon, ils se coincent. Dans une des salles de bains, il y a toujours une odeur d'égout.

всем привет) отличное месторасположение!заселили раньше чем указано,не пришлось где то сидеть и ждать с чемоданами-спасибо!))) кому нужен тихий сон,данный вариант не подойдёт! остекление очень тонкое, окна на проезжую часть,ночью шумно от машин!будет проблема,если вы приедите , как мы большой компанией 5 человек, установлен маленький бойлер для  воды, приходилось ждать , когда вода нагреется! хороший сигнал интернета! прекрасные живописные виды из окон! 10-15 минут пешком до старого города!   в общем данный вариант оставил положительное впечатление! спасибо))))

This apartment and the surrounding area were great and very comfortable.  We were greeted well when we arrived and the host is very professional.  Also, the area was easy to make daily excursions around Barcelona from.    I was surprised to find that the kitchen didn't have an oven though.

Firstly the accomadation is in a really fantastic location with special views of the city - if you dont mind being a little bit out of the downtown. Easy walk to metro in 5mins. The instructions on how to get to accomodation and the process is super clear and professional. Call as soon as you land as taxi only takes max 20 mins. Appeared that host is not the actual home owner but rather part of a management company - not relevant for appartment. Kitchen had all utensils required but no basics such as sugar,salt etc. Good space in the appartment for a group and a great sitting room. Take note of late arrival charges - they are communicated in listing. Panorama view of Tibidabo hill is fantastic and location again great if you dont need to be ultra central.

Excellent communication and very easy to find. Clean and spacious apartment with great views. Maybe one or two chairs and one sharp knife would be nice but everything else is OK and we would definitely come here again.
This apartment was a wonderful place for our stay, the apartment was very clean, space full and perfectly situated.

Not much contact with the host, but when needed was eay to get hold of. The Neighbor hood is very nice, with a few Supermarkets & Cafe's around. 

Relatively easy to get a Taxi as they wait beside the hotel down the road. Place was clean and tidy and I would definitely recommend.

We were phones on the day we we travelling to confirm our arrival time. We were met at the door as we turned up. The flat was ready and we were quickly checked. Efficient, proactive and friendly service - I couldn't fault it
The host was very kind and helpful. The apartment is really good located for those who come to sight see Barcelona

This is a great apartment in an amazing location. The stay is overall very comfortable and I would stay there again. Having said that, there were a few things to note for improvement, but not deal breakers for me: 

1. we stayed a week and ran out of toilet paper on day 3. we were informed that we need to supply our toilet paper. not an expensive buy, but the inconvenience of having to worry about that was not pleasant.
2. the smell of cigarette smoking from other apartments in the building kept coming in through the heating vents, i had to open the windows to air the rooms every few hours. This was certainly unpleasant, but i guess it could happen anywhere.
3. as others mentioned, sometimes smells were noticed in the bathrooms - it happened randomly through the day. i guess the building;s vent systems are not great.

again, these were minor things. we felt very comfortable otherwise. we also really appreciated the view and the location. the beds were comfortable too.
Perfect location at 5 min walk from Plaça Espagna, beautiful view, clean rooms, a very good experience!
Casa amplia y cómoda con excelente ubicación

Ne cherchez pas le 1 de la rue, c'est au 1 bis. retard de l'hôte et accueil assez glacial. Il ne répond aux appels que par textos. Assez bruyant et des améliorations sont à apporter dans l'ensemble. Odeurs désagréables dans les salles de bain. Cependant, l'appartement est bien situé et nous a permis de passer un séjour agréable. Idéal pour un très court séjour. A recommander pour le feu d'artifice du 31 décembre, vous y avez accès depuis les chambres comme s'il était tiré spécialement pour vous.
This apartment is beautiful and spacious, its the perfect size for a larger group of people. Beautiful view of Barcelona. We really enjoyed our stay
Meticulously clean, perfectly located, and a large comfortable apartment. It was perfect for us.

Great apartment, excellent location near Plaça Espanya, just a few steps from the Magic Fountains and the Museu Nacional d'Art de Catalunya.  Everything was as expected, very clean, very comfortable, nice view from the kitchen window.  Check-in process was fast and smooth.  It is located on a SIXTH floor, but the building has an elevator for 3 people.  Shower cabin in one of the bathrooms is very small, if you are a medium sized man, you will have some troubles.  But anyway, this is one of the few things you have to live with when you travel.  If I return to Barcelona, I would definitely consider this apartment again.

name: Nişantaşı, safe, quality area.Very close to metro.
summary: Richest and safest place of Turkey. U can walk to the best restaurants and world brands for shopping. Free Concierge, Free Airport Transfer and Free Unused Towel Set.We are located at Nişantaşı which is the safest area in the center of Istanbul, famous for best shops, coffees, restaurants, bars and clubs.Abdi Ipekci Street where Louis Vuitton, Rolex, Prada, Armani is only 3 minutes by walking.City`s Shopping Center, American Hospital and Macka Park and Metro are only 5 minutes by walking.55m².

reviews.txt: Nice apartment in probably the best neighbourhood with a lot if restaurants and shopping possibilities close by. It's of advantage (or even necessary) to speak Turkish for communicating with the host at the location! Problems like no wifi or electricity are common

the host always try their best to fulfill our request and are very quick to supply them like vacuum cleaner, ironing board etc, the very next day. Good location , few groceries stores and a mall near by, also a playground for children to play
It was a nice experience to stay there .. good location

I booked three apartments and they were nice and clean, some things were missing but they provided them once we asked.  The host (Enis) was great too. 

The location is excellent!
The area is nice and owners provide timely help when needed. The place is clean and decent.
We rented this place to be closer to family and downtown Nisanrasi. It was an amazing spot very convenient. Clean and new apartment. Highligh suggested.

name: BEST HOME in the BlueMosq area!
summary: - Best location in the old city touristic center! - Washing Machine, Dish washer, Microwave and fully equipped with the daily basic needs! - 125sqm, Sapacious and comfortable! - Brand new, Neat n Clean! - 3Bed Rooms, 1 Hall room, 2 shower n toilet

host.about:
We, Ali & Argen, are two young enthusiasts who love Istanbul. We are both university graduates and currently studying MS in İstanbul Universities you probably have not heard :) We have been living here for more than 10 years. During those years we have worked in different sectors of tourism and gained a great experience (as a guide, receptionist, interpreter, seller of turkish delight in Eminonu) We are eager to do our best to make you feel home. Hope you will enjoy your stay with us here in Istanbul. Take care and see you.
Argen & Ali

reviews.txt: We stayed at very nice apartment, well located in Istanbul's Old City, near many attractions and restaurants. We felt very safe and comfortable.
Fantastic place. Value for money. Very clean, excellent location, will recommend using again. Our host Ali was fantastic too bloke.
Great location. Outstanding hospitality.

We (just like lots of others hosted by the boys) ended up with another apartment. 
That being said, the pace we were given was large, very clean, in a perfect location.

Огромное спасибо Али! Отличная квартира! отличное расположение. 7-10 минут до Голубой мечети и основных  исторических достопримечательностей. Очень дружелюбное отношение: встретили, разрешили оставить чемоданы до время заселения, очень чистая квартира, большая обеденная зона. Мы ездили с подругами - 8 девушек. всего хватило) всё понравилось) от души рекомендую!
That flat was on the first floor but clean and nice and very spacious, it is next to the blue mosque and the tram. Loved the place and the location

Location is good. (Entire are is on up hill_historical places also are in up hill) Amenities are good, Ali and his partner are well behaved. Any one can select this property without any hesitation. (Except one wash room small, kitchen is small)

The location of this house and the hospitality of the host (Ali) cannot be beat. The best host I have ever had among my stays at airbnb homes. The house is within walking distance of blue mosque, grand bazaar, and many shops. 
We really enjoyed our stay at this house.
The host canceled this reservation 95 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Verifiquen que les estan entregando el apartamento que efectivamente contrataron. Comi anfitriones son excepcionales gran seres rumanos.

This place was great! Extremely homey, easy check-in, a beautiful 5 minute walk from the tram that connects most of the must-see tourist attractions, and Ali was extremely nice and helpful
Special thanks to Ali and Argen
Ali的房子位置非常棒,因为在高地,出门就可以看到远处的大海;出门走5分钟就可以到蓝色清真寺,附近还有各个景点,非常方便;因为在老城区,房子不新,但还干净,作为旅途中休息的地方,已经很不错了;房子附近有土耳其餐厅和中餐,很方便;最让我们印象深刻的是我们入住和离开时,因为我们人多,行李也多,Ali专门安排了两个人帮我们搬行李,谢谢Ali

The property is in an outstanding location for anybody who wants to see the highlights of Istanbul. Ali was an outstanding host arranging airport transfers and providing so many helpful suggestions on what to see and do. You cannot go wrong with booking this property.
The place was clean in a great location. Perfect communication and well organized.

When we ariived, Ali and his friend helped us with our luggage’s and gave us information about the city and places to visit. His place was very close to Blue mosque, restaurant, and many attractions. Ali was very quick with communication through (Hidden by Airbnb) . He was very respectful and nice. His friend even helped us take our luggage’s to a new apartment that was 5-10 minute walk. 

The reason why I give this a three star is because it was not as advertised. The number of bedrooms, bathroom, and pictures did not match. Also, they were queens size beds and not king. 
2 bedroom had 1 Queen bed 
1 bedroom had 1 Queens and 1 twin bed 
And rest were sofa beds. 

And one full bathroom and 1 was half bathroom (only toilet and sink) 
 
Another reason I give this place a three star was the fact it was cleaned only once in our entire 1 week stay. 


Other than that this place was great.

Ali was an awesome host. He went out of his way to make sure our family was comfortable. There was this tea kettle that my mom and I loved at his apartment, and I wasn't able to find it anywhere, so he went out and bought it for us! He was always there for communication and tips on where to go and what to eat. My niece was sick, so he even took my brother to the hospital and had her checked up. He stayed with him until they were discharged. If I could recommend a place to stay to atone visiting Turkey, it would be with Ali and Argen. Thank you for making our stay easier in a foreign country!

Ali was superb and he really took good care of us.
The apartment was old but fine, really well located and clean.
I recommend without  a doubt to rent with Ali & Argen.
Thanks for everything.
It was a perfect place it is a very clean and lovely

name: ORM - Chã 02 Apartment
summary: Studio on the 2nd floor of a 4-storey, fully rehabilitated for touristic rental due to its prime location in the historic center of Porto, within the limits of the wall "Muralha Fernandina", 1 minute walking from the Cathedral and Luís I Bridge.  It has 2 single beds, 1 bathroom with shower, fully equipped kitchen, living room with sofa a double bed and a balcony with a wonderful view of Sé, Porto's Cathedral. Ideal for 1 - 4 persons. Prices vary according to the seasons.

host.about:
Four friends, a lot of dreams, a common path

Oporto Rental Management was created in 2015 by the wishes of four young friends: Rosa, Tania, Igor and Nuno. The ORM was born of the combination of the main passions of its founders: the city of Porto and its cultural characteristics; the architecture and decoration; the gastronomy and photography and, above all, the contact with different cultures.

The project is based on the support and guidance of property owners located in the center of the city who want to direct their homes to the tourism market.

It also involves the design and decoration of these same spaces, giving them a unique identity that translates into the extremely positive reaction of our guests.
Our project culminates in the total management of the property, which includes the organization and preparation of these spaces for the tourist rental.
So with our dedication and daily work we have been able to please our guests who show the highest intention of repeating their experiences with our team. 
In addition, besides the management, we are responsible for the constant guests' contact and that we privelege the personalized accompaniment - what distinguishes us and allows us a greater proximity to the diverse cultures.

-------

Quatro amigos, muitos sonhos, um caminho em comum

Oporto Rental Management surgiu em 2015 pela vontade de quatro jovens amigos: a Rosa, a Tânia, o Igor e o Nuno. A ORM nasce da combinação das principais paixões dos seus fundadores: a cidade do Porto e as suas características culturais; a arquitetura e decoração; a gastronomia e fotografia e, acima de tudo, o contacto com diversas culturas. 

O projeto baseia-se no apoio e orientação de proprietários de imóveis localizados no centro da cidade que pretendam direcionar as suas casas para o mercado do turismo.
Envolve ainda a conceção e decoração destes mesmos espaços, conferindo-lhes desta forma, uma identidade única que se traduz na reação extremamente positiva dos nossos hóspedes. 
O nosso projeto culmina na gestão total do imóvel, que inclui a organização e a preparação destes espaços para o arrendamento turístico. 
Assim, com a nossa dedicação e trabalho diários temos vindo a conseguir conquistar todos quantos nos visitam e que demonstram a maior intenção de repetir as suas experiências com a nossa equipa. 
Acrescentamos ainda que além da gestão somos responsáveis pelo contacto constante com os nossos hóspedes e que prezamos o acompanhamento personalizado - o que nos distingue e nos permite uma maior proximidade com as diversas culturas.

reviews.txt: Foi uma estada maravilhosa. O apartamento, o local e os anfitriões nos proporcionaram dias inesquecíveis no Porto. Recomendadíssimo!!!

We had a perfect stay in the clean, quiet and new appartment. The appartment is nicely decorated, the airco works perfect and the beds are good. ORM was very accomodating in prolonging our check out time and arranging our tour on the douro river. The location is very central and or top of a hill. It's very close to the top platform of the Luis I bridge which give you the most beautyfuI view over the city and the river. The downhill walk to the Ribeira riverside is nice and just 5-10 Minutes. To go up, you can take the funiculaire which stops 2 minutes from the front door. Every other sight is also in walking distance. l would stay here again !!
Great venue in the middle of the town!

It was one of the best apartment we stayed! The flat was as nice as very convenient, also only a few minutes  from the most popular places to visit. Many thanks to host, who provided us information we needed before and during our trip.  Strongly recommending this place for your staying in Porto.

Our stay at ORM's apartment in Porto was wonderful!! The apartment was centrally located, very clean and modern, and the team was a pleasure to communicate with. We would highly recommend this place for anyone staying in Porto!

L'appartement est très bien situé, proche de tout, notamment de la gare et des arrêts de bus. Magasins d'alimentation à proximité, fermant tard le soir. 
L'accueil a été sympa et efficace. Igor et son équipe sont très réactifs, sur place les jours de la semaine ce qui facilite les choses. Nous avons eu une réponse rapide et efficace à toutes nos questions.
L'apparement correspond aux photos. Bon à savoir : la salle de bain est petite et n'a pas beaucoup de rangement et le salon manque un peu de mobilier si quelqu'un y dort.
Great apartment! Recently removated, walking distance from all atractions and very nice staff. Will definetly recommend to friends and family.

El apartamento está  muy bien, cerca de todo, la única pega es que la presión del agua es totalmente insuficiente en el lavabo y en la ducha. Las personas que nos recibieron, muy amables. Las camas comodísimas. Oporto precioso.

Nous avons été très satisfaits de cet appartement qui est en tout point conforme à la description.  Très bonne situation, tout peut se faire à pied.  Nos hôtes nous ont réservé un super accueil avec plein d’explications sur les sites à visiter. Nous avons pris l’option petit déjeuner amené chaque matin par Pédro et sa bonne humeur. Une adresse à retenir. Merci à nos hôtes.

Our stay with ORM was very pleasant. They gave us a very nice welcome and informed us very well about the city itself. The apartment was just like the pictures and the neighborhood in which the apartment was located was also very nice. We really enjoyed our stay and they really deserve their 5 stars!

The apartment is cosy, modern and equipped with everything one needs for a short-time stay. Moreover the location could barely be better. Communication was clear, pleasant and without any problem. Perfect for single or couples. Gladly again.

When we arrived at the apartment, we immediatly got a lot of information about Porto by our host. If we had questions during our stay, we could always got in contact with them and got a quick respond.

The apartment itself was really great, you could find everything you could ever need. It was very clean and spacious.

We would definitely come back to this apartment when visiting Porto and recommend it to all our friends! We had a great stay.

When we arrived and the airport, the taxi driver was waiting for us. We had a warm welcome. If we needed something, we could ask anytime. The apartment was clean. You have everything what you need. The location of the apartment is perfect. You can go everywhere by walk. Near the station, shops,.. 
We had a great time here!

L'appartement était vraiment bien, disposant de tout le confort.
Il était par ailleurs bien placé, nous avons pu faire toutes nos visites à pieds.
Un grand merci à Tania qui a tjrs été disponible et à Bruno (je crois) pour son accueil et ses explications/conseils.

Nice location and nice place!!
Totally recommend!!

Excellent séjour dans cette belle ville de Porto! L'appartement est idéalement situé, très calme et très bien équipé. Il est en tout point conforme aux photos et à la description. Les hôtes ont été à l'écoute et nous ont donnée d'excellents conseils (restaurants, visites, lieux incontournables...). Je n'hésiterai pas une seule seconde à les conseiller à des amis!

Siisti ja toimiva asunto erittäin keskeisellä paikalla! Vaikka liikenteen ja rakennustöiden melu oli kadulla päivisin kovaa, ei sisälle kuulunut ääniä juuri lainkaan. Mukavat isännät olivat hyvin tavoitettavissa. Wi-fi toimi moitteettomasti ja TV:ssä oli paljon kanavia. Moderni ja laadukas sisustus.

Escogí este alojamiento para mis padres durante su estancia en Oporto por su situación y características. Desde que han vuelto solo he oído cosas buenas del apartamento. Su ubicación ha resultado ser perfecta encontrándose a muy pocos pasos de la mayoría de lugares interesantes que descubrir de esta ciudad. Prácticamente al lado de la Catedral de Oporto y a unos minutos de la preciosa Plaza de la Ribera.

Por su parte la atención ha sido inmejorable, ofreciendo información, tours, recogida y traslados al aeropuerto e incluso servicios de desayuno en caso de que te interese.

Sin duda recomendaría este apartamento
Lugar fantástico , atención fantástica , ubicación inmejorable! 100% recomendable! Gracias y hasta la próxima!

The apartment was really nice and perfectly located! in the middle of the old town, just next to the Dom Luis bridge, it couldn't have been better!
The communication with the ORM team was great!
I would definitively recommend this place and would love to stay here again for my next visit!

name: Studio convenient to CBD, beaches, street parking.
summary: It is a spacious basement studio with a small kitchen.  It has its own external entrance, but is attached to our home.  For the best views feel free to use our table on the shared verandah. Close to Harbour beaches and beautiful walks, and Direct buses to the city run at least two times an hour in both directions. Shops and restaurants are walking distance. There is plenty of on-street parking.

host.about: We are a family of four (Two teens).  We love meeting our Airbnb guests and sharing our favourite places to eat, travel, hike, cycle, or sight see in Sydney.  We are originally from the US, but have lived here for over 10 years.

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 73 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

super comfortable room, great location (few min from manly wharf by bus or a fantastic walk on manly scenic walk). Safe neighbourhood and quiet. Leslie and Eric are great people and have a great family. Thanks very much!  I look forward to catching up again next time I am in Sydney. Elias
We spend  4 perfect days ! Helpfull and guestfull !  I recommande !

We were warmly welcomed as friends when we arrived. It was very easy to talk with Leslie and Eric. The beds were very comfortable and the bathroom was clean, the shower was very good. The location was very handy to the remarkable Manly and the ferries allowed us to get to the city. The weather was lovely warm during our stay. the views from the balcony was spectacular.
Very clean and confortable. Nice view on the bay.

The home, location and experience staying with Leslie and her family for 2 nights far exceeded our expectations. We had a fabulous introduction to Sidney, as this was our first visit to the area. The home was as described and her family was gracious, engaging and very helpful. We will return without a question the next opportunity that we have to visit the Sidney area!
Thank you Leslie!

Leslie, Eric and your family are lovely people. we have provided anything we needed. their home is very spacious fit to stay whether on holiday or for work. the bus stop is within walking distance from home. Balgalowah is very beautiful and is very close to Manly. Thank you!

Great house with an amazing view over Manly Harbour, lovely room and Leslie and her family made us feel at home. They gave us everything we needed including the Opal cards.
A bit far from the city but was worth it for the quality and price!
Leslie and her family were very welcoming and the accomodation was perfect for me. I stayed 2 nights on business and would happily stay again.

Leslie's place is located in a quiet and family friendly suburb not too far from Manly and the city. The room, located in the basement, is large, with lots of privacy. The house has an incredible harbour/ocean view. Leslie and her family are friendly and full of character. We would definitely suggest this accomodation to anyone visiting Sydney.
Fantastic area in manly with great beaches and towns. Easy access to city and a nice breakfast included!
Loved it. Great family home

Die Unterkunft ist in gute Lage, nahe zu Hotspot von Manly. Die Fotos zeigen die schöne Aussicht auf das Meer, dich das ist nicht diejenige vom Zimmer aus. Dieses hat gar keine Aussicht / Fenster 
Es gibt einige Verbeserungsmöglichkeiten
Value for money stay in a lovely house. Leslie made us feel very welcome and a fantastic base for exploring Sydney.
We stayed 2night in Leslie's accommodation,it was a lovely place. Leslie was really friendly and we appreciated the accommodation and what a beautiful view.

Spacious self-contained apartment and wonderfully hosted. Leslie and her family were very welcoming, and offered next level service in a stunning location. Having breakfast on their balcony, overlooking the water and moored boats was a highlight of my trip. I will definitely stay again, thank you for the toothpaste rescue!!
Very lovely home with a beautiful view of the harbour . Would recommend to anyone visiting sydney.

Leslie's place was very nice, spacious, and clean! The whole bottom floor made it feel as if it were our own place, and it was nice to meet others from Texas while traveling. Would highly recommend if in the north!
Excellent host and a spacious room with a great view with the harbour! Convenient to get around with a car too.

Leslie's family home is close to the bus line and ferry; an hour ride from the airport and a thirty minute commute to Sydney Harbor.   The room has plenty of sleeping quarters, the bathroom is stocked with all essentials (shampoo, conditioner, body  wash, hair dryer), and  breakfasts are light and delicious.   Having a refrigerator, microwave,tea and coffee pot are helpful; and a washing machine within the unit is terrific.  The family accommodated all are requests; we traveled some days as two persons and some days we had three persons.  Leslie helped us with restaurant suggestions and paths to walk.

name: Cozy Chinatown studio apartment
summary: Neighborhood feels like old New York, the last authentic part of Manhattan. Our cozy studio apartment comfortably fits 2 ppl. 10 minute walk to LES, SoHo, TriBeca, South street seaport and great restaurants and bars nearby. Very close to B,D,F trains. A,C,E,4,5,6 also walking distance.

host.location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.txt: Maia's description of her studio flat is perfectly accurate. It is very cozy, well-located and is really in such a vibrant area of NYC and the last part of Manhattan that hasn't been gentrified - offering a truly unique and authentic experience. The flat is a good sized studio (the pictures make it look smaller than it is) and is well-equipped. Maia was a fantastic host - leaving a bag of wonderful coffee, excellent local recommendations and responding promptly to all of our queries. The flat is great and I recommend it to all. I stayed there with a close friend and it was easy to share the space and it served us well.

Awesome gem in a great neighborhood. Really cute and tidy place - has everything you want, including a small kitchen. Perfect for a couple wanting to be close to the city but in a unique neighborhood. F train is super close. Highly recommended - would stay there again!
Great place

The location was absolutely perfect and very central. Maia and her husband were very gracious and helpful whether that be suggesting a nice restaurant to offering to let me store my luggage in their home past checkout time. Would suggest as a nice place for singles/couples who would like to be in a authentic part of town!
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 68 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is an amazing place! Much bigger than it looks in the photos. Great New York neighborhood. Clean and open and bright. Maia could not have been a more gracious host. Magical little space. I highly recommend.

This apartment is a gem and Maia was a nice host. I stayed for five nights while in NY for work. It was under 30 minutes to get to my office at Union Square. The apartment was comfortable and was perfect for this trip. I would recommend this for anyone who appreciates a quiet space to retreat to at the end of the day.
This was an incredible value for being right in Lower Manhattan! Great for a young married couple looking for a weekend getaway!
Great studio apartment in china town. Clean, with everything you need and Maia was a perfect host. Would definitely recommend. Thanks for having us! Kat and James

Maia's studio is so cute and cozy.  The apartment is very well designed and even though it is small it does not feel that way!  Everything was super clean and Maia greeted me on the street to show me around right as I got out of the taxi from the airport!

Maia & Peter’s place was a great stay for four nights in Chinatown. The apartment was really cosy and well decorated. They were both excellent hosts, and responded to any messages quickly. Definitely a great place to stay to see ‘real’ New York City! ✨

It’s in a quieter part of town, great studio in NY. Maia had everything we needed. We didn’t want to be in the middle of it all but still easy to get everywhere and that was great. If you don’t mind stairs this is perfect.
The bed is comfy too and she was very communicative when we needed. Also super accommodating to our arrival, as we did have a flight delay. Highly recommend if your looking for a great value and clean place.

Maia’s place is like the pictures and description: light, friendly, and with a comfortable bed. It is close to subway stations, around the corner from Brooklyn bridge and in the middle of Chinatown. Little Italy and Soho are within walking distance. Chinatown, and the rest of the city, are lively and busy so it was nice to come ‘home’ in Maia’s appartement.
You get what you spend.
Great stay! Maia’s appartement is very well located and well furnished.

Everything in Maia’s apartment is very nice. It’s bigger than on the pictures and the subway is very close (F train).
Maia was very helpful and check in was easy. Would definitely recommend.

This is a great apartment to explore the city from. The neighbourhood is such that you have lots of cheap delicious food all around you and beautiful views of the bridge. The F train is close and the neighbourhood that surrounds the apartment is still an authentic part of New York City, including with all its grit and grime. The tall ceilings of the apartment make it feel very airy and spacious and it stays cool even when its warm out because it is in the back of the building. Its a great space to unwind and rest from all the hubbub outside. Not for parties or the heavy footed as neighbours can be sensitive.

This apartment was an excellent place to stay! We stayed here for 5 nights, 6 days. It was very convenient to trains and multiple neighborhoods/attractions. 
Maia was quick with her responses and went out of her way to do what she could to make us feel welcome. 

Great space for couples to utilize!
Maia was a great host! Would definitely stay here again :)

name: Room Close to LGA and 35 mins to Times Square
summary: A private small bedroom in a 2 BR 1BA apartment. There’s no living area as I converted to live in. The location is 2 minutes to Q33 bus stop, 5 minutes to 7 train station ( which directly takes you to Times Square in 35-40 minutes ).

host.location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.txt: Host was wonderful. She and her husband were awesome host with nothing strict. they volunteered to send me off knowing i have many baggage. i would love to stay with her if given the chance again and at this price. its a steal folks in NYC. love the pet as well, furry and fun
房东人很好,入住前很认真的打扫了卫生｡房源信息描述准确｡有毛巾和洗发水沐浴露提供｡街区很安静,离地铁站比较近｡
Wonderful stay at Cheer s apartment, the room is cozy and clean. Cheer and her roommates showed great hospitality. I had great time talk with them.

It's an amazing place to stay in New York, Cheer and her husband were really welcoming and answered all my queries quickly, they even helped me with all the touristy things and all.
