I am an easy going person. I love to travel, learning different cultures, meeting with new people from all around the world. I have travelled around 40 countries. I would like to travel more.

I love to enjoy having quality time with people. I love to explore new experiences. I like going out with friends, tasting different food, participate concerts. 

I am a finance professional. I work for a multinational retail company.

reviews.txt: I had to sleep on a couch instead of private room which I booked before and paid for it. Because there were another couple who have booked room before and wanted to extend their accommodation after booking room from Airbnb. So also he was renting house to people after meeting with them on Airbnb and not keeping his promises. Entering house was horrible because he gaved room another people there were no enough keys, I had to wait for them on the door for long time and it happened couple times. Bathroom was not clean and in the shared living room which I had to sleep was noisy and dirty smelled. I am sorry that I couldn't be able to write a command about room that I've booked..

Engin's place is located in very nice neighborhood, near to all amenities, personnaly! it was a big pleasure to meet Engin, he made us to feel such as we are in our home, he's helpful, and a cultivated person! I hope I could get another trip to his beautiful city. Thank you Engin.

Engin fue muy amable y flexible con nosotros. Tuvimos una buena charla sobre la vida. Su casa es muy grande y cuenta con todo lo necesario para hospedarse.
Muy recomendado

Anadolu yakasında işiniz var ise yer anlamında ve fiyat/kalite anlamında tercih edilesi bir konaklama. Bina eski fakat evin içinde bir dökülme söz konusu değil. Banyo/tuvalet, mutfak ve yatak odası hem temizlik açısından hem de malzemeler (tuvalet kağıdı, sabun, duş, kahve, bardak, su, temiz çarşaf, havlu ve battaniye vs.) anlamında yeterliydi.

name: Inner City Spacious Loft- City View
summary: This beautiful, sunny loft room is on the top floor of a three storey free-standing terrace in Redfern. The room is very spacious, private, quiet and open. We are a family of 4 adults and will give you as much privacy or company as you would like.

host.about:
I am a retired solicitor living in our home with my wife Judith who is a high school French teacher. Currently two of our three grown-up children live with us and we have a spare room. We have always had guests in our house since the children were very little and it is something that we would like to continue doing as I believe connecting with other people and learning about different cultures is wonderful. 
We love film, food, travel and music. This is a very musical household. Sport is also a very big thing- you will always find somebody watching the tennis/cricket/football on the television or going for a wok or bike ride. 
We ourselves love Airbnb and have used it all over the world in recent years. In Canada, France, South America and of course all around here in Australia. 
My life motto: you could die tomorrow so live life to the full!

reviews.txt:
Besides the location is very convent not only near the city center but also surrounded by 2 Coles market. This is the most fantastic and lovely experience I ever had.
Paul and his family are very good at taking care of their guests, they prepare milk, honey, orange, cereal for us. During the 2 weeks, they just treat us as same as a part of the family, inviting us to their festival dinner, introducing us to their best friends. Every morning they would ask if it was a good sleep. Every evening, they would say good night before we go back to the room. 
If ever I will go back to Sydney again, this would be my only choice. 

这是我在Airbnb中最最满意的一次住宿体验｡
不仅仅这个地理位置很好,去市中心,悉尼歌剧院,门口的公交车直达｡而且周围的配套设施齐全,十分方便｡
Paul一家人待客非常之好,如若对待家人｡一直给我们买牛奶,橙汁,谷物,蜂蜜等等｡尽可能地提供信息帮助我们｡
只要去悉尼,对于住处,这永远会是我的第一,也是唯一的选择｡

Paul, Judith et ses enfants nous ont très bien reçus, la maison est agréable, le jardin également. La chambre est spacieuse, lumineuse et au calme. Le quartier est bien desservi en bus et proche de cafés, restaurants. La famille nous a très bien conseillé sur Sydney et ils sont très attentionnés. Nous avons même eu de la baguette au petit dej! Merci encore de nous avoir accueillies, c'était très bien!
I had a lovely stay at Paul and Judith's beautiful home. The house is in a great area and as hosts Paul and Judith were extremely hospitable.

Paul and his family were incredibly welcoming, hospitable and really helpful as I started to find my feet in Sydney. The room was lovely and spacious with a very comfy bed. The family were always happy to chat and share a meal but likewise you could have your own space if needed. I cannot recommend this Airbnb more highly.

Paul was not there to receive us , however he got his son, Tim to help us with the check in procedures. Both Tim and Nicole are very helpful and friendly, sharing with us food places around the vicinity.  

The city is easily accessible from the place.
There are lots of food choices in the location as well. 

The room and toilet is true to picture, it was really comfortable and spacious. We enjoyed our stay there.

We especially love the two dogs; really friendly and cute:)

We had a wonderful time at Paul and Judith's lovely, spacious and peaceful home. We were well looked after by Nicola and Tim in Paul and Judith's absence and enjoyed having their home for us alone. We felt very much at home, enjoyed a cosy room upstairs and the location was perfect for my work and close to some wonderful cafes and bakeries in Redfern and Surry Hills. Paul and Judith were especially kind to send me something that I unfortunately left behind. Truly generous hosts and we can absolutely recommend anyone to stay at their beautiful home!!

Paul and his lovely family were very hospitable and more than accommodating. Everything from the room to the kitchen to the rest of the house had personality, charm and above all, a wonderful homey atmosphere. The best part about our stay was Judith's (Paul's wife) excellent selection of coffee and of course, their two very friendly dogs.

Beautiful house in a great location of Sydney. The room was very nice, clean and tidy, in a private spot of the house on the top floor. Also, guests have their own bathroom.

My mom and a friend stayed with Paul and his family and I also had the pleasure to meet him one day.

Paul is a great host, very hospitable and absolutely helpful, it was great staying with him! 

Thanks so much for letting them have a great time in Sydney :)

A lovely family,  very friendly and welcoming. We felt comfortable as being in our home. Excellent location with good transport connections. City centre and Airport 15 minutes faraway. Wonderful dogs, we loved stay with them because they are easygoing and affectionate
Judith and family were wonderful hosts. Great location and very comfortable room .

Perfect location for an affordable stay in Sydney! Grocery, liquor, and pharmacy  nearby, and commute to Circular Quay or Central train station is easy with a 5 minute walk to 2 different bus stops. Additionally, an Uber to the airport from this location can cost less than public transit! The space is great for single or couple use, with a comfy bed to fall into after a day of sightseeing. The family is very welcoming and resourceful if you need help with anything. The dogs are a great bonus, if you're pet lovers like us. Judith was very flexible with our arrival time considering our flight schedules which made logistics that much easier.

We spent 10 days at Paul's and Judith's house and felt welcomed from the very first moment. The house is very nice and in a great location. There're many restaurants around and a bus stop just by the corner. The room and bathroom are  spacious, clean and nicely decorated.
Paul and Judith, as well as the rest of the family, were very nice, friendly and interesting to talk to. They also gave us many tips about things to do and places to visit in Sydney. We shared many good times with them and we would definitely book this room again.
Highly recommended!

I had a lovely time staying with Paul and his family in gorgeous Redfern! The location is fantastic - not too busy but super conveniently located. Paul, Judith, Tim and Nicola treated me like one of the family. Highly recommended.

After a long day in the city it always felt like coming home, because Paul was so friendly and kind. When we arrived he invited us to watch the Melbourne Cup together and explained us the importance of this event in Australia, which was in fact very new for us and interesting to learn. Paul did everything he could to help us navigate through Sydney and even had Opal cards prepared for us. He and his wife Judith are wonderful people who we enjoyed a lot to stay with. Thank you for a wonderful week!
Paul, Judith and Tim were really friendly and welcoming and I felt at home immediately. The house is so well situated for travelling to city or beaches, its a great place to stay in Sydney.

Paul, Judith and Tim were welcoming, friendly and completely lovely. They allowed me the space I needed yet were open to a nice chat each evening too. I highly recommend this AirBnB. It's delightful and so are the hosts.

We were attending a conference at Technology Park in Redfern, we walked their every day, we were only 5 minutes walk to an amazing array of eateries, Paul's house is a beautiful old terrace in an historic area and as hosts, he and Judith treated us like old friends. Just be aware the room is on the third floor and the stairs are steep. Would highly recommend
Lovely house owned by delightful people in an interesting location

Paul et Judith se sont immédiatement montrés très accueillants et chaleureux. Ils n'ont pas hésité à converser avec nous, nous ont donné des conseils quant aux transports en commun et ils s'intéressaient à ce que nous faisions la journée. Nous avions même le droit à du pain frais tous les matins. Le quartier était conforme à nos attentes: proche du centre-ville en utilisant les transports en commun et très tranquille pour y dormir. Une adresse à recommander les yeux fermés!
Chez Paul vous serez reçu comme si vous faisiez partie de la famille tout en respectant votre intimité. C'est une fabuleuse expérience d'intégration.

name: MySweetHomePT
summary: Apartment in prime area of the city, easy access to major points of interest in the city of Porto, fully furnished and equipped.

host.about: Olá, o meu nome é Alexandra Cunha, abraço este projeto pois para mim é uma mais valia conhecer pessoas de todo o mundo e culturas diferentes, penso ser muito enriquecedor. Sou sociável, mãe, amiga, comunicativa e divertida. Espero que o meu espaço seja tratado com respeito, tal como se estivesse em sua casa. Espero que todos os meus hóspedes se sintam confortáveis, acarinhados e em casa. Quanto a mim, farei os possíveis para que tal aconteça e para que aproveitem ao máximo o que a cidade do Porto tem para oferecer. Obrigada.

reviews.txt: The apartment was great!! Even better than in the pics. Communication was extra smooth with Alexandra. We loved the location, walking distance to the city centre of Porto. Parking and aircon were awesome. Recommendations on restaurants were wonderful, plenty of local choices very close to the apartment. Safe area and comfortable bed. Strongly recommended. With no doubt we'll stay there when we go back to Porto. Obrigada!!!!

De las mejores experiencias con airbnb, el apartamento esta genial, muy acogedor limpio y no muy lejos del centro. 

Alexandra es una chica encantadora que nos ha tratado muy bien. 

En general una experiencia estupenda. 100% recomendable!

The apartment is great, very comfortable and better than the pictures. Location is good, 10mins walk from the port. Communication was easy. 
The host and especially her husband were Amazing, they agreed to meet us at 4h30 in the morning for the check in because we had a flight delay, they even offered to give us a ride from the train station!
Amazing people and amazing apartment, we had a great time.
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

Alexandra and her husband were wonderful hosts! They went above and beyond in every way possible! They left detailed maps and went through with me step by step which roads to take, buses to travel on, places to see. They left many suggestions for cafes, restaurants, etc. They were prompt, extremely helpful and communicative both in person and via email and text. The place is exactly as it is photographed and is in a very central and accessible location.
Accueil très chaleureux et très attentionné. Alexandra et son compagnon nous ont donné beaucoup d'informations, d'adresses, de guides et ont été force de proposition tout au long de notre séjour.

Alexandra, Rui and Francescita are  charming with nice attention If you are looking for a very nice apartment extra clean and well located , do not hesitate . The days in Porto went by so fast , We.will return one day
Definitely at the same apartment 
Marlene and Charles

The stay was great. Host met us right outside their house. And was very accommodating. Gave us a full tour of the house. Provided many local places to check out. 
After we were provided some must see sites of Porto which were great as well. Recommend this house for anyone going to Porto. The house is clean, and the friendly accommodations make it a place to visit multiple times.

Alexandra, es una mujer muy amable. Me atendió muy bien, con las explicaciones con todo detalle. El apartamento es luminoso y muy bien edificado. La seguridad es absoluta con parking privado que esta incluido en la estancia.  Una autentica experiencia en Oporto. Para repetir. Gracias Alex.

Le jour de notre arrivée nous avons été très bien accueilli aussi bien par alexandra que son mari. Ils ont pris le temps de nous expliquer ce qu'il y avait à visiter et comment s'y rendre, de plus une petite bouteille de vin  était à notre disposition ainsi que des fruits pour nous souhaiter notre arrivée. Enfin, l'appartement est très bien situé à deux pas du centre ville et tout est bien desservi aussi bien en bus, commerces et les plages ne sont pas bien loin non plus, un séjour parfait merci à vous deux

Apartamento nuevo con buenas vistas y garage
Alexandra nos recibio y dio todo tipo de explicaciones
Esta a 15 min del centro 
Muy buena experiencia

Nous remercions Alexandra et son mari pour nous avoir accueilli très chaleureusement et ils nous ont donné de nombreux conseils sur ce qu'il ya à visiter dans la ville de Porto.L'appartement est très propre,lumineux et proche du centre.Nous recommandons ce logement et si nous devions retourner à Porto nous ferons appel à eux avec grand plaisir.

A Alexandra é uma pessoa atenciosa e com muito bom gosto. A casa está muito bem decorada e limpa. A zona onde se situa a casa é requintada, mas chega-se rapidamente ao centro do Porto. 
Gostámos muito!

La experiencia fue muy buena, Alexandra es una anfitriona muy amable y atenta, nos explicó todo con detalle y nos recomendó cosas que hacer y lugares a los que ir en la ciudad. El apartamento estaba muy bien equipado y en una zona agradable, no muy lejos para llegar andando al centro de la ciudad, y con un centro comercial y un mercado cerca. Si llevas coche es fácil enlazar la ronda que rodea Porto para visitar los alrededores de la ciudad o las partes más lejanas de ésta, y el hecho de que incluya aparcamiento nos facilitó mucho el viaje con respecto a otras visitas que habiamos hecho a Porto. Definitivamente, lo recomendaría.

Amazing apartment in beautiful city! Our staying was very comfortable, thanks to Alexandra for this! She met us very warm, tell us were we can find all that we need (places to eat, to walk, to buy something, to see the main attractions), gave us a map.  Bottle of wine and fruits was a nice surprise for us. The flat and house has all you need, even the parking place. The city center is only 15 minutes walk. It is big beautiful garden near. Highly recommend this place!

High standard, modern apartment, walking distance from the heart of Porto. Alexandra and her partner gave us all the information needed to see what the best in this wonderful city and adviced us where to eat a proper portugese francesinha ;))
Thank you :)

El apartamento genial, es igualito a las fotos. Alexandra un encanto, estaba puntual a nuestra llegada, nos dio información de la ciudad y de sus puntos de interés . Donde comer, desayunar, todo lo que había que ver, etc....En fin, todo lo que podíamos necesitar. Toda una anfitriona de primera, incluso nos tenía un detalle a nuestra llegada, que por cierto, nos encantó. El que tuviera parking, un punto extra, puesto que te olvidas del coche. En 15 minutos andando estás en el centro, es una gozada. Todo limpio y bien organizado. En resumen, si volvemos a Oporto, sin duda repetiremos. Gracias Alexandra, por hacer que nuestra estancia fuera tan agradable.
Todo genial, muy bien comunicado 15min dando un paseo ,del centro. Importante estacionamiento privado  para el coche. Alexandra se mostró atenta en todo momento. Un sitio para repetir
Apartamento a 10 minutos del centro. Alexandra muy atenta y amable, nos resolvió todas las dudas que teníamos. Lo recomiendo.

Alexandra's welcome and explanation of facilities and nearby attractions was fantastic. The best we have ever experienced on Airbnb. Her apartment is on the 4th floor with beautiful district views. The  apartment is modern, very clean and artistically decorated. The secure parking is a great feature. The location is great -  a 10 to 15 minute walk into the centre of Porto and there is a bus stop for the red and blue hop on hop off bus about 5 minutes away. Would highly recommend Alexandra's apartment to anyone.

Great accomodation! 
Everything was perfect, Alexandra is very helpful and flexible for the check-in and check-out, she gave us all the information about facilities and surrounding that we needed, she is a very kind and attentive person. The flat is modern, comforatable and very clean, we enjoyed a lot our stay there. The location is great, you can easily walk to the centre (10-15min) and the secure parking is a big plus if you have a car. 
I agree with all the positive reviews and would also highly recommend Alexandra's place!

name: Spacious bedroom with a trundle bed in Botafogo
summary: A bedroom for two in a beautiful colonial style home built in the early 20th century. Located in Botafogo in a quiet village with lots of vegetation just minutes from one of the landmarks of Rio. The neighborhood features many leisure activities.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
Olá!!
Seja bem vindo!
Eu adoro conhecer novas pessoas, compartilhar ensinamentos e pontos de vista. 
Amo a natureza, respirar um puro ar e me sentir conectada a energia da terra.
Me sinto muito feliz em receber convidados simpáticos que desejam experimentar ótimos momentos no Rio e desfrutar das alegrias e belezas deste lugar que eu tanto amo.
Botafogo é um bairro  onde a vida histórica e contemporânea convivem com charme a harmonia. Rodeado por montanhas e ruas arborizadas, viver em  Botafogo tem custo mais baixo que os outros bairros da zona sul, aqui é repleto de restaurantes, bares, feiras, museus e eventos culturais que acontecem com muita frequência, o bairro fica a poucos minutos do centro do Rio e dos principais pontos turísticos. A vila onde a casa está localizada foi construída há quase 100 anos, tem muitas árvores que recebem a visita de adoráveis animais da Mata Atlântica.
  A poucos minutos de caminhada  você encontrará a "Praia de Botafogo" que compõem uma das vistas mais incríveis do Rio, se preferir pegue o caminho oposto e dê um pulinho na Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas, de lá aproveite pra curtir o por do sol no Arpoador.
  Durante muito anos o Rio de Janeiro foi a capital do Brasil, então imagine passear entre as centenárias ruas de paralelepípedos do Centro do Rio, rodeado por prédios memoráveis de  belíssima arquitetura do século 19. 
  O bairro da Urca, onde abriga o bondinho do Pão de Açúcar, está a menos de 15 minutos de ônibus ou táxi.
  O Cristo Redentor  pode ser visto da janela  e você pode chegar a subida do Morro do Corcovado em apenas 15 minutos de ônibus ou táxi.
 Será um prazer compartilhar todas as dicas e lugares especiais que conheci ao longo dos meus anos de vida nesta cidade maravilhosa.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
Fue una experiencia increible, Ana siempre se comporto amable, disponible, siempre ayudando a facilitar mi viaje, aconsejando como llegar a lugares a los cuales queria visitar.

El lugar para dormir es super comodo, super limpio y super tranquilo, buena onda. 

Estoy muy feliz de haber quedado en esta casa.

Muchas gracias.

Fui muito bem atendido pela Ana Rita e muito bem recepcionado pelo Sr. Mauro. A residência fica em um condomínio muito bem localizado, o quarto é limpo, espaçoso e confortável, além de ser bem silencioso. O bairro é muito bom, tem metrô próximo e conta com comércio bem diversificado. Recomendo!

Simplesmente me senti em casa! A Ana é uma pessoa agradabilíssima e como anfitriã, se mostrou sempre prestativa e com ótimas dicas sobre o Rio. A casa é um charme e o bairro de Botafogo muito tranquilo e cheio de natureza. Tem uma visão privilegiada do Cristo Redentor. Quanto a segurança, me senti muito segura ao andar pelas ruas do bairro. O comércio também é muito diversificado e atende as necessidades de um "viajante". Foi uma experiência ímpar e espero podê-la repetir, uma próxima vez, com mais tempo para aproveitar tudo o que o Rio tem à oferecer!!!

Me and my boyfriend stayed at Ana Rita's apartment for ten days during the Olympics, and it was definitely the best Airbnb experience we ever had.

The flat is very well located, Botafogo metro station is about 10/15 minuts walking. The area is full of markets, bars and restaurants, and above all is very safe.
The apartment was perfectly clean at our arrival, and the room equipped with a double bed, a big drawers and a closet.
Ana Rita (and her father too) was friendly and very helpful since the beginning of our stay. During our vacation in Rio we lost our credit cards, and her help was fundamental to get them back. She also suggested us a lot of good places to eat :)
We could use the kitchen and also do the laundry, which was quite necessary since our stay was long.

I can certainly recommend Ana Rita and her flat, you will have a great stay there!

Iza nos acompañó en cada uno de nuestros días de estancia,muy afectuosamente nos ayudaba con cualquier duda que teníamos. Ana Rita fue muy amable y cortez.el barrio nos pareció muy seguro aunque un poco alejado de las playas.

name: Rent All Apartament (100m²) netx to BRT station
summary: Apartamento com um quarto com frigobar, sala moderna com home theater e TV de tela grande, are gourmet de café,  cozinha moderna com gelada e freezer. Mesa de sinuca, área de leitura e um amplo bar. Ônibus Público e estação de BRT próximo (3 min) One apartment with fridge, modern living room with home theater and large screen TV , gourmet coffee area , modern kitchen with cold and freezer. Pool table , reading area and a large bar . Public buses and BRT station near ( 3 min)

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
I was in Brazil for the Summer Olympics as a volunteer and I needed to be close to the Olympic Stadium (Engenhão). This home was perfect only 25 min by bus.

Kayanh and his family were awesome. He was great in making me feel at home, I left feeling like family. He took me on a tour of Rio on my first day and showed me everything to do in Rio. He was so accommodating and made me feel at home when I first arrived. Kayanh far exceeded my expectations. The home is so beautiful (I called it the tree house). The bedroom has everything- TV, fans, zoned air conditioning. The bathroom was awesome too. Everything was very well decorated and very clean. The neighborhood was great. It was in a very private, quiet neighborhood, close to the BRT and the area is very convenient, everything is in a walkable distance if you like walking. 

Kayanh home is 35-40 min from the airport by car and 1 hour from Centro Brazil, if you do not mind travelling by public transportation all the tourist areas are accessible.   

Kayanh and his family are the best hosts that you could ever ask for. I only speak English, and Kayanh spoke Portuguese and English which was a tremendous advantage. 

Kayanh and his family are 5 star hosts.

name: 1BR COZY, SPACIOUS, NEXT TO METRO FLAMENGO, RIO
summary: Large and spacious 1 bedroom, full kitchen, charming apart an eclectic neighborhood where “Cariocas” live, eat, drink, play live music at Praça São Salvador. Walking distance to everything, just steps away from restaurants and transportation to Corcovado. No car needed when staying at this apartment. The Subway/metro is very close, 5 min walking distance. Perfect for 1 person or couple comfortably.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about: I am a freelance web and graphic designer. I was born in Rio but have lived in San Francisco/CA for a long period. I love travelling: new sights, culture, unfamiliar food and I know how important it is to "feel home" at where you stay. I look forward to being your host during your stay in Rio and I can definitely recommend some great spots, good food and a tour around the city.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: A hospedagem foi incrível. O apartamento é lindo, bem decorado e aconchegante. A localização é super central, perto de tudo e fácil deslocamento para vários lugares do RJ, seja de metrô, ônibus, táxi ou Uber. Os porteiros também foram bem atenciosos. Iremos voltar, certamente. Experiência sensacional. Super indicamos.
Parabéns pelo apto!! Mto bom, excelente localização.. Super agradável e bacana!!
It was a pleasure. Great apartment in Flamengo.

As fotos fazem jus ao apartamento, que é mesmo aconchegante e prático. O prédio é antigo mas o apartamento foi bastante reformado. Fica no início da Rua São Salvador, portanto longe do barulho que pode vir da boêmia Praça São Salvador, dois quarteirões adiante, mas suficientemente perto de serviços de todo tipo (banco, mercados, correios, metrô, etc.). Os funcionários do prédio são simpáticos e, quando tivemos uma pequena reclamação de barulho em relação a um vizinho, o porteiro rapidamente resolveu-o, sem sequer ser necessário fazermos contato com a anfitriã a respeito. Só sentimos que uma parte da cozinha não condiz com o restante do apartamento, mas penso que a anfitriã deverá resolver isso em breve. O banho de chuveiro é excelente, os eletrodomésticos da cozinha e a máquina de lavar-secar são novos e muito bons, a iluminação é linda e o ar condicionado no quarto é bastante potente (talvez o suficiente para refrigerar o apartamento inteiro, mas não há como isolar a casa da área de serviço com tanque, que é aberta). Acabamos não conhecendo a Sonia, pois chegamos e saímos em horários inusuais, mas a chegada e a saída foram tranquilas mesmo assim e o contato (por (Hidden by Airbnb) ) correu de forma fluida e sempre que necessário (de ambas partes). Ficaríamos aqui de novo e recomendamos para quem queira um apartamento de quarto e sala confortável numa zona agradável, central e não cara do Rio de Janeiro.

Sonia's been an amazing host from beginning to end of my trip to Rio! She was very welcoming and full of good tips about how to enjoy my stay in the city. The apartment is very cozy and had all I needed to feel at home! Very clean, comfortable and perfectly located, a few blocks from the subway and surrounded with a fun nightlife! 
My next visit to Rio will definitely be with Sonia again!

El sitio es fantástico!! La casa, el barrio, la ubicación, las conexiones, todo. Sonia fue de gran ayuda para todo lo que necesité pero la casa está muy bien equipada y puedes tener una estancia tan independiente como agradable. Sin duda volveré. Muy recomendable.

2つの地下鉄駅から徒歩5分ほど｡静かな住宅街です｡ﾌﾗﾒﾝｺﾞﾋﾞｰﾁへも徒歩圏内｡
部屋は天井が高く､南向きの窓も多く､とても清潔です｡
乾燥機付き洗濯機も､もの干場もあり､ｷｯﾁﾝは4つ口のｺﾝﾛにｵｰﾌﾞﾝ､電子ﾚﾝｼﾞと長期滞在に向いています｡
5泊しましたが､去るときに引っ越しするようで､とても寂しく感じました｡またﾘｵに来る時は滞在したいです｡
Great location :)

O apartamento confortável é muito bem  localizado, próximo aos meios de transporte, numa rua tranquila, próximo dos comércios e restaurantes.
Para quem vem a trabalho ou a passeio, recomendo.
Um apartamento muito bem localizado, perto do aeroporto, metro, onibus numa rua tranquila, perto de tudo.

Great and quiet apartment right in a lively part of Rio... supe close to the Aterro park and beach.
Very tastefully furnished and decorated. 
The bed is very comfortable which is not always the case in a Airbnb.
Sonia is a great and super nice hostess. She made my arrival and departure very easy.
Special thanks to the great doorman Cesar who's so nice!
Foi ótima a experiência e a Sonia foi muito solícita. Era bem próximo ao metro e a praça são salvador.
Sonia's apartment is perfect, nice, light and clean. The neighbourhood is full of restaurants, bars and shops. Praça São Salvador, just down the street is perfect to enjoy bit of local life! Thanks!
We had a great time in Sonia's flat! Great apartment great location good amenities and Sonia was always here to help in case we needed anything. I definitely recommend staying here!

O espaço é ótimo. Decoração de bom gosto e super aconchegante. O apartamento é claro e arejado. Não senti falta de nada. Exatamente como descrito e como nas fotos. Além disso, a Sonia é super atenciosa e estava sempre à disposição.

This apartment and host are wonderful! The place looks exactly like in the photos and it's clean and well-kept. The doormen of the building were very respectful and friendly, and we felt very safe in the neighborhood. It was lovely to wake up to so much sunlight and the chirping of local birds! The kitchen appliances are all new and function to perfection; the ceiling fan in the living room is great; and the air conditioning in the bedroom also works great (there were a few warmer nights while we were there and it was great to be able to stay nice and cool!). The TV and WiFi also work great. Overall we felt very much at home. The location is also fantastic. You can walk to the metro, bars/restaurants, the São Salvador plaza (where there is also a lovely feira on Sundays!), the nearby Zona Sul supermarket, the nearby Flamengo park, and many other fun places. We highly recommend this spot and would definitely stay here again!

Um estada inesquecível e para ser repetida. O apartamento é muito bem localizado e muito aconchegante. Aquele estilo que faz com que você se sinta em casa. A Sonia, anfitriã, uma pessoa extremamente carismática, atenciosa e zelosa. Recomendo o apartamento sem restrições e já adianto: vou fazer concorrência, porque vou alugar tantas vezes quantas estiver pelo RJ!!! Sonia, muito obrigado e até breve!

Foi ótimo ficar no apartamento da Sonia. O espaço é ajeitado, bem cuidado, confortável e tranquilo. A localização é perfeita: perto do metrô e de outras opções de transporte. De lá, é fácil chegar tanto às praias quanto ao Centro da cidade. Além disso, o prédio (simples) está numa área de comércio variado e fica próximo o suficiente para ir a pé até o Aterro do Flamengo, onde fui correr algumas manhãs. Recomendo a hospedagem.

Sonia foi uma anfitriã nota 10. Desde o dia que fiz a reserva até minha saída a comunicação foi sempre rápida e clara. O apartamento é exatamente como mostram as fotos. Limpíssimo, sou  bem chata no quesito banheiro e posso dizer que o deste apartamento era espetacular. Cama confortável e adorei ter encontrado vários adaptadores para tomada de três pinos espalhados pela casa.  A localização é perfeita, com duas estações de metrô próximas além de farta oferta de várias linhas de ônibus. Rua tranquila, prédio muito seguro, porteiros muito simpáticos, enfim, tudo perfeito. Se pudesse daria seis estrelas.
O ap tem ótima localização, tem tudo perto e o bairro é arborizado. Tudo super limpo, bem decorado e aconchegante. A anfitriã atenciosa e querida. Recomendo.

name: Oporto Central Flat
summary: Flat with a complete bedroom for 2, a living.room with more 2 twin beds. Independent kitchen,hall, wc,marquee, balcony. Apartamento C/1 quarto completo para 2 dois e 1 sala/quarto com 2 duas confortáveis e  grandes camas individuais . Esta sala possui também 5 sofás p/ um bom relax e  área para refeições. Um wc completo, cozinha equipada,marquise  para fumadores, fazem também parte deste apartamento, servido por dois elevadores.   A 1 min. (pé) do supermercado,farmácia,bus e táxis à porta.

host.location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal

reviews.txt:
The apartment is located 20 minutes away from Boavista square on foot, and 2 minutes away from bus stops to downtown (15 minutes). In the neighborhood you can find everything you need: tobacco shops where you can buy your bus pass (andante), grocery stores (e.g. Lidl), pharmacy, etc. A taxi from downtown at night is between 6-8 euro. In short, it is a very convenient location.
The apartment is exactly what you see in the pictures. There is no access to the main bedroom, but the two single beds in the living room were comfortable and the apartment was really clean.
The host canceled this reservation 134 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

La acogida ha sido correcta, en todo momento nos ha ofrecido lo mejor para que la estancia se cómoda y que el viaje lo disfrutemos al máximo. Todo lo indicado en la descripción de la casa es tal cual al verla en persona. Todo muy bien

Hizo que en todo momento la estancia en el apartamento fuera agradable. Nos dio muchísima información acerca de medios de transporte, cosas que ver, actividades culturales, sitios donde comer o tomar algo.
todo como se esperaba y se describía. Atención e indicaciones sobre la zona muy buenas. Una ciudad para conocer y seguro que volveremos.

Everything was as we expected, Natalia was really nice and told us good spot to visit!
Obrigada!
Tranquilidad y sosiego  después  de un día de caminata. Muy bien  equipado el piso y Natalia te ofrece mucha información

Wir hatten eine wunderebare Zeit in Porto. Natália ist eine hervorragende Gastgeberin! Sie hat uns immer auf den neusten Stand gebracht was kulturelle Aktivitäten in Porto angeht, hatte gute Tipps für Ausflüge oder Restaurants und war schnell zur Stelle wenn wir Hilfe brauchten (z.B. bei Wegbeschreibungen). 
Das Appartment entspricht genau dem was auf den Bildern zu sehen ist sowie einer perfekt ausgestatteten Küche, also eine nette, kleine, sehr saubere Wohnung mit Stil und ausreichend Platz für 2. Es liegt ziemlich genau zwischen Altstadt und Strand und beides ist gut mit dem Bus (ca. 10 Minuten) oder einem längeren Spaziergang zu erreichen. Die Umgebung ist ein eher ruhiges Geschäftsviertel mit guten Einkaufsmöglichkeiten für den alltäglichen Bedarf. Ein tolles, nettes, portugiesisches Restaurant/Imbiss ist direkt um die Ecke. Wir hatten einen tollen Urlaub! Der natürlich zu kurz war.
Everything was even better than we expected, so beautiful cozy apartment in a really good place with such a nice owner, thank you so much!!

Laurinda y su papa son muy lindos, nos dejaron frutas del campo a nuestra llegada, un refri con varias cosas para cenar ya que llegamos tarde, que linda bienvenida!
El piso esta ubicado como 10 mns del centro en taxi (no esta caminable) y solo tiene 1 habitación. Tiene todos los comercios al lado. Esta perfecto para dos amigos ya que tiene dos camas individuales, máximo 3 diría.
Laurida was a great host helping us find the apartment and providing good tips for the area and helped us with coordinating transport
Perfecto
muy buen piso,buena decoración, detalles de bienvenida e indicaciones sobre los lugares mas interesantes.Lo recomiendo para visitar Oporto

name: Charming apartment in Plateau Mont Royal
summary: The apartment is in the heart of the Plateau-Mont-Royal, at the border of the Mile-End. All the cafes, restaurants, and boutiques you'd hope for are nearby. The place is also at a 2 min. walk from the Laurier Metro Station, which will take you downtown in minutes. The Parc Laurier is 10 min. away. The place is comfortable, homy, and welcoming, ideally located in a central neighbourhood. Good for couples, small groups, solo adventurers. Families (with kids) are also welcome!

host.about: I’m a bilingual (French/English) Montrealer passionate about social justice, anthropology, playing the piano, and meeting cool people from near and far.

reviews.txt: Really great place ! Super close to the metro station and many restaurants. Host was amazing with communication and check in was smooth.

On a passé une merveilleuse experience dans l’appart d’emilie. Endroit magnifique avec beaucoup d’espace et un balcon ensoleillé et tranquille. Emilie est très arrangeante. Merci! On reviendra avec plaisir!
Super apart bien placé
Emillie was very kind and hospitable, great stay!
Appartement tranquille, bien situé c'était parfait !
I highly recommend Emilie's place. Its super convenient and 10 min drive to downtown. If you are lucky you can find a parking spot right by her apartment. Its clean and comfy.

Our stay was great! 
Emilie's apartment is the true Montreal experience (I used to live there). The classic walk-up, the original details: hardwood floors and crown mouldings, the quaint balcony to sit and enjoy your morning coffee. Her place is incredibly close to the metro station and the location is incredible, it has all you need for shopping, eating, drinking, sight-seeing, you name it. Emilie was a great host, and it was very easy and quick to communicate. Our check-in was a breeze :)
Clean and cute space in a beautiful location
Le logement est idéalement placé pour visiter Montréal.

Really homey, classic Montreal vibes. Balcony was very enjoyable. The door was a bit of a hassle as well as there was no toilet paper however for the cost it was well worth it! Great location too close enough to pretty much everything but residential enough to find some calm in the city!
Great place, in a great location. Emilie was quick to respond to any questions.
Rapport Qualité prix parfait, appartement bien situé (metro et épicerie à 3-4 min) propre et charment.

name: Premium Exclusive house & garden Rua Almada
summary: In the historic center, this XIX century exclusively renovated house keeps the traces of historical Porto. Brightness and design make it an exceptional place. Terrace and garden are a haven of peace in the vibrant city center, at the top of Almada street. It has a sunny and elegant living-room, a modern fully equipped kitchen with a terrace and access to a private garden. In the 2nd floor, two suites provide the comfort for a perfect stay. A premium place for an extraordinary experience!

host.about: I'm a publisher and an author based in Paris. I have set up and managed the French office of Lonely Planet during 10 years. Beside the 6 years I've spent in New York where I worked for the United Nations, among other things, I have travelled all over the world. Especially in Asia. Three years ago, I fell in love with  Porto where I bought my house and renovated it. I love to go there whenever I have a chance. What makes me really happy ? Travelling, cooking, books and films and share time with my friends.

reviews.txt:
Dès notre arrivée, et l'accueil chaleureux d'Alexandra, on se sentait "chez nous". Elle nous a donné des instructions facile à comprendre sur tous les gadgets (wifi, sound dock, television et lecteur de dvd, machine à laver et sèche linge ) suivi par les bons tuyaux pour profiter de la ville en peu de temps, où manger localement (Mundo deli ---top) et comment se rendre à la plage en metro. 
La maison sur deux étages est superbe. Nous avons aimé le mélange de la pierre et des parquets en bois. Tout est neuf.
Elle est équipée avec tout ce que l’on peut vouloir. La cuisine est fantastique. Elle se prolonge par une terrasse où l’on peut prendre le petit déjeuner ou déjeuner. Cette terrasse donne sur un petit jardin plein de plantes et de petits arbres.
Tout est décoré avec goût. C’est sobre et élégant. Tout ce que nous aimons. Des lampes et des meubles design ou vintage dans chaque pièce. Un salon immense, haut de plafond avec des volets intérieurs, donne la sensation de l'espace mais reste intime. 
Nous avons aimé la possibilité de manger ou prendre un verre dans le salon, ou la cuisine, ou le terrasse ou le jardin. 
Confort des chambres et les salles de bains: simplement parfait. Et les draps sont si confortables que je pensais être dans un hôtel 5 étoiles. 
Située en pleine ville la maison reste tranquille et bien placée.

Nous avons passé un moment merveilleux à Porto. On peut voir que cette ville est en pleine ébullition. Et la maison était comme une oasis de paix à quelques minutes du centre-ville. Tout d’abord, la rua do Almada, où elle se trouve, est une rue passionnante. Des boutiques vintage ou design, sont à côté d’autres endroits qui vendent des produits électriques pour artisans comme nous n’en voyons plus à Paris. Nous avons été si bien accueillis par Alexandra qui s’occupe de la maison. Elle parle un français parfait et l’anglais aussi. Elle nous a donné plein de bonnes informations pour profiter de Porto. La maison, elle-même est magnifique. Elle vient juste d’être rénovée. Nous avons adoré la pierre que la propriétaire a sauvegardée sous les fenêtres et autour des portes et les volets typiques à l’intérieur. La décoration est très soignée. Là aussi, un mix d’objets très design, comme la superbe lampe dans la cuisine ou dans le salon et des petits meubles vintage un peu partout, très beaux. La cuisine est un bonheur. On pouvait prendre notre petit déjeuner sur la terrasse qui donne sur un petit jardin adorable où l’on peut descendre par un large escalier. Nous avions un grand choix de vaisselle magnifique. Les chambres sont aussi très confortables. Chacune avait sa salle de bains. Mais le must, c’est les draps. Nous avons eu l’impression de dormir dans un hôtel 5 étoiles. Douillets et soyeux à souhait. J’aimerais avoir les mêmes chez moi ! La bibliothèque du salon contient plein de livres intéressants et une bonne collection de dvd. On s’est senti chez nous, avec un certain luxe en plus ! C’est sûr, nous reviendrons à Porto et dans cette maison qui nous a touchés. Le séjour était trop court, comme toujours…

We loved staying at Zahia's place.  Alexandra welcomed us very warmly and gave us good tips about Porto. The house ist very well furnished and there is nothing at all we were missing. More – we loved the design and everything  including the dishes of villeroy & boch. We felt like at home! 
Everything is new and clean. Also the beds are very comfortable - in addition it's a quiet neighborhood and we slept very well. We were very lucky to find a place like this and can recomend it to everyone. 
We'll be back...

This was the best house we have stayed so far for the Portugal/Spain trip. Zahia house was really very neat, tidy, spacious and tastefully decorated. Her friend was there for the check in. He was such a great help and host. I highly recommend Zahia house if u and your friend are in Porto and would like to do some cooking and enjoying by the backyard with wine.  Also not to mention, u can walk by foot to a lot of places from Zahia house between 15-20mins, and a lot of eateries just 2-3mins walk from her place.

The appartment is very well located, very conveniet, fully equipped.
We have been welcome, and provided with lot of tips (best locations to have lunch, to go shopping or to enjoy pasteries and drinks.  So much that we preferred not use the kitchen so as to enjoy the portuguese food (even the vegetarian!).
We warmly recommend this location.

I would return to Porto just to repeat the experience of my visit to Zahia's home in the old city of Porto!

Every step of the process, from making first contact to sadly having to say goodbye, was a pleasure.  Such beautiful energy and style. Thank you so much Zahia, Alexandra and Diogo for your kindness, care and assistance. Also very much enjoyed meeting some of your lovely friends in the neighbourhood at Mondo Deli. 

A word of warning though when staying at Zahia's home, her beds are so comfortable, they will wrap their silky sheets around you and not want to let you go  : ) zzzz

Could not recommend more highly to visit Porto and Zahia's home.

Obrigado

: ) errol

Exactly as described. Communication was excellent and host was flexible with check in & out with regard to leaving our bags at the house. V clean in general with a very well equipped kitchen. Great location for exploring Porto.

Wir waren zu dritt, zwei Erwachsene und ein Kind. Es gibt zwei Schlafzimmer. Das Haus ist traumhaft! Genau so grosszügig und wunderbar eingerichtet wie auf den Fotos. Es hat uns an nichts gefehlt und Alexandra hat für uns vorab sogar einen Parkplatz um die Ecke reserviert. Wir wurden herzlich mit einer Flasche Wein empfangen. Danke an die Gastgeber!

Zahia and her wonderfully helpful friend Alexandra provided the most fantastic welcome via their friend Diogo. He gave us all the best restaurant tips and was so helpful. The house itself was absolutely gorgeous, and in a fabulous area, close to the city. The garden also was a lovely place to relax in. Would wholeheartedly recommend staying in this memorably beautiful home!

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Alexandra, qui nous a donné d'excellents conseils en matière de lieux à visiter et de restaurants sympathiques. Elle a été toujours facile à contacter durant notre séjour. Cette maison de ville est agréable et très bien située dans le quartier historique de Porto. La maison était très propre à notre arrivée. Sa situation permet de visiter  la ville à pieds ou en transport en commun facilement. Porto est une belle cité qui monte et descend en permanence.   Très bon séjour, nous recommandons cette jolie maison à qui veut visiter Porto.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis. Nous avons eu de très bon conseils (restaurants, lieux de visite, etc.) pour agrémenter notre séjour.

Le logement est très bien placé dans un quartier encore peu touristique. Quelques restaurants et bars branchés se sont installés dans le quartier. Ce n’est pas forcément la peine d’aller loin pour sortir le soir.

Le logement est très bien équipé et tout est neuf. La literie est très bonne.

This is a roomy, light, and well-equipped apartment. There is a lovely private garden area and a balcony over-looking the garden. Everything was as described, including very comfortable beds.

The neighborhood is within walking distance of everything in the historic area of the city and is also a few blocks walk from the Metro. There are several grocery stores and cafes, bakeries and restaurants close by.

Our host, Zahia, and her assistant, Alexandra, were gracious and helpful. Alexandra made certain that we had a taxi waiting for us at our 4 AM departure. 

Great apartment, great city, and great hosts.

The stay at Zahia's place was just perfect. The house is charming .. the neighbourhood was what we where looking for .. quiet, far from the crowds still very much in the old city, with lovely restaurants and coffee places nearby ... we loved it !!!

Wir haben tolle Tage in Porto verbracht. Das Haus von Zahia ist wunderschön renoviert, perfekt ausgestattet und liegt sehr zentral in der Altstadt. Da es teilweise schon kühl war, waren wir auch froh um die Heizung. Das Haus hat alles was man braucht. Alles im Zentrum war gut zu Fuss zu erreichen und für Orte weiter weg, wie der Strand etc, ist die Busstation nicht weit weg. In der Nähe sind Supermarkt, Restaurants, Bars und Cafes und viele kleine Geschäfte. 
Alejandra hat uns herzlich empfangen und uns sehr gute Tipps und Empfehlungen gegeben. Herzlichen Dank für Alles!

Zahia's house is warm, quiet and confortable. The decoration and furnitures will make every one feeling home. The terrace and the whole house is perfect to chill after the walks through the up and down city of Porto.

The house is perfect with a spacious, beautiful interior and a magical small garden. The location is ideal with everything in walking distance including good food shopping and restaurants but the block is just far enough from the center to feel calm.

Accueil sympathique, localisation sympathique.
Appartement extraordinaire, beau, grand, propre, de bon goût.
Merci Zahia et Alexandra!

La casa è ancora più bella di come sembra nelle foto, è molto spaziosa, luminosa e silenziosa e soprattutto è originale e con grande personalità. La zona e  vicina al centro ma tranquilla. Le collaboratrici di Zahia attente e sollecite. Ottima esperienza, se torneremo a Porto torneremo qui!

An old house in the centre of Porto that was converted one year ago. Beautifully converted with good sized accommodation on two floors - a large kitchen, and separate lounge on the first floor, and two good sized en suite bedrooms on the second floor. Very clean and perfect high quality accommodation for visiting Porto. We had a great time and we would recommend highly this property.

La anfitriona fue muy amable, nos recomendó varios lugares para salir y comer, y fueron todo un acierto. 
La casa está muy bien ubicada, cerca del centro histórico (menos de 5 minutos andando) de forma que te permite recorrer toda la ciudad sin necesidad de utilizar el transporte público.  Además, la casa tiene encanto.

name: Casa S. Miguel 6 - The Yellow House
summary: The S. Miguel 6 House is a traditional Porto's building located in the UNESCO World Heritage area, surrounded by a charismatic and authentic atmosphere, open the window and breathe the soul of Porto! N. Registo 27164/AL. Near Station Sao Bento Cleaning fees included in the price.

host.about:
Hello, I am Ana, I enjoy travelling and meeting new people. 
I have a passion for old buildings, love to refurbish them and bring them back to peoples life. The house in Porto is located in the Old Town Centre and Porto is a fantastic city with plenty to do and see. 
The house in Figueira da Foz is also located in the Old Town Centre close to all amenities. Figueira is in the Centre of Portugal and offers sandy beaches, a Casino and events all year round!

reviews.txt:
Pasamos cuatro días estupendos en Oporto y ya con ganas de volver.
La casa está muy bien situada en la zona histórica de la ciudad y permite hacer las visitas a la mayoría de los sitios turísticos andando.
Es una casa muy bien rehabilitada en un edificio antiguo y tuvimos la suerte de ser los primeros en disfrutarla. 
La atención de Ana es excelente y la respuesta a las cuestiones previas que le planteamos antes del viaje fue muy rápida, casi inmediata, y con mucha información útil para la estancia.
No nos queda más que agradecer su hospitalidad y esperar que no esté alquilada para cuando nos decidamos a volver.

Ana was a wonderful and gracious host. She was always accessible, punctual and welcoming. The apartment was truly incredible and just as pictured in the Airbnb description with plenty of space for everyone. The apartment is in a fantastic location, right down the street from the Torre dos Clerigos which means that all of Porto's major sights are within walking distance. The only tricky part is finding parking near the house if you drove a car to Porto. Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Porto.

Ana has been really helpful and welcoming. She even got us some special things as we were travelling with our 2 little girls.
She answered to our "request" immediately with extreme efficiency....like I rarely have seen before.
(For example, she changed the microwave in only a few hours after we mentioned her it was not working).
The apartment is in a perfect location, just a few step from one of the best view of Porto and Gaia. 
There was parking in the streets.
We had everything needed and expected.
Ana, thanks again for everything.
We l (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ed Porto and really annoyed our stay at your place!
Ana's house was vey nice. A lot of space, very well equiped, with modern furniture and really close to the center. I reccomend it !
A perfect place for our large group and a lovely view at your doorstep and from your balcony. Communication was easy and beyond accommodating. We had a lovely time.

Todo genial. Ana es super amable: nos facilitó información sobre Oporto, aparcamiento y demás antes de llegar; nos vino a buscar a una plaza cercana para conducirnos hasta la casa (el navegador del coche nos dio algún problemilla..); nos explicó todo sobre la casa y  nos dio información sobre restaurantes.
La casa está muy bien para 8 personas, toda reformada, muy cómoda y todo muy limpio. Los chicos disfrutaron mucho de la sala del sótano con los puffs dejándonos a los padres algo de tiempo de relax... La casa está muy bien ubicada, a 50 mts del Mirador Da Vitória (con unas vistas preciosas de la ciudad y del río) y  a menos de 5 minutos de la Torre de los Clérigos donde hay autobuses urbanos y turísticos además de un pequeño centro comercial con algunos restaurantes y bares de copas.
En general es una casa perfecta que recomendamos a quien quiera disfrutar de Oporto estando en el centro de casi todo  ¡¡¡Muchísimas gracias por todo, Ana!!!  Si volvemos a Oporto, repetiremos en tu preciosa casa.  Un abrazo,

Ana e seu marido foram extremamente receptivos. Estavam na casa na hora que chegamos e nos receberam muito bem. Nos ajudaram a estacionar o carro, com as malas, nos falaram sobre o Porto e deram dicas sobre a região. 
A casa é uma delicia, super bem equipada, muito bem localizada e com quartos amplos e banheiros excelentes.

Even though we were a little late, Ana gave us a very warm welcome, made us feel at home right away and even helped us with parking our car. The house was clean, spacious, comfortable and had everything we required. The location was fantastic. Would definitely recommend. Thank you Ana! :)

Het huis was exact zoals beschreven; ruim, schoon en gezellig ingericht.
De ligging in het centrum is perfect. Echt een goede uitvalsbasis voor het bezoeken van de stad. een echt buiten terras is er niet maar door de ligging is er altijd een terras dicht in de buurt.
Kortom; een aanrader.

Ancienne maison typique, totalement rénovée et très bien située, à proximité à pied de tous les points importants à visiter dans le vieux Porto. Proche des transports publics. Quartier calme. Ana a été aux petits soins pour nous rendre le séjour agréable. La maison est équipée de tout ce qui est nécessaire. Excellente literie. A recommander sans aucune hésitation

la característica fundamental de este alojamiento es su situación. Por otro lado la dueña tiene buen gusto y está bien  amueblado y tiene unas camas estupendas. Únicamente decir que la gente se pone hablar en la calle delante del edificio y eso si hay un montón . L comunicación con la dueña es fácil y cómoda

Staying at Ana`s place was one of our best experiences. Starting with the excellent communication with Ana and her very beautiful apartment. Ana`s apt is exactly as in the photos, modern, clean, comfy and with all the necessary items for our stay. Everything was first class. Thank you for a fantastic weekend in Porto

The apartment is in a wonderful location within super easy walking distance of all of the wonderful treasures of Porto.  We easily walked to the Tower and all of the churches and walked along the river.  There are so many amazing, local restaurants right in the neighborhood, and the coffee shop that is only 50 feet from the apartment was amazing with incredibly friendly owners and great food and coffee.  The weather during our visit was unseasonably cold for Portugal, so the apartment was a bit chilly, but we can't wait to visit again when it is warmer.  The neighborhood is lively and you can hear the cars and people outside the apartment, but it was not a problem for us.  Our host was incredibly helpful!  She introduced us to the owners of the coffee shop and arranged for our very early cab back to the airport.  We loved Porto and would definitely use this apartment if we go back.
Everything perfect! Charming old house with 4 bedrooms and located very well!

Adoramos a estadia nessa casa bicentenária, mas que foi completamente renovada e modernizada. A Ana foi uma anfitriã fantástica nos deixando muito a vontade e com flexibilidade para nos atender  O local é excelente na região histórica e a poucos minutos da Ribeira e de todas as atrações. Recomendamos fortemente.

This house is perfectly located next to everything. It accommodated all of us perfectly. 
Ana introduced us to Fernando who owns the little shop on the next street and it was amazing. Fernando brought us breakfast every morning, he was so sweet. 
The only thing we did not like was the bathrooms. Wish they were a little cleaner.

maison très agréable dans un quartier bien situé par rapport aux points intéressants à voir à Porto.
Très belle vue de Porto depuis la terrasse publique à 20 m de la maison.
Ana nous a très bien accueilli et conseillé pour le séjour.
Nous conseillons cette maison pour les familles voulant profiter de Porto dans les meilleures conditions.

Adoramos a estadia na casa de Ana. Tudo é exatamente como nas fotos: bem equipado, limpo e organizado. Perfeito para grupos grandes. As histórias sobre a região onde a casa está são fantásticas. A localização é perfeita para se locomover pela cidade com facilidade. Muito comércio no entorno, mas bem tranquilo para dormir. A vista do miradouro na mesma rua é incrível. Ana é extremamente receptiva e sempre disposta a ajudar seus hóspedes, como muitos outros moradores de Porto. A cidade é encantadora e acolhedora. Foi uma agradável surpresa em nossa (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaremos! Um bônus: o café do Senhor Fernando, há alguns metros (que ficou nos esperando com as chaves, pois fizemos o check in bem tarde). Tudo muito gostoso feito por uma família simpática. Recomendamos fortemente a cidade e a casa de Ana!

Casa incrível situada no coração da cidade do Porto, muito bem localizada, limpa, acolhedora. A Ana foi sempre muito acessível e disponível para ajudar em qualquer uma das necessidades. Voltaremos com toda a certeza.

We had an excellent stay in Porto and Ana was the most gracious and helpful host. The townhouse was well-equipped and comfortable. The location was central to all of the sites in Porto, which was great. The townhouse is located at the top of the hill, so we also got a great workout. We were worried that the townhouse did not have air conditioning, but the stone walls kept the place at a comfortable temperature. This place is great for a group and I highly recommend it!

name: Apartment in Ipanema with Balcony
summary: Apartment in Ipanema with a large balcony and a barbecue, two blocks from the beach. Ideal for families, couples with children. A space for demanding people, as the apartment is fully equipped with first grade furniture and appliances.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
Olá, Sou o Armando Machado.

Sou carioca, apaixonado pelas cidades do Rio de Janeiro e de Florianópolis. Sou amante de viagens, e gosto de andar de moto e fazer Snowboard. 

O projeto do Jurerê Loft nasceu de muitas idas à Ilha da Magia, e decidi que precisava de um bom motivo para voltar mais vezes. Decidi investir nos apartamentos assim que os vi. O Alex me apresentou cada um dos 4, me apaixonei e pensei: Porquê não transformar esses lofts em uma experiência mágica para os hóspedes do mundo todo? Até hoje o Alex me ajuda com a gestão do Airbnb e a cada comentário elogiando o local e nosso atendimento, me sinto de fato realizado.

Tudo que temos aprendido nesse tempo de Airbnb tem nos ensinado muito, e espero sempre oferecer uma excelente experiência na estadia dos nossos hóspedes!

Estou sempre disponível para dúvidas sobre qualquer uma das cidades, dicas e sugestões (Sempre bem vindas).

Um Grande Abraço!
____________________________________

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
O apartamento do Armando é lindo, muito bem localizado e super bem equipado. Não senti falta de nada e foi muito confortável estar a duas quadras do posto 8 em ipanema. 
O Armando é uma pessoa muito fácil de lidar, não tive nenhum problema com ele nem com a hospedagem. Ele é muito disponível e tudo foi resolvido facilmente. 
A porta com fechadura digital traz comodidade pra gente não precisar carregar chave e também nem precisamos nos encontrar pessoalmente para isso. 
A varanda com churrasqueira e ducha também foram um plus, um ambiente muito gostoso prum dia em que a família chegou bem cansada!

Eu e meus amigos alugamos o Ap do Armando durante um final de semana e estava tudo perfeito. O apartamento é muito confortável, com tudo que se precisa, a área externa é ótima e a localização está próxima de tudo. O Armando foi muito atencioso e solícito com tudo. Todos adoraram.
Ótimo apartamento, todo decorado, com wifi, varanda grande. Armando sempre disponível para ajudar. Recomendo!

Todo cierto!  Espectacular departamento! Ubicación ideal, cerca de todo, tiene un equipamiento de primera y todo funciona bien. Armando estuvo siempre pendiente y atento a cualquier necesidad. Pasamos 10 dias muy cómodos y confortables. La seguridad de guardia 24 horas da mucha tranquilidad. Todo genial! Aparte, como siempre, Brasil y su gente nos trató muy, pero muy bien! Atentos, amables, educados y correctos (y muy divertidos)

El departamento esta muy bien ubicado. Y tiene un balcon divino.
Pero el departamento es para 5 personas, tiene solo un dormitorio grande con dos camas matrimoniales y despues un cuarto muyyyyy chico con una cama individual.
La comunicacion con armando fue muy buena y la predisposicion para arreglar el problema ya que me confirmo que entrabamos 9 personas por como dice la publicacion. 
Sacando de lado eso, que se soluciono trayendo colchones, lo demas bien

Everything was wonderful, I highly recommend this place. 
It's one block from the beach and near supermarkets, drug stores, atms, stores, bars, etc. Very convenient! Armando was always available to answer questions, very thoughtful throughout the whole booking process and also when we were there and after we left. The apartment is lovely, everything is new and clean!
Muito bom! Otima localizaçao e o proprietario nos recebeu mto bem
El departamento es muy lindo y cómodo. Un poco chico para 10 personas y no se puede hacer mucho ruido, más allá de eso todo genial.
Apartamento bem espaçoso, muito limpo e arrumado. Utensílios domésticos de última geração, com uma varanda muito agradável.
Apartamento top e muito bem decorado com uma área externa espaçosa e aconchegante. Anfitrião super atencioso. Voltarei com certeza !

O Armando é super atencioso, prestativo e simpático...amamos o apartamento, tem uma localização( do lado do metro, praia e com restaurantes, supermercados no mesmo quarteirão) e infra estrutura (imóveis modernos e bem cuidados) maravilhosa...sem contar a varanda com churrasqueira que faz toda a (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaremos mais vezes.

Fantastic apartment in an amazing location. Armando couldn't have been a kinder host. I stupidly left my wallet (with a sizeable amount of money) behind, and he went above and beyond to return it to me. Top marks, top host!
Excelente hospitalidad por parte de Armando. Muy buen departamento, muy moderno y comodo

name: Artsy 3BR in Plateau by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the modern architectural details, beautifully exposed brick walls, and stunning fully-equipped kitchen. Located in Le Plateau, known for its assortment of delicious restaurants and relaxed cafes.

host.about:
Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Airbnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

reviews.txt: Overall a good experience. This unit is in a great location and the perfect home base for me and my friends during our stay. We were a bit surprised by the level of noise and on the streets at nice (the windows are not very thick)

This place was an amazing find! We were in awe from the moment we walked into the apartment! Location was fantastic, all the amenities and the service we received from flatbook throughout our stay was top notch! 

We were aware that there was no AC but when we arrived we were so happy to see a small unit set up for us! It was a pleasant surprise and they had many fans for us to use as well. 

All the guests had a wonderful experience, 5 stars!!
Great place, best bang for your buck anywhere near this neighbourhood for sure.
The place was beautiful and clean
Looks nice on surface but over busy street w/minimum in amenities, and comfort

Appartement spacieux et  joliment décoré situé dans un quartier cosmopolite et animé, bars et restos sympas à proximité immédiate. 
Bon à savoir: Beaucoup d'animation dans la rue tard le soir les vendredi et Samedi soirs
The condo was beautiful and very comfortable. The location was perfect walking distance to little restaurants, shops and bars. Overall the stay was great and I had a wonderful time in Montreal.
Very nice stay!
Great place.   Super spacious and well equipped. In a great neighborhood.

We had a great stay in the Sonder flat. It was perfectly located for us in the center of nightlife, great food and bars. As a large group of 6 the flat was a nice size and we slept very well at night. The only drawbacks for us was the lack of kitchen staples (most rental homes include ample sugar, salt, olive oil bottles, etc) and some issues with electricity (the only way to turn on bedroom lights was via turning on the living room light as well and there was lacking useable sockets in the bedrooms). Otherwise, we had a great time and would definitely return with larger groups again.
Awesome area for going out with a lot of cool small restaurants

Great location, coffee across the street and pretty much anything else you need was walking distance. Furniture and floors were cheap, some parts of the floor were broken. The apartment overall was quite sterile and dark.  Not super cozy but served its purpose as a place to sleep and shower.

An amazing place to stay in Montreal! It was a clean, and stylish apartment that offered some great amenities.  However, the best part of the whole apartment is its location. We were close to so many great restaurants, and activities. This apartment is an easy recommendation.
Amazing location, and great value for a spot in montreal

The apartment is big, well located, near good restaurants in Le Plateau. Some parts of the floor were broken and the floor of the kitchen and bathroom were sticking. We asked for an extra cleaning and the concierge in a few minutes answered our message, but unfortunately, even with an extra cleaning the floor was sticking yet. The best part of the apartment is the location.
AMAZING LOCATION. Clean and stylish space. Super fun - best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at.

Great location, comfortable amenities, but what you don’t see (or hear) in the add are: music from the downstairs retail store, noise from the upstairs renters, one bedroom with no windows, outlets, or ventilation, a TV with no cable or antenna access, and street noise. It’s a great rental if you plan to be out and about in Montreal.

This is a great place to rent in the heart of the night life. My friends and I really enjoyed the location and the space was beautiful. It looks even bigger in person than the photos! Thanks for the stay! Would totally stay here again

name: Homely Room in 5-Star New Condo@MTR
summary: Located in Mongkok, close to everything. 2min walk to both Mongkok and Mongkok East station. Gym, sauna and swimming pool (in summer) are available in the clubhouse.   You'll have a private double room. Washroom and kitchen are shared with host. We are family of 3, my husband, 1y old son and me. The guest bedroom can accommodate two people, the 3rd person has to sleep on the couch (3'x6') in the living room.

reviews.txt: 房间很干净,位置超方便,附近吃东西买东西离地铁站大巴都很近,房主一家都是喜欢旅游的,特别热心帮我们规划行程,推荐我们好吃的餐厅,来香港完全没做任何准备也逛得很顺利

1) Well located: close to the Mongkok Metro Station. The bus stop A21 to the airport is also within 6 minutes walking. 
2) Very convenient for shopping.
3) Personal space and privacy is guaranteed for guests: I felt convenient and relaxed while staying here.
4) patient, considerate and friendly hosts: Crystal and her husband are of great help and they are very easy to get along with. When I were leaving, they noticed that I got two pieces of  heavy luggage. They helped me take it to the bus station and saw me off. As a first-time traveler to Hong Kong and a Main-lander, I thank Crystal and her husband for offering me such a pleasant experience.

Great location in heart of Mong Kong. Super clean abd well organized house with all confort you need. Mike and Crystal are very sweet and cheerful person. I enjoyed stayed with them and Sauna at 5 floors was so good.  My first choice in Hong Kong.

This is a clean and beatiful apartment, I really enjoy staying here. Also, Crystal and Alon are very nice. It is the coldest in HK, luckily, with Alon's help, I enjoyed the warm air conditioner and felt warm and safty. Thanks the sweety couple! Highly recommended you to live Crystal's apartment.
真的太棒了,房间是小了点,但是很实在｡房东很好很nice｡非常喜欢那公寓,好豪华,连门卫的素质都超好,服务一流｡高端住所,安全性高｡距离旺角站,旺角东站都好近｡真的很不错｡
房东很nice ,挺热心的,房间干净整洁,很舒服,地理位置很好,离地铁站很近,但又不吵闹,逛街买东西吃饭很方便,下次来还会考虑入住,哈哈
房东夫妇非常的热情,为我们的旅行提供了很多帮助｡房间位于大厦里面,是那种有专门的工作人员开门的那种高级公寓里面,有club house｡房间很温馨,面积不大,但两个人住也够了｡靠近旺角和旺角东地铁站,附近就是女人街和波鞋街,购物非常方便｡附近一家Miss Indian的咖喱饭特别棒,Miss Indian左转左转巷子口一家档口的双拼面粉值得光临,人多需要等位｡期待下次再来香港
很棒的一次住宿体验!首先,住宿的位置优越,出了地铁站没几分钟就到了,离女人街､波鞋街都非常近,附近就很好逛;其次,房东Craystal和阿龙人都非常好,特别热情!会告诉你怎么游玩比较合适,还会给我们推荐去哪里吃东西､买东西,非常nice!下次去香港,还住他家!

Thank you  very much Crystal , for providing such a beautiful and convenient room for us . The room was well decorated and equipped .  The couple , they were really hospitable and  helpful , we immediately got what we wanted when we asked for the ways to Vitoria Bay.   Thank you again Crystal. We will have another go if we go to hk in next time.
Modern n safe building , central located, friendly hosts, comfortable apartment. Highly recommended!!
Great experience. The apartment has premium location and superb facilities. Chrystal and Thl are probably the best host you can expect. Highly recommend!
Crystal's husband meet us at the train station, they are young and nice couple. The apartment is new and located at Mongkok, very near to the MRT (Mongkok East Station).
本次旅途非常愉快!第一日很早就到了旺角东,房东已经早早的在等候我们了｡来到入住地方的大堂,管理职员都很有礼貌地主动问好,进入家里感觉很温馨,摆设都是井井有条并且干净｡为我们准备的房间很舒服｡地理位置是最满意的一点｡如果起得早楼下二楼还有一个酒家在十一点半前有早茶优惠,我同妈妈两个人食得很饱,买单才70港币｡回来可以推荐给身边的朋友｡
很好的住宿体验,年轻的房东夫妇友善热情,提供了很多帮助给我们!地理位置离旺角很近,交通非常方便,也很安全,房间不大但干净整洁,住的温馨舒服,下次来香港还会选择这里!
非常干净整洁的房间,房东人也超级好,虽然交流不多但是有问题必热情解决｡边上走几分钟就是繁荣的旺角地区｡虽然我们基本上都在外面,但是一回来就有回家的感觉｡在香港这个价位应该是住过最好最舒适的地方了!
房间有些迷你,但很温馨,房东夫妇很热心为我们介绍屋内设施使用方法,并为我们提供了许多帮助,会向朋友推荐的
第一次住民宿,Crystal 和阿龙都热情很亲切,给我们推荐好吃好玩儿的地方,对我们很关心｡位置绝佳,大楼环境很好,出去到哪都很方便｡家里也很整洁很温馨,不太大,但是是很实在的,应有尽有,真的很喜欢!超级推荐!下次有机会一定再来｡
房东夫妇很好人,很贴心,也很乐于未我们解决问题!房间很温馨,很舒服!下次来一定会再次选择1!

There is wonderful place.,, I'm highly regard clean,,, also He has very clean room. Everything is perfect. The Host was very kind and civil. He gave us delicious snacks :-) The lodging was taken a share for our trip!! Thankyou for my Host.

홍콩 첫 여행이었기에 침사츄이쪽에 숙소를 잡아야 좋은줄 알았는데 아니었어요 몽콩에 위치한 이 숙소는 다른 장소로도 여행하기 편리했고 시설도 너무 완벽하고 몽콕역에서 숙소까지 오는길도 가깝고 좋아요 그리고 호스트는 정말 친절!! 최고!! 지금도 (Hidden by Airbnb) 으로 연락합니다.  깔끔하고 아늑하고 전망좋고 시설좋고 친절하고 정말 완벽한 숙소입니다. 다시 여행가도 또 지내고싶은 숙소!!

name: Harbourside Apartment - Water Views
summary: This one bedroom apartment is bright and airy with unique views of the Sydney Harbour Bridge, Sydney Harbour and surrounding North Sydney and Kirribilli. One Queen Bed + Sofa Bed, wifi, balcony, undercover parking, 5 minutes to Ferry wharf, 7 minutes to Milsons Point train station, 2 minutes to bus.

host.location: North Sydney, New South Wales, Australia
host.about: I'm a born and bred Sydneysider, working as a Cellist and teacher full time. After living in the apartment myself for many years, I now live around the corner with my husband and daughter. I love living in Sydney and travelling, trying new places to eat and enjoying all the great things to do in our beautiful local area.

reviews.txt: Compact, well-appointed and equipped flat in top location, near public transport and shops. Eleanor is a very responsive and helpful host too.

Lovely compact apartment in a convenient location. Close to nice restaurants in Kirribilli and Milson's point train station. Also a two minute walk from the ferry. Everything we needed was in the apartment and Eleanor quickly sorted out any minor problems we had.

Why would you stay in a hotel when you could stay in this compact but all-you-need apartment in a perfect location just on the north side of the bridge in Sydney?  There are great eateries near by (our favourite - takeaway gourmet burgers overlooking the Opera House and harbour), and train and ferry only a few minutes away. Eleanor was very flexible and everything went very smoothly, and her provision of breakfast food and staples was very helpful.
Recommended.

I booked this for family staying in Sydney for my wedding.  My family members staying here thoroughly enjoyed their stay.  The apartment was comfortable and clean and within a great area for being central whilst also away from the hussle and bustle of the city!!  Eleanor communicated well and helped out with all our queries before and during the booking.  Thank you!

My wife and I stayed at Eleanor's apartment for a week - we were met by Eleanor's mum who showed us around and provided us with a welcome pack of food.  The apartment is perfectly located with bus & ferry 2 minutes walk and trains only 5 minutes away. Kirribilli village is great for local shopping and eating out. The communal laundry one floor down was very convenient. The view of the bridge from the balcony is a bonus. We would definitely recommend Eleanor's apartment to other visitors.

Fabulous location. close to ferry, train and every great eatery that North Sydney has to offer. Fabulous apartment. very quiet retreat with the hustle and bustle only a short ferry ride away or 15 mins walk over the Sydney Harbour Bridge and you're in The Rocks.

We had a wonderful time at Eleanor's harbourside apartment. You really do have a view of beautiful Sydney harbour and the Bridge from her balcony; a lovely spot to sit outside, have a glass of wine and relax. The location couldn't be better - a 2 minute walk to the ferry and within walking distance of the Ensemble theatre, Flying Squadron bar, the cafes of Kiribilli and we even walked past Luna Park round to the restaurants of Lavender Bay. The apartment is cosy and had everything we needed for our stay. Car parking was a bonus for this area.

Everything about this stay was perfect! While I did not meet Eleanor in person, she was very helpful prior to arrival and communicated in a timely manner. The home was great, it's an awesome location, and was well maintained. No surprises here--just a truly wonderful stay. I spent 30 days at Eleanor's home and would stay there again if I came back to Sydney for a long work assignment.

Eleanor's apartment is very well situated with great access to the city by train, bus, ferry or even by walking across the bridge. The apartment was bright and comfortable with a nice view. Eleanor is a conscientious and friendly host.

A beautiful, well presented place in a lovely location. Eleanor is a very welcoming host with a great appreciation of the area and provided plenty of suggestions for what to do/where to go. highly recommend.

Eleanor's place is lovely and both Eleanor and her mother were great to deal with and went out of their way to make me feel welcome and help me out. The flat is really great - it has everything you need, including an amazing view of the harbour bridge, and the obligatory Sydney fireworks!!

Eleanor's place was very clean, comfortable and in a great location, the apartment was well equipped with everything you would need for a stay, including a well stocked fridge, comfortable bed and lounge, and a beautiful little balcony with amazing city views! The fans in the bedroom and lounge were very effective and quiet, and the location was so convenient. It was magical taking the ferry from the city to the apartment on my last night. I would definitely recommend Eleanor's home to other travellers.
Great location, very easy to navigate and perfect for a couple. Thanks for a great stay.

Eleanor was kind to let us check in early.
House manual was comprehensive. Little disappointed with little fridge space for 6 nights stay.  Small area to prepare meals. About shower leakage was told on the day. Mould around screen from wet floor was unhygienic.
Eleanor was great!  Great neighborhood!
The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Eleanor's apartment was very cosy and just a stone throw away from the ferries which allowed us to access the main tourist spots like the Opera House and Harbour Bridge easily. We were welcomed by Eleanor's mom who showed us how to access the property with ease. The apartment was perfect for couples and provided a homely feeling.

We had 3 nights at Eleanor's place and it was perfect. Location, communication, very warm welcome with a fabulous breakfast hamper.  The views from the windows and front balcony are stunning and the locality offers really handy restaurants, cafes, convenience stores. A 10/10 apartment/location.  Thanks so much Eleanor.

Fantastic location! Very easy access to both ferry and train. Shops 5min walk away.  Clean and tidy place,  perfect for a couple or single.  The breakfast basket was much appreciated! Thanks again for having us stay.
Great place. Quiet location. Generous breakfast and great place.

name: Cozy Room at TKL MTR
summary: 我的房源靠近優美的景色､公園､餐廳和餐飲､市中心｡因為舒適的床､廚房､溫馨,您一定會愛上我的房源｡我的房源適合情侶､獨自旅行的冒險家､商務旅行者｡

host.about:
Originally from China.Now working and living in Hong Kong. Enjoy climbing, hiking and travelling around the world. Speak fluent English and Cantonese, native Mandarin speaker.
I am a easygoing and humorous person to get along with. The experience of traveling around world has equiped me with a cross culture perspective and the personality easy to making friends.
I am more than happy to share with you about cultures and my living experience in Hong Kong and other major cities of China.

loc.address: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong

reviews.txt:
First of all, I would give Will a thumb up, who is very considerable and easygoing. He gave me clear instruction to find the location of his house even including the bus to take.
