I had the most amazing time in rio (Website hidden by Airbnb) apartments were fantastic,they were exactly the right spot close to everything and just a small walk to the beach were FIFA fan fest was which was great.fabio and his support crew were there in a blink of eye if I needed them and it surely made my stay  that little bit easier.the neighbour hood was great  safe and  vibrant with the World Cup on the Brazilian  people sure know how to put a party on.lots of fun and an experience I will never forget.thankyou Fabio from Ben de Marco .
This apt was great and Fabio was very organised, professional and friendly. The apt itself is in a great location, very tastefully decorated and I would definitely stay here again when back in Rio.
O apartamento é exatamente como na foto. Super limpo e arejado. Possui todos os utensílios necessários.

Let me start by saying that I loved the apartment. The place is cozy and immaculate. Other than the bed being a bit stiff, I loved being in the apartment. The water was hot, the wi-fi worked perfectly. The only negative that I had about the room was the noise. 

The unit is situated on the 2nd floor of the building right outside a busy street. Every night around midnight, two bars would open up across the and start blaring music. The music would not stop until 8am the next morning. I ended up having to buy a white noise machine just to last through the night.

The only other feedback I had was around Fabio, the host. All of the reviews mentioned how responsive and helpful he was. However that was not the case for me. The day I booked, I couldn't get him to respond to the booking. I even had to have AirBnB call him. And then I asked him about touring the city. Instead of offering, he pointed me to a few self serve options. When I asked again, he said he would plan a trip then never responded. When I responded to him, he said he was too busy and my trip was over. 

Fabio being my tour guide is not a huge requirement, but I had thought he would be more willing (or suggest someone), given the feedback people had for him o this site.

All in all, great place if you don't mind the noise and don't need a helpful host.

Fabio a été adorable.
Il nous a merveilleusement bien accueilli.
Il est très serviable et très gentil.

Fabio is a lovely host and helped point out all the best things to see and do in Rio. This apartment was great, I stayed their on my own and felt very safe. Literally 2 minutes for Copacabana beach. Great flat. A little noisy outside but a very vibrant area.

Thank you Fabio once again! This is the second time that I have rented from Fabio and it has been again a great experience. The apartment is immaculate and in a great location! I look forward to renewing my rentals with Fabio. Communication was very easy and Fabio will make sure you are well accommodated!!

Sem dúvida uma das melhores recepções e serviços que já recebemos!!!!! Primeira vez que usamos o AirBnb. Foi sensacional. O Fábio, que nos recebeu e fez toda parte de receptivo, foi sensacional!!!!!! Nota 10. Super maleável com entrada e saída... Nos ajudou em tudo. Impecável. Mais que recomendo!!!!! Apartamento maravilhoso... Exatamente como nas fotos!!!!! Tudo de primeira. Localização perfeita... Perto de tudo!!!!!!!
Todo excelente! El apartamento es igual a las fotos, todo se encontraba en orden y funcionamiento!

Fabio war wirklich ein sehr aufmerksamer Gastgeber, den man schon im Vorfeld mit allen Fragen zur Wohnung behelligen konnte. Auch einen kostengünstigen Taxi Transfer vom Flughafen zur Wohnung hatte er organisiert. Die Wohnung liegt wirklich sehr zentral in einem sicheren Haus, dessen einem top Zustand, und mitten an der Copacabana gelegen. Für eine Erkundungstour von Rio wirklich eine top Lage. die Wohnung entspricht exakt dem was an Fotos und Beschreibung angegeben wurde. Einziger kleiner kritischer Einwand ist, dass gegenüber der Wohnung eine Disco ist, in der zumindest am  Wochenende die ganze Nacht Betrieb ist, was man in der Wohnung doch sehr hört: Alles in allem aber eine top Unterkunft, und uneingeschränkt weiter zu empfehlen!
O apto é super aconchegante, tudo limpo e de bom gosto. O único problema foi o barulho durante a madrugada.

O Fábio é show. Ótima recepção. O apartamento é ótimo. O prédio é antigo, mas o apartamento é novo, bem decorado, cama ótima, dois televisores com tv a cabo, e banheiro muito bom. O apartamento é nota dez! Bem localizado, pra que vai andar e conhecer Copacabana e o Leme, é tudo perto e bem localizado. O único problema é um bar que fica em frente a janela do quarto. Tem dias, não todo dia, principalmente fim de semana,  que tem barulho e música a noite toda. Mas, creio que no futuro, se for possível colocar uma janela acústica ali, o problema fica resolvido. O apartamento que já é ótimo,  ficará excelente.  Obrigado, por tudo Fábio. Foi top. Abraços.

El departamento es divino! Todo nuevo, muy bien ambientado, cómodo y súper equipado. De verdad lo disfrutamos. La ubicación es muy buena, a 1 cuadra de la playa de Copacabana. Estar cerca el día de año nuevo donde hay tanta gente en copacaba fue importante! La atención de Fabio es súper buena, nos ayudo en todo! Muchas gracias

Fabio was a wonderful host. We arrived much earlier than the check in time so Fabio let us leave our luggage at his home and then brought our bags to the apartment for us when it was ready. He was incredibly helpful and gave us lots of great suggestions about what to do during our stay in Rio. If we had any queries during our stay Fabio was easily contactable. The apartment itself was fantastic. It is bright and modern and has everything you need. The location is perfect, very close to the beach, supermarkets, restaurants etc. Would highly recommend!

name: Large Duplex in Midtown East with backyard!
summary: Enjoy New York at this comfortable duplex. Only a few blocks from the main subway lines and within 15 mins from Grand Central and Central Park by foot, allowing you to reach major points of interest with ease. Close to the Roosevelt Island Tram, providing beautiful view of the city. Near Central Park and a quick ride to the West Side. Quiet apartment, lively neighborhood with premiere dining and shopping right outside of your door.

host.location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.txt:
The duplex is wonderful - it was better even than the pictures. We were pleasantly surprised to find it quiet considering the busy city, and we slept like babies in comfortable beds. 
Joris helped us over text to get us settled in and find anything we needed; communication was super easy and effective. 
We stayed with our two kids, and it was the perfect size for us. The washer and dryer kept us from having to check any luggage, which is always easier when traveling with tiny monsters. 
We'll be returning next year!

Great apartment and super neighbourhood. Great restaurants! Joris was very helpful and our stay in New York went well.
Clean and well furnished apartment, even a small nice terrace. 
A quiet area which we appreciate much.
I can highly recommend both Joris as a host and his apartment.

Joris was great - friendly and accommodating. The duplex is on a lovely sunny quiet street that is very centrally located. The bright rooms, generous sized 2 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms made our stay enjoyable, comfortable and easy. A special treat was the direct access to the courtyard and garden. We highly recommend the place, and would like to stay there again during our next visit to NYC.

The Host was nice and very concerned to make us feel welcome and comfortable. The apartment was nice and comfortable, with plenty of light and a private backyard.  Its location is close to the subway station.

Joris was a great host! 
Check in was easy. Boris was very helpful with all our questions.
The neighborhood is beautiful and location is just perfect.
The apartment is pretty but looks better in the pictures. A/C was not working properly, it keeps turning off.
The patio is great!
Thank you Joris for a great stay!

Location above all perfect - quiet street yet walking distance to grand central, Central Park, 5th ave

Well equipped apartment - good quality furniture / beds. Only 1 airco unit on 1st floor, basement room fairly cool at evening yet could need upgrade with airco too

Host punctual and attentive - providing assistance where needed. Recommended for a stay when in NY

I agree with an other guest who wrote that the flat looks much better on the pictures. We were a bit unlucky because of the flooding downstairs (it is not a fault of the host - of course - but I would have been appriciate it if the carpeter would have come just after our leaving).
The location is great! The arriving and the leaving went very well and easy!
My friends and I had a great experience at Joris' place. It was a wonderful base of operations, close to good places to eat and to subway transit. The beds were comfortable and clean as expected.

Everything was as listed. The location of the place is amazing, about a 15 minute walk to times square and we felt very safe as a group of girls. The house was the same as the pictures shown and totally exceeded our expectations. This is a great find and highly recommended!

Thank you Joris, we had a good time in the middle of Manhattan. Everything is great! Clean , quiet  and cozy.  We found and enjoyed the first class Ramen just at the corner! Recommend for big family or friends!

This apartment is in a very good location. 20 minute walk to Times Square. Close to subway. 10 minutes to closest hop on, hop off bus, so really well situated to enjoy the sights of manhattan. May be large by New York standards, but really very small rooms, other than downstairs bedroom. No natural air flow, so very warm for sleeping. Unfortunately hear every footfall of upstairs tenant , which also impacts on sleep. Good outweighs the bad, however.
Very easy to get in.  I was alone so didn't use the downstairs, but it more than met my needs.  Overall, thumbs up,  so not much more to say.  Perfect place for two couples or a family.

Would we stay again: YES!

What we loved: (1) Location (2) Quietness! (3) Comfortable beds

What we didn't: (1) Initially given wrong address. That made arrival stressful. (2) Plumbing issues - that were fixed very quickly after they were reported to Host (3) TV Remote did not work - which was fixed very quickly when reported to host. (4) Initially no curtain on downstairs outside door so morning sun came in. Solved by rigging up a sheet to cover window in door. (5) Lack of aircon downstairs. Fan only. Downstairs bedroom would be too hot in summer.

After our previous AirBnB was cancelled on the day before our trip to NYC, Joris graciously allowed us to book his flat in Midtown East last minute. He was very responsive to any questions our group had; including being extremely accommodating in allowing us to store our luggage as we arrived/departed before/after check in/out. 

The apartment was perfect. Located in Midtown East near the UN, in an unbelievably quiet neighborhood. Train stops were accessible within a few short blocks of walking distance. Its close proximity to 5th Avenue, Central Park, & Times Square allowed us to have access to all the touristy NYC sites without any of the noise. I'd highly recommend the flat to anyone.

On a side note Joris was in no small way, responsible for salvaging a surprise birthday trip for my girlfriend, which I sincerely appreciate. Thanks again!

I visited New York with my parents at the beginning of October. I lived in New York before and I travel to New York quite often, therefore, I am quite familiar with city. 1. Joris is a very nice person. He is always willing to assist you and to accommodate to your requests. He answers almost immediately all your messages. I am quite grateful with him as we could agree on an early check-in and a late check-out. In fact, my parents are in their 80s and I needed to make the trip a comfortable experience for them. 2. Ups (i) The apartment is extremely well located (51st and Second Avenue). It is in midtown and you can enjoy the city just walking. The subway is three blocks away from the apartment. (ii) Even though in midtown, the neighbourhood is tranquil, neat, charming and not noisy. (iii) For New York standards, the apartment is big. Please consider -if you have never been in New York- that places size tend to be quite small in Manhattan. Space is a luxury in the city. (iv) The apartment is on a first floor which is quite helpful as New York's buildings sometimes do not have elevator (you should always ask if there is one if you are renting an apartment). (v) The apartment has one living - dining room, a small kitchen, two bedrooms and two bathrooms. I will not recommend it for more than 4 people. One bedroom is located on the first floor and the second one is located in the basement. (vi) The apartment is cozy. It looks like in the pictures. (vii) The patio is lovely. It is very unusual to find an apartment with its own access to a patio in New York. (vii) The beds are quite comfortable. I travel a lot and stay in several 4-5 stars hotels. The beds were as comfortable as the ones I find in my trips. 3. Matters to be considered: (i) Being the apartment in an old building you can hear the noise of your neighbours, particularly at night, which may cause troubles for having a restful sleep. My parents, who stayed on the first floor, were awaken some nights for the noise coming from the second floor (around midnight, apparently they move furnitures). (ii) The room located in the basement is particularly noisy at nights. It is next to a corridor where the washing machines are located and which also provides access to the patio. As I slept in that room, I needed to wear ear-plugs for not to be awaken at nights. However, one night not even the ear-plugs helped. I heart people walking and talking in the corridor very late that night. I walked up scared as I thought there was actually somebody in my room! (iii) The door in the basement needs curtains. In fact, there is one door which provides access to the patio with a window which allows people in the patio to see...

El apartemento era estupendo, super bien ubicado, limpio y cómodo. Joris fue el perfecto anfitrión, muy atento y nos puso las cosas muy fáciles en cuanto a llegada y a salida (que nos dejó salir más tarde sin problemas ya que nuestro vuelo salía por la tarde). Sin duda repetiríamos!!!

The duplex with ita back yard is lovely. The neigbourhood is great. Joris is a very attentive and helpful host. 
We found the place Ideal for our extended family: grandfather, grandmother, son and daughter -in -law and three grandchildren.
Hope tp come again 
Prof Tamar Sovran
 and family.

O apartamento é muito conveniente, próximo de zonas muito interessantes da cidade (5ª avenida, palácio da ONU e mesmo times square), com estação de metro e de comboio próximas. Restaurantes e lojas próximas e em grande quantidade. É um apartamento grande (nós éramos 5 e estivemos bem, para 7, com 2 a dormir na sala, chega perfeitamente). Recomendo sem dúvida.
Como pontos menos positivos, refiro que é um apartamento antigo, com os problemas que isso pode trazer. Além do mais, é um pouco barulhento, especialmente por causa dos vizinhos.
Foi sempre fácil comunicar com o Joris e ele resolveu de imediato os pequenos problemas que tivemos.
Not super modern, but good location and very spacious. I would certainly stay again.

Great little place in a very convenient location which we were very lucky to find at the last minute ( after  we made a booking on ar B and B which turned  out to be a fake.
Joris was very responsive and helpful and his place cosy and warm ( although a little drafty at times). We really enjoyed our stay in NYC and being in such a great location

name: GREAT Apartment at Barra da Tijuca
summary: 4 bedroons (2 suites) apartment at Barra da Tijuca. Private condo in front of beach. Security, swinming poll , gym, sauna, kids parking, restaurant and 2 indoors garage. Near mini market, bakers, restaurants, drugstore.. Accomodate 7 persons (8 max).

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about: Sou de Belo Horizonte moro no Rio desde 1998

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Espaço espetacular , hóspedes muito solicitos e claros, 20 metros da praia , infraestrutura próxima muito boa. Vista do apartamento sensacional. Valeu muito a pena , eu e meus amigos voltaremos em breve !!!!
Ótimo lugar, adorei a estadia

O espaço é ótimo , a localização . Adorei a praia em frente e especialmente a comodidade de pedir Refeições pelo Interfone .     Isso foi inigualável !!!!!!    Não precisar sair para restaurantes com filas metas vezes enorme ... Almocei na varanda olhando para o mar . Meu PET adorou passear e deitar na varanda.

Passei o Natal no RJ no espaço do Luiz e foi excelente!
O apartamento tem bastante espaço, totalmente projetado para família com filhos e um condomínio com infraestrutura completa e em frente à praia da Barra.
Isso sem falar na atenção e preocupação do Luiz em saber se estava tudo bem .
Foi ótimo!

El departamento de Luiz es grande, comodo y bonito. Esta muy bien ubicado y dentro de un condominio excelente. La ubicacion es optima. Frente a la playa. Luiz responde siempre rapidisimo y Claudia la persona q nos recibio es muy simpatica. Todo lo q figura en la web es veridico. Super recomiendo este departamento.

Excelente zona. Muy lindos bares.  Excelente condominio. Muy seguro y muy cómodo. Cerca de la playa. Muy linda la pileta y la cancha de tenis. Hermoso el departamento. Muy amplio y muy bien equipado. Todo perfecto
The apartment is great, it has everything you need. It's in a amazing neightboarhood. The facilities are incredible. The a great place for vacation with family.
Excelente atención, excelente el departamento, la playa y la ubicación. Las comodidades sel departamento son insuperables. Es como estar en casa. Recomendable

Una experiencia increíble! Es un departamento inmenso! Muy cómodo, bien decorado, bien calefaccionado, con todo tipo de artefactos de cocina. Claudia nos recibio muy bien al ingresar al lugar. Ella fue muy amorosa. Todo el stand del edificio nos trato muy bien y pudimos hasta ir a la pileta y jugar partidos de tenis sin ningún problema. Queda súper cómodo para ir a la playa ya que queda enfrente. Y hay un mercado a la vuelta de la cuadra. Los precios del bufet del edificio son muy económicos y la comida es riquísima! Muy recomendable! No hubo ninguna queja sobre nada! Luiz Henríque fue en todo momento muy atento al contestar todas nuestras dudas al instante. Muchísimas gracias!

Hermoso departamento tal cual se lo ce en las fotos. Muy buena ubicación y muy seguro. Amplio ,cómodo y muy luminoso. La playa espectacular,mucha seguridad y hermosa zona ,con bares cerca ,minimercado y a pocas cuadras de av de las Américas donde hay de todo.  Volveremos.

Muy buen apartamento y una ubicación genial al frente de la playa.
Luiz se portó excelente!
Estoy seguro que todo aquel que se hospede aquí,verá superada sus expectativas.todo merece 5 estrellas .

Luis y Claudia excelentes personas
La ubicación es inmejorable 
Recomiendo este lugar para familias o grupo de amigos

name: Double/single room, bathroom & garage in Poblenou
summary: My house is a perfect, new and beautiful flat for staying some days in Barcelona. It’s 10 minutes walking to the beach, and 15 minutes walking to two shopping centers (Diagonal Mar/Glories), Agbar tower, Forum or CCIB. It’s well communicated with the rest of the city by tram (Fluvià station) bus (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) (in front of my home) or Metro (Selva de Mar). There is a Touristic Bus Stop near: 300m. And It is 10 minutes walk to one of the most typical streets for eating and drinking: Rambla Poblenou

reviews.txt: Das Zimmer und das dazugehörige Badezimmer sind geräumig, sehr gut eingerichtet und sehr sauber! Die Wohnung ist sehr modern und sehr schön. In der Wohnung gibt es alles was man so braucht.  Die Kommunikation lief sehr zuverlässig und unkompliziert. Die Lage ist fantastisch, es sind nur wenige Minuten zum Strand, aber dennoch sehr ruhig. Ein sehr schönes Einkaufszentrum "Diagonal Mar" ist nur wenige Minuten entfernt. Direkt vor der Tür gibt es viele kleinen Läden und Cafés. Eine Metrostation sowie eine Tramhaltestelle sind auch vor der Tür. Froilán ist ein perfekter und sehr sympathischer Gastgeber! Ich habe mich sofort willkommen gefühlt. Vielen Dank Froilán für die schöne Zeit in deiner Wohnung!

Ich war mit meiner Freundin zum ersten Mal in Barcelona und das war meine erste Unterkunft, die ich über Airbnb gebucht habe.
Ich muss sagen wir waren wirklich positiv überrascht. Er hat uns vom Flughafen zu unserer Unterkunft und wieder zurück zum Flughafen mit seinem Auto gebracht und zwar gratis. Er wollte einfach nichts von uns nehmen. Für die Stadteroberung haben wir ebenso gratis zwei Fahrräder bekommen. 
Die Wohnung befindet sich in einer sehr guten Lage, bis zum Strand braucht man weniger als 15 min. Die Wohnung ist sehr schön eingerichtet mit einem Balkon mit tollem Ausblick über die Stadt. Der Gastgeber war fast nie in der Wohnung und wenn er kurz da ist war er sehr hilfreich und hat uns insider Tipps gegeben. Zum Schlafen hat er ein eigenes Zimmer mit eigenem Bad und WC, somit komplett getrennt von uns. Ganz ehrlich kann ich diese Unterkunft jedem empfehlen und ich hoffe wir werden wieder mal Froilans Gäste sein :)

Frolian was a fantastic host and we thoroughly enjoyed out stay in his flat! The location is great, flat was stunning and spotless. Froilan was absolutely sweet and he made us feel at home. He was really helpful and advised us on how to get round in Barcelona and he even helped with our transfer to and from the airport. If i go back to Barcelona i would definitely want to stay at his flat again!

Froilán is a very courteous , likeable and pleasant host. 
Before my arrival he has been in touch with me constantly via (Hidden by Airbnb) . 
The apartment and my room were super clean and also decorated very tastefully. The kitchen has a full equipment, and I was allowed to use everything. 
During my trip Froilán told me great tips to see some beautiful places in Barcelona. I felt very comfortable and would definitely come again. 

Thank you very much Froilán!!!

Froilán is a very kind and helpful person, he was really interested in us, helped us out with all problems (he reserved a parking spot with his car for us), gave us a lot of insider tips for Barcelona and much more.
The flat is really nice and clean, we had our own room and own bathroom.
We used the modern kitchen a lot and enjoyed nearly every meal on the beautiful balkony.
All in all, 5 stars and a big Thank you to Froilán!

Froilán est un super hôte, il nous a super bien accueilli et même réservé une place pour notre voiture afin de ne pas devoir chercher une place. L'appartement était super propre et la chambre parfaite. on a passé un très agréable séjour, et cest certains que nous retournerons lors d'un  mon futur trip à Barca!

Froilan was amazing! He got me from the airport and insistet not to take any money from us. Besides, he offered me all the comfort and even sth to drink and fruits. His appartment is very clean and good value. With tram or bus you will get quickly to any place in Barcelona. Great value for money.

Froilan is a perfect host for a dream vacation.

The house is absolutely amazing, the location is perfect and very close to the best beaches, you basically have everything you'll ever need in his beautiful modern flat. 

He is extremely helpful and answered our messages during our stay within seconds and advised us with all the tips to make the best of our stay. 

Froilan thank you so much for the amazing hospitality and we owe you so much for this. 

Don't hesitate to catch this place - you will never regret - promise!

Froilan is super-friendly, very helpful and he will do everything to make you feel like at home. Apartment is pristine, accessible (including balcony!) and very close to La Rambla Poblenou - best place to eat in Barcelona. Room is spacious and very comfortable.
The apartment is very comfortable, very clean and you can really enjoy your stay there. Froilan us really a fantastic and kind host who always smiles.

My stay at Froilán's was perfect. He was greatly helpful and his place is very nice. I went to Barcelona because of a Conference, but I could enjoy the city as well, which is wonderful! Definitely, I would visit Barcelona again and would stay at the same place! :-)

everything was just great. the owner is very outgoing, caring and sympathetic person! location of the apartment in a nice area, 10 minutes - and you are at the sea. near a supermarket and mini-shops that are open around the clock. we are fully satisfied with our trip!!!

Nous avons été accueillis très chaleureusement par Froilàn qui nous a d'abord trouvé un emplacement pour la voiture. Après la visite de l'appartement et les explications sur les commodités des lieux, notre hôte nous a même offert une bouteille de vin local que nous avons fortement appréciée. La chambre est agréable et la salle de bain indépendante est un plus.
Froilàn a toujours été à l'écoute de nos besoins par message parfois et qu'il a su même anticiper parfois.
Froilàn est gentil, serviable, discret et de bonne compagnie.

Friolan was amazing!! You could not ask for a better host!! His house was the only place we stayed where we had access to a/c and we're able to make the house cooler.  INCREDIBLE!! Out of 8 stays in Spain  his house was the ONLY one that matched the amenities listed on his page!!  Very clean and he went above and beyond for us.  You will not regret staying with him.  And he was extremely helpful and willing to give suggestions.  10 STARS!!

Froilán is a fantastic host, communicates quickly, and has an excellent, clean, and comfortable home. The bed is also support comfortable. What more can I say that hasn't been said? I would recommend this place and I would consider staying here again in the future. Froilán was also gracious enough to give me a ride to the airport as well.

Au top ! Froilàn est un très bon hôte, son accueil et ses conseils nous ont permis de passer un très bon séjour (malheureusement trop court). Son appartement est à proximité du tram et métro pour un accès facile en ville. La chambre est propre, pas bruyante et une salle de bain privative, un vrai confort. Nous recommandons fortement :)

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour chez Froilàn, un accueil chaleureux et beaucoup de bons conseils.
L'appartement est bien situé, joliment décoré, propre et agréable. Les photos et le descriptif correspondent fidèlement. Le parking et sa douche privative sont un plus :-) 
Une très bonne adresse à recommander.
Muchas gracias Froilàn !!

I usually don't take the time to write reviews, not because I don't want to, I just always forget to, but for him, it's a MUST! It was a great experience! He will make you feel like home. Good place. Good location. Good value. Good host. Good everything! Thanks again for hosting.
Everything in the apartment was great. Froilan was a great host.

Froilán was our favorite host during our two-week trip to Spain. He is super nice, friendly and professional. He really made us feel at home. More than at home, actually! His home is beautiful, modern and very clean.

He went out of his way to help orient us at the beginning of the visit, telling us how to best use public transportation and pointing out all of the key attractions in the city. Some of his suggestions were highlights of our vacation. 

When we were getting ready to leave and drive to our next destination, he packed us the most delicious oranges which we snacked on for the next several days. 

We cannot recommend Froilán enough. We are now back home, a week and a half later and we we are still talking about what a great person and wonderful host he was!

name: Lovely ap at Leblon beach
summary: Ap amplo, claro e arejado localizado no melhor ponto do Leblon, à 1 quadra da praia, Lagoa, restaurantes, supermercados, farmácias e shopping.  São 3 quartos que acomodam confortavelmente 5 pessoas. Sala de jantar e estar. Cozinha e área de serviço. É possível fazer tudo a pé e desfrutar de toda a beleza do bairro mais charmoso do rio.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
Dona Sonia foi uma excelente anfitriã. O apto estava impecável, sem nada a reclamar. Ela inclusive deixou água e cervejas gelada na geladeira, camas arrumadas, toalhas no banheiro, novos sabonetes e até alguns remédios em caso de emergência. Também se ofereceu  para ajudar várias vezes e se mostrou 100% a disposição. 

O apto é perfeito: amplo, arejado, muiiiito bem localizado. Há 1 quadra da praia, rodeado de bares, bons restaurantes, lanchonetes, healthy foods, hamburguerias, temakerias etc. Garantia de economia de tempo de deslocamentos, porque dá para fazer tudo a pé.

name: Cozy Queen Guest Room&My
summary: Mong Kok MTR E1 walk 100 meters, shopping, eating is very convenient. There are two large beds, private bathroom, hot water 24 hours within simple and clean and comfortable rooms. Free WIFI. A21 Airport Express shuttle. Highly recommended to stay.

host.about:
每次旅行都是一种到达别人家做客的体验｡自己有好几处单位,住不了那么多,多半出租,我是位非常好客的人,也是很喜欢旅行!不管你是商务出差还是旅游度假,来我家住吧,很高兴能和你成为好朋友!给你们的旅行一个安全干净舒适实惠的居住环境｡
P.S:如你订好,请留个言给我~O(∩_∩)O谢谢~(Complete payment, please leave a message ~)
During the period of stay: if you are not Chinese, please leave a message directly to me, you need to, immediately to make arrangements for your service
可以加我 (Hidden by Airbnb) (You can add me (Hidden by Airbnb) 
)ID: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

reviews.txt: You pay for what yoy get. Pretty decent for the price you pay. The receptionist was really nice. Location is great and close to mtr but bathroom isnt as clean.
地方細細,但住得舒服,近旺角熱鬧地帶
首先地理位置真的很好,交通方便,楼下就是地铁,吃和购物方面也很方便就手;但是大厦人比较复杂,房东人还是很NICE的,容易沟通,可是,房间卫生真的比较差,地上和床上都有头发,还有气味,不知道床单有无换,噪音也大得很!以后我不会入住了｡
The place was a bit difficult to find but overall, it was a great location. Close to train and bus stations, as well as to commercial establishments. All in all, we had a great stay.
其实主要还是房东人好,挺热情的,中文很棒棒,房间么性价比不是很高,大床房有点小失望,还是标间的好｡地理位置很好,就在旺角中心
店主很好
it's good for a couple of days
交通便利,很实惠,房东很热情

방은 사진과 달라요.
창은 작고 빛이 안들어와서 없다고 생각하면 됩니다.
담배냄새나고 가른 투숙객이 떠드는 소리 잘 들립니다.

방 내부는 그럭저럭 괜찮아요.
에어컨 괜찮고 온수 잘나옴. 딱 요금 정도의 품질..

90년대 감성

name: Room on the waterfront
summary: Welcome to Manly and our beautiful seaside apartment. I hope you will enjoy your stay here being only a short walk to Manly while being so close to the beach.

host.about:
Outgoing  New Zealander who after living in the UK and in France decided to return to the beach life at Manly.
I've spent 20 years in Manly and have become part of the community.
I love the outdoors and swim all year round at the beach at my doorstep.
My favourite time is being at the outside  but being
a kiwi I love being anywhere to watch a rugby match.

I'm looking forward to sharing my home with considerate, outgoing people who want to make the most out of life.

reviews.txt: This place is a gem. Maria is super friendly and generous with her time and pantry supplies. The water really is that close!! The location spectacular to look at and snorkel or just chill out with a coffee on the walkway. The room is very spacious and the window seat just makes you want to connect with your inner cat. We had an amazing time and can't wait to plan another trip to Sydney.
Maria is a great host made us feel at home straight away. The room is amazing and makes relaxing a breeze.

Maria and her partner Gerry were warm, quiet and friendly. I was made welcome and provided with plenty of directions to find the beautiful space which was shared with me... The bay window photo says it all about the iconic building and the sensational location. For me , real is what I love to experience, and real is what I got... The location and neighbourhood  make this a perfect relaxation point... Older style building with charm and character and great food and coffee right under the window and 5 mins oceanside walk into Manly...

First experience in Manly with Maria is really wonderful. The room is so spacious and bright just as displayed in the album. We enjoy the sunrise and breakfast on that colourful balcony very much. Maria and her husband are warm sunshine in chilly windy Sydney. We really appreciate their hospitality and kindness. Looking forward to our next visit to that shiny sea and this cute accommodation.

We loved our stay at Maria's. You could not get any closer to the water and her and her hubby were super friendly and welcoming.

We will be back!

Maria's hospitality is amazing and makes her guests feel most welcome. We arrived a little later in the evening, and she had all our needs taken care of. Her apartment is in an amazing location, 10min walk to the centre of Manly, and overlooks the ocean. It was a pleasure to stay with Maria and would like to return to experience the location again.
Very well presented and an amazing position !
Very good - great position and Maria and Jerry were lovely

Maria's and Jerry's place is a real gem!! I've Airbnb-ed a lot in the past months here in Sydney and I must say this place was my absolute favourite of all :) It's a cosy piece of paradise with the most beautiful view, directly above the ocean, super huge bedroom that feels like its own little apartment, incredibly cute decorations, a super comfy huge bed, extremely lovely hosts and a neighbourhood and area that is truly feeling like a millionaires paradise :) Sitting in the pillows at the huge window, or hearing the ocean in bed and having a coffee, ocean breeze or swim right below the apartment felt like the ultimate vacation, I can't recommend it enough!! :) Thank you to both of you for sharing your little paradise :)

Amazing location, snorkelling, surfing & gorgeous shelley beach right on your doorstep. Loved coffee at the boathouse and falling asleep to the sound of the ocean. Maria & Jerry are great hosts,very friendly and helpful. Their apartment is in a worldclass location. Stunning. Felt priviliged to stay there.I had a great time. Thanks guys,will see u all soon! X

La habitación es muy cómoda, y la vista es espectacular! Muy cerca del Corso de Manly, la playa y cafes. Muy buena comunicación con María y con Jerome. Si volviera a Manly seguro alquilaría de nuevo la habitación!
Fantastic room. Fantastic location. Although I never got to meet Maria who was away, Jerry was a fantastic host. A not to be missed room and location.

Maria was off jetsetting when I came to stay ( half her luck ! ), but ensured that I was in good hands with the charming Jerome - well, he's French, so charming of course ; )

It's difficult to think of a more stunning spot in Sydney than this iconic building, above the cafe along the Shelley Beach board walk - tranquility itself, no matter the weather.

Thank you so much guys - I'll certainly stay again.
Amazing stay!

Wow, what a view for such a great price. It was like being in the ocean. Amazing room so very comfortable and the hosts were super duper hosts, never there but always checking in. Loved my stay.. it was a special time. Thank you

Maria and Jerome's place was absolutely fantastic... the location was perfect for our long weekend trip away. Close to fabulous cafes, restaurants and the most beautiful beaches.

The window seat is to die for... the activity outside in the water of swimming, surf skis and divers is very cool to watch before starting the day's activities.

I didn't get to meet Maria but her commutation and friendliness was amazing, she gave us tips of where to go, where to eat and things to do.

We met Jerome half way through our stay and he was so lovely and made us feel very welcome.

Would absolutely recommend... I want to go back already!

Maria and Jerome are such lovely hosts. They really know how to give you your privacy for your holiday (which I very much appreciate), but they are always there when you need them via text/call/Airbnb message, which is greatly assuring. They have awesome recommendations on local places (including places with local deals) and the room does not let your expectations down. The view is absolutely amazing, no matter the weather. The room and amenities are very clean, with extra towels and sheets in the cupboard, should you need them. I was worried about heating since it's winter and the listing didn't have heating ticked, but they provided a thermostat heater that kept us nice and cosy. Another cute thing to note was the deco. There's an adorable kiwi bird toy and some binoculars that we took advantage of with the great view from the window. Also, go up to the terrace! You definitely won't be disappointed at Maria's :)
Thank you so much for sharing your awesome accommodation, "a piece of heaven on earth " ! Hope to come back one day...
Magnifique endroit et vue de la chambre ! Accueil très chaleureux ! Tout était parfait ! N'hésitez pas !

Perfect location at Manly with a stunning view.  An easy stroll to Manly and the wharf with breathtaking views along the way.  Maria and Jerry were charming and friendly and willing to share their knowledge of the local area.  So much to see on the beach side of Sydney and away from the crowds of the city.  Highly recommend.

name: B4.Walk to MTR 1 min/Economy room/Twin single bed
summary: Our room is conveniently located in Hong Kong’s renowned commercial and entertainment district at Jordan.Located on Nathan’s Road,near Tsim Sha Tsui. 1-5 minute walk to the MTR,Airport Bus Stop,Yue Hwa Chinese Products,Prudential Center,Park Lane Shopper’s Boulevard,SASA,Bonjour,Mannings,Watsons,Temple Street Night Market,Australia Dairy Company,Tsui Wah Restaurant,Hui Lau Shan,7-ELEVEN. Whether you’re in town for business or pleasure,we will be your best choice.

host.about:
Welcome To Hong Kong
欢迎来到香港

reviews.txt:
还是不错的｡
照骗照骗,肯定没有照片看起来那么金碧辉煌｡会比你想象的更小,更简陋｡但是这个价格,作为洗澡休息的地方,也是符合要求了｡
另外客房工作人员态度很好,不认识路她还拿出地图给我们指路｡
房型和图片上没有差,离澳洲牛奶公司不远,离车站也蛮近的｡点赞
有待改进
Very good location and easy to go everywhere
地理位置很好 性价比很高 虽然很小 但是简洁 设施齐全
房间足够大,大概有8-10平米左右,2个人1晚的价格不到500,算很亲民了｡有提供免费的WIFI,矿泉水(冷､热),房间也有空调,温度虽然不能调节,但温度设置比较低,适合香港这样比较热的地方,晚上睡觉很舒服,也不吵｡
I’m sorry but this room looks prettier in the photo but not in person. They should improve the cleanliness of the place itself. We stayed here for 1 hour and left right away.
住宿的地方非常方便,走走就能到尖沙咀的崇光百货,离地铁站非常近,很方便｡房间除了小点没毛病｡
与描述一致,房间干净无异味,位置比较好找｡
过来住2次了 感觉性价比很高  很满意 m明天还是打算去这里

초행길에 주소만을 찾아갔는데 근처에서 조금 헤매긴했어요. 그러나 잘 알고 간다면 아주 찾기쉬운 위치에 있습니다. 
지하철 출구 잘 알고 가세요. 
와이파이가 잘 안터져서 조금 답답할수도 있어요.
숙소는 조용하고 가격대비 나쁘지 않았으나 큰공간 럭셔리함을 생각한다면 고급호텔로 가시는게 나을 거 같아요.
这个价格能住到有窗的房间,性价比很高,房东也很热情,去哪里都会很详细的告知,很棒的体验
交通是真的便利,而且房东很友善hen tie x很贴心啊~
Great location
还是不错的,在闹市区,周围吃东西或者坐地铁都很方便,但是晚上并不吵,我已经满足了,只是找个地落脚睡觉没什么太大要求,交通还是很方便的,治安也可以了｡
老板人很好,香港的正常房子,独立卫浴比较干净
总体很棒,这个价位的房子已经算是非常不错的了,但其实是酒店不算是民宿,地理位置非常好,在香港中心,去哪里都近,而且楼下就是地铁口,房间打扫的也很干净,每天会有人收拾垃圾,个人认为唯一不好的地方是隔音还可以提高,因为在市中心时时刻刻下面都是车来车往的,另外空调很差,效果暂且不提,空调噪音巨大,有待改进,谢谢~
性价比不错 位置不错 房间没有脏乱差  值得这个价格
在香港算得上是性价比很高的住宿地方啦,房间比想象中得大,设施齐全
很好,交通很方便

name: Direct Beach/Ocean front, 20 Steps to the Water!
summary: Please read entire listing prior to booking to ensure my unit is as good fit for your travel needs! :) Amazing location & view! Remodeled 2Bd/2ba condo located right on the ocean/beach w/ breath-taking ocean views. Relax by the ocean-front pool or walk down the steps to take a dip in the ocean for some  snorkeling! Located next to Honokowai Beach Park in West Maui, only a short distance to Ka'anapali, Kahana, Lahiana & Napili. Centrally located to many tourist attractions & local favorites.

reviews.txt: The host was very friendly and responsive, the place was right on the beach in a very well kept complex.

A great value for the money. This unit was nearly perfect for us, in consideration that we were there for the atmosphere, not a fancy hotel experience. The view of course is unbeatable. If this unit were any closer to the ocean, it would have fish in it. It's in a smaller complex, with nobody above you. 

The neighborhood is okay; appeared to be safe, and there are some eating/shopping options close by, but most restaurants and shops you may want to go to are a little further afield, but not more than a 3-5 minute drive (Kaanapali itself is about 10 minutes away, which is a good thing in my opinion). The road the complex is on is fairly busy, but not too noisy (most cars are going pretty slow here), see more below.

The complex itself is pretty old but appeared to be very well-maintained. There's a small beach adjacent to the complex that's okay for recreational bathing but not a destination in itself. The overall vibe was very private and intimate; a very friendly atmosphere. The pool was a huge added bonus for us; the kids wanted to use it practically every day. Honokowai Park was on the other side of the complex; we didn't go here, but the recon I did on a walk gave me the impression that the park was okay but nothing to write home about.

The overall noise level here was very minimal; no loud guests or screaming kids. There is some road noise in the front bedroom, and although I wasn't in that bedroom, it wouldn't have bugged me, and I'm a light sleeper. 

The baths were very nice and almost resort-y; overall, they were very clean although the grout could use a good cleaning, just saying. The kitchen was more than adequate for our needs, and had quite a bit of storage space. We also used the barbecues on premise a couple of times; they're impeccably maintained.

The only thing that is a drawback to this place in my opinion is that the loft can get quite stuffy, even with the fans going full blast. We were there in August, and several nights up there were fine, some others were uncomfortable, and there was 2 nights where it was extremely hard to sleep up there.

So overall, this place is perfect if you value a tranquil atmosphere with a killer view, in a nice unit in a pleasant complex, at a fair price. If you have enough guests to where you have to utilize the loft, the weather may be a roll of the dice as to how comfortable it is.

Angelica's apartment is excellent and the view is out of the world. Centrally located to almost everything from farmers market right across the street to malls to dining options to beaches to hikes to water sports. My kids 2 and 5 had a blast watching turtles from the patio and did not want to come back. I cooked many meals and enjoyed our dinners watching the sun set. The only thing i wish is this place had an AC coz the afternoons were very warm and the apartment felt like an oven. Nights get cooler though. We will be definitely going back again. Angelica is an amazing host and she was very prompt in answering all my questions. Thank you for having us stay in your gorgeous apartment.

Angelica responded quick and was very helpful whenever I had any questions about the stay. 
The description is accurate. It was a great place to stay with useful amenities that made the stay better.  Having the beach so close made a trip to the beach hassle free. The balcony served as the perfect spot to catch the sunset. 
Location of the apt was great. It was walking distance to restaurants and stores. The drive to Lahaina and Kaanapali was easy. There is also a park around the complex that looked very nice with shaded areas. 
Overall, it was a very good stay and space for a family.

Made a last minute decision to stay here the day before we arrived which can always be risky when you don't have time to research but we had a great time. Good location to stay on the west side. Definitely a great value for the price. Hard to get a view like this without paying an arm and leg. No AC but it is pretty windy on Maui and you get good air flow through the unit. Might be too hot for some especially if they are sleeping in the loft. Local health food grocery store is across the street along with a Boss frogs to rent paddle boards, bikes and snorkeling equipment. Many of the best beaches and snorkeling as well as downtown Lahaina within 10-15 minute drive.
Great experience!  Our host was awesome and helped with all my questions. Very clean and comfortable. Only steps from the ocean! My family enjoyed eating meals out on the balcony! Highly recommend

We stayed at this condo for 5 days in early October 2016 and had a great time! So close to all the best snorkelling spots and not too far from restaurants, etc in Lahaina. Farmers market (more of an organic and gluten free market) and coffee shop are a 2 minute walk and there is a nice little beach next to the pool. From the balcony we watched sea turtles feeding on the rocks and beautiful sunsets. Loved this Air BnB!

Skøn bolig lige i vandkanten. Dejlig badestrand,  hvor også skildpadder nyder at tumle sig.
Lejligheden er ren og pæn og har stort set alt, hvad man har behov for. Der bliver lidt trangt, hvis man er mere end 4 Pers., men det gik OK for os at være 5.
Vi brugte terrassen hele tiden. Derfra er der den flotteste udsigt.
Området blev passet fint, og lækker pool hører til komplekset. Roligt kvarter med gode indkøbsmuligheder.
This is THE best place to stay. It is clean, quiet, and well-equipped. The beach is private and beautiful. I would highly reccomend it to anyone.

Angelica was an excellent host. The location and amenities were perfect and accurately described. We found it hard to leave our little oasis as everything we needed was close to home. Thanks again for sharing your home with us Angelica!
The host texted me with all the information, everything was  great.

Loved this place!  Perfect for a family of 3-4. The view does not disappoint at all and the complex is fastidiously maintained. The beach next door is perfect for little people playing in the sand and/or breakers. We saw turtles in the water everyday and one came up to rest on the beach the last day! 

The loft gets warm and we were there in November. I can't imagine August. 

We would absolutely go back!
Perfect location and right on the beach.

I really appreciated how easy it was to contact Angelica and how quickly she responded. The condo was exactly as listed, if not, better! Location was great, a little quieter and less busy. It was wonderful falling asleep to the rolling waves every night! We could see turtle and whales spouting from our Lanai! Would definitely suggest her place to anyone that wants to have a clean,
Comfortable and beautiful place to stay in maui!
Beautiful place in a beautiful area. The condo was as advertised which is all you can ask for when booking outside of a resort to have a truly authentic Hawaiian vacation.
Great property. Little local stores and park close by. Good snorkel area

Angelica's place was great.  As others have noted, there is no air conditioning; however, with the trade winds and ceiling fans the condo stayed a nice temperature. There is a farmer's market, coffee shop, and lunch places a few blacks away.  The best part was the small beach just out back.  It was perfect to spend a day at or visit after driving around the island.  Everyday that we were at this beach we saw turtles swim right next to us!

The location was incredible...small private beach, amazing sunsets, private pool and walking distance to a few stores/restaurants. On the down side, the master bedroom is close to the street, so there is road noise from the occasional bus and a steady flow of traffic. There is no AC, so the condo can get warm during the day, but it cools off at night. The blinds in the master bedroom don't close all the way, so morning sun floods the room making you an early riser...all the better to get your day on Maui started.  Overall, we had a great stay and would consider HaleKai again!

Very well located and furnished property.  Close to the nearby Honokowai park/beach (with resident turtles!), the grocery stores, great spots for restaurants and nightlife within ten minutes.  The view from the balcony is fantastic.  The unit stayed cool during the nights and mornings but did get hot in the afternoon given there is no A/C and the unit faces west.  I recommend using the fans to help with the circulation and also keeping the windows and shutters open for cross-ventilation. Would highly recommend the property!

Beautiful location - it as nice having a pool too for those of us that didn't get in the ocean.  Liked being able to walk to shops, grocery and small restaurants.  The snorkeling was really fun up and down the coastal area.  We saw lots of turtles and other sea life.

name: linda casa com piscina em condomínio e arrumadeira
summary: casa em condomínio fechado, à 7 km do parque olímpico. salão em 2 ambientes, excelente cozinha, lounge de frente para a piscina, churrasqueira, 2 amplas suítes ar condicionado, armário embutido, 3 tvs de led, lavanderia, decoração, lindo jardim.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
Luiz and family met us when we arrived in Rio and drove us to the house. It was wonderful to have them greet us in a foreign city where we may have struggled to make our own way.
The house was very comfortable and having a maid service made our stay there very relaxed. Luiz and Lillian responded very quickly when we did have a little problem and got things put right very quickly.
We really appreciated the transport provided by Lillian's father Willian on several days.
Overall a marvellous experience.

name: BEST REVIEWS*BEST MALLS*SAFE STAY*DIMSUM*CWB*MTR
summary: Location is OUTSTANDING as MTR Causeway BAY is within 1 min walk. You are in the very heart of a fancy busy shopping attractive Causeway Bay. There can be few homes as beautiful and practical as this one, from the  interior of the reception and 3 bedrooms and 2 pretty bathrooms. Ideal for Families --- within a stroll to Victoria Park with swimming pool, the very best spot for brand shopping, and thousands of food stalls, international restaurants, cafes, and bars are in the immediate area.

host.about: The world is my home.... always looking for fresh ideas and working with locals in countries all over the world.

reviews.txt: Susan and her team are fabulous.  They received us at the apartment and explained how everything worked.  The location is unbeatable.  We had a really good time.

The apartment is very near the Metro system and plenty of shops and restaurants nearby. Very good service from manager on arrival and also from the staff at entrance to the building during our stay. The apartment itself is in our view somewhat smaller than it appears on the photos - the sofa pictured accommodates no more than 2 persons of european size.

My wife and our 2 children stayed in the apartment for a week. It was perfect for us. Great location very close to MTR and in the middle of busy Causeway Bay. Wjile the apartment was small by western standards it was good for us and gave everybody their own space. A much better option than a hotel. The fridge and small kitchen were functional and allowed us to prepare small snacks and breakfast if we wanted. Let's face it you will be mainly eating out in HK. All communication with Susann, Joanna & Szilvi was prompt, professional and helpful. We would recommend highly.
Perfect apartment in the Center of Honkong island, we enjoyed our stay for 4 days and I can recommend 100%. The service prior arriving is well organized. I plan to come again for the next exhibition.

Everything went well from the beginning. We got picked up by the driver and arrived safely at the apartment. The host was awesome and she kept our luggages after we checked out which, I am extremely grateful. The apartment was typical HK, small, cosy, efficient use of space and in a perfect location. Only downside is there isn't a safe deposit as advertised but didn't bother me much.  Would recommend as well as return again!

Our trip to Hong Kong could not have been a better experience and many of those thanks were due to the hospitality of Susann and her team. There were four of us arriving throughout different points of the night and having an apartment with an electronic code vice keys was extremely helpful. The apartment was clean, and the beds were very soft. This was my third stay in HK and in comparison to the other apartments this was slightly bigger than average. Located in Causeway Bay, there are tons of shops around and you are easily within walking distance to michelin star rated dim sum (at which we ate at twice in four days). Susann and Alessandra were extremely thorough, with an extensive helpbook provided to cover all your needs from dry cleaning to police to food. I highly recommend staying at this location, as everyone involved was extremely communicative and helpful! I would definitely stay here again, as I plan on continuing to visit my favorite city throughout Asia.

The overall experience was great. Susann was very communicative and supportive of our requests.  Via who was our local point of contact was also very welcoming and helpful.  The apartment is a good size by Hong Kong standards.  It had all the amenities as described and I appreciated that a blender was added to the kitchen appliances.  The location is very convenient to local shopping and MTR.   

The only challenge was that the bedrooms have very poor curtain blinds that dont block the light so there is no let up from the lights from the next door buildings and the 6am sunrise.

thanks again for a wonderful stay!
My friends and I had a fantastic time at Susann's place. The location is incredible and the apartment was comfortable to fit three adults. I would highly recommend this place!

The response from the host especially prior to check in is very prompt and very accommodating with our requests. Perfect apartment for a family holiday in Hong Kong. Location is excellent, close to the MTR, shops and restaurants. The concierge/pick up services I think is just as good as major hotels. The security of the flat is also very good and certainly felt very safe. The flat was well appointed and Via, our local contact was very helpful and accommodating. All in all, a great experience!

We stayed 3 nights at POSHandGO apartment and  the location was great. Walking distance to mall, shop, eateries, bus stop, MTR station, etc. The apartment building was next to Cafe de Coral and Food Republic; so nothing to worry when it came to meal time. The host was very courteous. Overall, we had a wonderful holiday experience =)

We had an amazing time at Susan place. We were picked up promptly from Airport. Via was very helpful. She even provided us a baby stroller than we needed for a few days. The apartment was cozy. The best thing about this place is location. Just 1 min to MTR and Hysan Place Mall..

Susann is the best host! Love her!she haves me much help ,and she is so nice .the house is very beautiful more than the picture ,room is very clean ,and the bed is very comfortable,very quite,we sleep very well all the night ,downstairs has much more delicious restaurants ,great location!I will be here when I next time come to hong kong !susann and via makes us so warm and welcomed !

absoluly highly recommend! First, great location: expecially for family trip. very near MTR and all the best shopping area in HK. Second, check in & out are both convenient, Via is helpful and also Susanna, sweet host they are. come to pick up us with the heavy luggage. Finally, the apartment is useful as HK size is always cozy but, here, totally enough space for us (three adults and two kids). we will definely come back again for such family trip.

The space in HK is limited, but Susann's kindness and hospitality is unlimited . She's the best host and her apartment is very nice. It is a harbor for us while we stayed in HK. She always understand our difficulties and offered her help immediately. 
Thank you Susann. Just like my daughter said, we like you and your apartment.

Affordable rates. Conveniently located in front of Hysan Place. Where Times Square is also of walking distance. The apartment is nice and clean. Complete with kitchen utensils. A/C works great. The only problem is that the toilets were too small; some of the faucets were broken and the doorknobs of the bedrooms could not be locked.
房子的地理位置很好,房子很干净,三个房间装修都不错｡
房子很好很干净

This is my first experience with Airbnb and it was wonderful. Suzann is very helpful right from the beginning｡The apartment was nice and comfort as pictured , location is the best, right at the center of causeway bay.
nice apartment!great location!everything is perfect, but the washing room is small. I love the apartment!
It was a very good location for traveler. And Susan is really nice and have very good introduction of her house. Great experience.

name: Luxurious, bright, spacious Plaza Catalunya
summary: Magnificent apartment situated in the heart of Barcelona. Located in a prestigious building with concierge next to Rambla de Cataluña, this apartment is the ideal choice to accomodate up to 6 people. The apartment is composed by an entrance hall, living room, dining room and a fully equipped kitchen with all the kitchen utensils. There are 2 dormitories with 2 single beds, a big bedroom with a double bed and two bathrooms.  Tourist licence HUTB - 003179.

host.about:
We are owners of several apartments Tendency Group located in the city center of Barcelona and are proud of offering our guests a personalised service together with high quality apartments. 
We are travelers like you and understand and try to meet and exceed your expectations.

reviews.txt:
Lovely and very central apartment in the heart of Barcelona. It's position made exploring the city very easy either on foot or using public transport. Plenty of shopping areas and restaurants around and a lovely organic and vegetarian shop near by. 

The apartment is quite airy but unfortunately the blinds do not work in the rooms so there is no natural light. Even though the apartment is very central all the windows are on internal patios ( the living room windows are enormous and let lots of light) which makes it very quiet.

We had a lovely time and we certainly will use it again when we return to Barcelona.
Great neighbourhood, and very central.

Apartment clean, wide and cozy. Near to Casa Battlò, Placa de Catalunya and many restaurants, it's a perfect place for families. The host was kind and helpful, we didn't have any problem during our stay.

Bel appartement très bien placé et silencieux. 
Par contre pas de parking comme indiqué et pas de demodulateur pour avoir des chaînes françaises
the apartment has very central  location, near to Placa Catalunia. It is bright, beautiful and comfortable, with all the ecquipment one can need. good for 5-6 people. Thanks to Tendency!
Increíble! Súper buena la ubicación y un departamento de lujo!
Very well located and great looking place.

Very good location and flat. Everything was perfectly clean, bright and as described. We had a very nice stay. 
We use the bagages services company that the host advised us during our check in: for €5 they come to get your luggages and bring them later at the airport (because our check out was at 11am). 
I would just recommend to bring your own hairdryer (if you are coming for special occasion as us - we were in BCN for a wedding). 
I really recommend this flat
A lovely apartment in a great location. We would definitely stay there again.

très bel appartement situé à l'arrière de l'immeuble.
immeuble magnifique avec un gardien.
deux chambres sont plus sombres où il y fait plus chaud.
il manque juste un rideau opaque dans la grande chambre.
je recommande cet appartement spacieux.

The apartment is very close to Plaça de Catalunya giving very good access to all public transport. The neighborhood is very nice with cafés, restaurants and bars close-by. I stayed in the apartment for 5 days with 5 friends of mine and the apartment turned out to be very comfortable for 6 people with its 3 rooms and 2 bathrooms.
Excellent option when staying in Barcelona! I loved how close we were to a grocery store, restaurants, and major attractions. The space was comfortable for our family of 6 adults.

Everything is as described. It's central, a lot of supermarkets really close, one of them is 24/365. It's very confortable, amazing beds, amazing shower and well equiped kitchen. It's perfect for a few days to really see Barcelona.

Peaceful location steps from all the action. 

We had a wonderful time in Barcelona staying in the 3 bedroom flat we used though Tendancy. It had tons of space, good beds and was very clean. Being less than one block from Las Rambles, I was worried about noise, but once you enter the building, all the city noises go away. Check in was easy as a representative from our host met us at the door, let us in and showed us around. The location was awesome. Literally steps away were many restaurants, shops and other places to go. There is even a small food market 3 doors down on the same street. The main square was a 5 minute walk. When in Barcelona, I would definitely consider staying here again.
Fantastic location, and the apartment had everything we needed.

Great location to access all parts of the city. Just a little north of Plaza Catalunya so a nice departure from the touristy Las Ramblas area. 

Sitting area is nice and spacious. Master bedroom is quite large but very bright from the floor to ceiling windows.  The other two rooms are a bit on the small size but not too cramped to fit 2 twin beds.

Had a really great time in Barcelona! Would stay at this location again!
Great apartment in the heart of the city. Close to everything and highly recommend.
Fantastic apartment, brilliant position. Can't fault it.
Very spacious apartment in great location.  At corner is Las Ramblas.  Quiet, safe area. Coffee, bakery, market nearby. Modern, well equipped kitchen. Great for families and business travelers.
This apartment was gorgeous and in a perfect location. We had a very delightful stay and enjoyed the nearby restaurants and shopping areas. We highly recommend this listing!

Whether you’re in town for business or pleasure,we will be your best choice.

Welcome To Hong Kong
欢迎来到香港

reviews.txt: Location very good, in the shopping center, and many fast food place,  traffic is very convenien !
交通确实很方便,香港住的地方都不大,好在即便如此设施也都有｡性价比高
总体来说算是便宜的,性价比还是蛮高的,地理位置也挺方便的

Well recommended place. Very close to Mtr Jordan station and many shops nearby. Place is just like how it is in the photo. Good for solo travellers. At first i got lost finding the place but on the next days i feel like i am a local in hongkong. Thankyou until next time!
很好的一次体验,香港寸土寸金这个价位住到这样的房间很不错了,地理位置也很好非常方便,离地铁站很近,周围也有巴士站,大厦楼下有保安首先安全很到位,其次能分到有窗户的房间也很好空气流通好,就是香港的汽车喜欢改装排气管,一踩油门轰轰的很吵,不过还好,其实香港给我的感觉非常好很安静很安心,除了消费高点没什么不好的,总体来说这次体验还不错,下次再去还会住这里,也会推荐给朋友

- 非常靠近佐敦地鐵站,交通十分方便
- 附近有不少美食,也開到很晚
非常便利的地段
真是太太太好了,下次还来耶,我爱｡

The pictures are quite deceiving I would say. The room we stayed in was quite dirty and there was a roach crawling about the place. Linens were riddle with stains and towels as well. The bathroom had a peculiar odour. The size was just as expected and not a problem.  The location is great. I would recommend spending the few extra dollars and getting a place much cleaner.
觉得整体性价比还不错~就是早上起来感觉身上痒痒的,发现床上有小虫子~
大体上还是可以的,但是太过于狭小拥挤,给人感觉有一丝简陋吧｡卫生间的马桶盖一直无法完全开启
地点超级方便哟,附近也好多好吃的,好玩的｡比想象中干净｡

The address in Airbnb app was just to show where the reception counter is. I’m glad I’m staying in another building. The room was refurbished although the exterior of the building was old. Saw tiny cockroaches but I was not surprised as the building was old. Space was good for me as Asian. We could hear noises from the street and other room but we are okay as we are not light sleepers. We need to share hair dryer with other guests. Thanks to the staff who helped to empty trash bin daily and I liked the firm bed very much as I could rest really well after walking all day long.

name: Nice appartement in central
summary: 1 bedroom in a 2 bedrooms cosy apartment, all furnished. Located in central midlevels really close from the escalator, calm and clear. 2 minutes walk from the Soho area with bars and restaurants. Many supermarkets and groceries around. And also bus and taxis. MTR central station is 10 minutes walk.

host.about:
Hello,
My name is Audrey I work in fashion in Hong Kong and have been in this city for 5 years and truly loving it; i call it home 
I Love books, music, hiking, and traveling

loc.address: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Audrey est très gentille et réactive au questions durant le séjour. L'appartement est fonctionnel bien équipé et se trouve dans un quartier calme et non loin du centre! La chambre est cosie, je recommande ce logement!
Audrey's flat very nice and exactly as on the pictures. The location is great and area is full of bars and restaurants - thanks:)

The place is my standart of staying in HK, bright, comfy, clean,  perfect size rooms, picture perfect kitchen, especially sweet scented candles in every rooms which I found rarely in HK. Convenient location and Audrey is truly amazing host!

I warmly recommend Audrey's place ! The location couldn't be better : on top of Cain   Road, in a pedestrian super quiet street, it is very Central but extremely quiet around the neighborhood. 
The apartment is charming, spacious, light, very clean and well decorated. 
And Audrey s roommate is as lovely as the place! 
The price is very okay for the place !

A neat and stylish abode right within Central - a great base from which to explore HK. Take the famous Central-Midlevels Escalator on the way home and experience the hustle and bustle of Soho.  Or take the ferries from Central to other parts of HK. Plenty of artisan coffee, local cheap eats, restaurants, and bars just a few steps outside the apartment. The place was very clean, had great storage and all the amenities required for a comfortable stay. Audrey was very responsive and even suggested some amazing eats. Her roommate, Stella, was just as friendly and welcoming. I had an amazing time in HK thanks to Audrey and Stella. Will definitely revisit when I'm back in HK.

Stella is  a great roommate! I was very happy with that.
I felt very welcome and the communication was perfect. Thank you for the hospitality.

Audrey's appartment is great and very close to Soho. Getting there is kind of a workout since the build is on a hill but you can take the Mid-level escalators which makes it easier. Checking in and out was very easy. I didn't get the chance to meet Audrey in person, but communication with her was very reliable. Can definitely recommend her place!

name: Best location 1BR Apt in HK - Shops & Sights
summary: Welcome to my apartment, 1BR newly renovated and furnished. Located in the heart of Hong Kong's shopping, food and culture center.  1 minute walk to TST MTR station, airport transfer and all major transport.

host.about:
Loves to travel and see the world.  Over recent years, I've travelled to London, Amsterdam, Paris, LA, San Francisco, Taiwan, Shanghai, Beijing, Australia, India, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, and Korea.  However, there is no place like home.

That is why I want to be a great host and have you enjoy your holiday.  Welcome fellow travellers.

reviews.txt: The unit is as it appears on the description, small and cozy, located in the heart of Kowloon. I find it good for young travellers that want to discover the city (our case). Not recommended for copuples seeking a romantic trip since is quite busy and noisy. Big dissapointed was that Water heater didnt work and had to take a cold water shower. Regarding owner response, it took a while for him/her to answer but afterwards everything was fine.

It was my first Airbnb experience and we like its brand new and great location of this apartment. Jenkin is a fabulous host that has answered all needs in a quick manner. We will definitely stay again at his place in the future (Website hidden by Airbnb)
Really nice!The apartment is new and comfortable.The bed is soft.And there are a lot of restaurants and shopping malls near by.House keeper is so warm because she help us a lot.

Great little place in a very convenient part of Hong Kong.  We are a family of three who have been to Hong Kong a number of times.  Although we usually stay in a hotel on Hong Kong Island, we decided to stay in Jenkin's place due to the price, apparent cleanliness, and in order to better experience life in Kowloon.  We were definitely not disappointed.  The unit is quite small but they make efficient use of the space and the reality is that it was more spacious than any hotel room, aside from the most deluxe suites. Location wise it doesn't get any better.  Just steps from Tsim Sha Tsui (TST), and then everything that TST has to offer readily at hand.  Shopping and eating for all price ranges and tastes.  We won't hesitate to stay there again on future visits to the city.

Hey the apartment is centrally located , 2 mins walk from the TST MTR and the apartment has been beautifully decorated. Also the Host Jenkins and lilo are welcoming and very helpful , they do everything possible to make sure you are comfortable. I would highly recommend this apartment for smaller groups. 

It was a wonderful experience and I really enjoyed my stay. I am sure the hosts will make your stay comfortable and do everything possible to make sure you face no problems.

We had a great time! Hosts were very easy to get in touch with, promptly helped us out with a water issue at the building (that was not their fault), and the space was very clean and comfortable.

It's a small space, definitely best for folks like us who just need a comfortable place to sleep after a day of exploring the city. Thanks for a great experience!

Our stay was wonderful and hassle free.  The apartment is what we expected it to be, warm and homey. The location of the place is convenient as public transportation, convenient stores, local restaurants and malls are nearby.

Suggestion/Feedback 
Toilet - at the shower area, to do a sliding door instead of using curtain  as water will spill to the floor near the toilet bowl area.
No place to hang socks after washing. 
Sofa bed - material catch dust easily. To extend it to become a bed and making sure that it is fixed correctly, must be extra careful as  my son hurt his hand. 
Living room aircon - thought aircon was spoilt as we couldnt on it. We didnt know that the switch, which is hidden in the cupboard, is not switch on until when we met Helen when we are checking out.
Overall, we still can accept and hope that there will be improvement. Thanks to both Jenkin and Helen.

Wonderful location, seconds from MTR and so much to do and eat in the area. The apartment is small but comfortable. Glad there's an elevator too! The check in process was flawless. Easy to communicate with owner and check in person. Will definitely stay here again in the future.
Great location in the heart of TST.  Newly renovated unit perfect for a short trip.  Jenkins is very responsive to messages and accommodating.  Great stay.  Highly recommended.

I didn't personally meet Jenkin/Ricky. However, communication was a breeze. He connect me with Helen and she was nice! Jenkin allowed me to put my luggages first in the apartment which make things easier for me and family before actual check in. He also allowed me to keep those luggages while I kill some times before leaving. Thank you for that! Room was very nice, clean, cozy (looks exactly from the pictures). Amenities are there, TV, kitchen, iron, etc. Wifi is good! Location is perfect! Going to places were easy via MTR. The area around the apartment was always busy but very safe, I must say. Happy with the whole trip to HK. Stay with Jenkin, highly recommended! Thank you for everything, Jenkin and Ricky! And thank you to Helen too!
Fast, easy and good service :)
位置很不错,靠近地铁｡我这次是替妈妈定的apt,联系上有点困难｡这也没办法,不过当时特别挑了会中文的房东,可是妈妈说到了香港后是另外一位女士来给钥匙的....语言上交流比较困难,鸡同鸭讲｡还有被子感觉上没有更换新的....房子是新装修的!
Due to the personal reason, I cancel the booking of the second day. Thanks for the understanding and support.
A kind host greeted and directed us over the phone to make sure we were alright. Highly appreciated! The place was very clean and comfortable.

Location is almost everything in Hong Kong.  Host service is a close second. Jenkin is an accessible and attentive host, and that's something you may need in a complicated city like Hong Kong. This is an efficiently designed very small space which makes it seem larger than it is. The layout is (1) a bed-sized sleeping area with a curtain and sliding door for privacy; (2) a comfortably sized and appointed bathroom with a nicely tiled shower with plenty of hot water and strong water pressure; and (3) a living room with comfortable sofa, reliable wifi, and clothes hanging rack. There is a fridge and microwave and hotplate, with enough cookware for two people. You wash your dishes in the bathroom.  All three rooms are recently remodeled and tiled.  The bed is very comfortable. Both the bedroom and living room have air conditioners.

The little apartment is on the 6th floor of an old and dingy (but clean) Kowloon apartment building one block from the stunning fountains of Kowloon Park and the subway, and a million places right there in your face.  It is a 10 minute exciting walk (as in every single time its exciting) to the picturesque  harbor ferry to Hong Kong Island (or you can take the subway there).  Like many Asian buildings, the elevators are very slow and often crowded with friendly people, but remarkably, each floor has an elevator on either end of the hallway. You walk out of Jenkin's apartment, look left and look right to see which elevator will arrive first, a fun little game for us. 

The very safe neighborhood is extremely trendy, filled with excited locals and tourists, and many places open until late. (My favorite bar and restaurant were open until 3am, both very funky). 

I might stay in one of Jenkin's larger units next time but, you know, I'm not sure since this little place just grows on you after two days.  He is a master host, his cleaning lady is so nice and right nearby, and he takes a lot of pride in making your stay high quality.  He even guided our taxi driver to the front door by cell phone, and he is always, always accessible.  It's remarkable.
我们去玩迪士尼很晚回来害怕要找一段时间,地理交通条件好出地铁口走几步就到了,很容易就能找到｡去维多利亚港看完夜景回来到楼下有便利店茶餐厅吃点东西非常方便,房子感觉卫生,有电视和无线网络整体感觉不错!

The apartment is in a great location for exploring the Tsim Sha Sui area. The MTR station is right outside the building entrance, and the harbor area is just a few blocks away to the south and west. The living space is small but well organized, with a separate bedroom (just big enough for the bed) with its own air-con, and the bathroom is a very usable size. The main drawback to the apartment is that it is on the 6th floor of a 15 floor building and the queues can get long for the elevator. There is one elevator at each end of the long hall on the 6th floor but on the ground level they are completely separated.  A few times I waited on the ground floor in a queue for 15-20 minutes and the elevator fills up before being able to get in, so plan your trips, don't expect to go in and out a lot, and avoid mid-day and evening hours when people are coming home.  Of course this is not an issue the host can resolve, but I think any guests should anticipate.
地理位置很棒 (Hidden by Airbnb) 都比较方便

位置十分方便 近地鐵站 商場 晚上吃東西都方便
房間有點小  浴室更小  有許多雜物堆放在櫃子裡  打掃也不乾淨  沙發上有需多頭髮  垃圾桶只有一個  因為不知去哪倒  對旅行的的人來說 不夠使用   
浴室一沖水 浴簾就會亂飄 常會黏到身上  老實說以房間的價格還是打過折的  不如住飯店  既沒有價格優勢  環境也不太ok

name: Mongkok Luxury Studio, New Reno *4A
summary: Lovely walkup studio apartment on the fourth floor with kitchenette in the heart of Mongkok. Minutes away from numerous tourist attractions such as the Ladies Market and shopping malls, this is the perfect unit for any solo traveler. The unit is newly renovated as well!

host.about:
Thank you for checking out our listing! To let you know a little bit more about us, we run a service apartment company called Tane Residence. Currently, we operate more than 90 units in Hong Kong and over 20 units in Vietnam. We are rapidly expanding this network, opening between 20 to 30 new properties every year.

Our tastefully decorated apartments blends the best of worlds - homely comforts and modern design to offer a unique stay.  

We value offering our customers outstanding service, excellent experience and great value for money. With a team that works 7 days a week to answer emails and ensure the needs of our guests are taken care of, we are proud to offer top notch customer service support.

reviews.txt: The room is clean and modern looking. Great stay. The foldable bed makes more space during the day.

name: Cute Attic room Beyoğlu, Istanbul
summary: This is a room in an Ottoman liberty style townhouse in Beyoglu. The location is very central, walking distance to istiklal street, one of the main centers in Istanbul. There are many cafes, restaurants, bars, and shopping, night life.

host.about:
I am from Adana, a town in old Cilicia, have been living in Istanbul for quite a while. I have worked in tourism sector for a long time now I am retired and want to know new people. I can speak english and I can join you through your visit to show Istanbul or giving you some local information. 

I love cooking and feel myself lucky to know both eastern and wester cooking traditions of Turkey and willing to give half day cooking classes to whom it may interest.

reviews.txt: Comment raconter en quelques mots les trois semaines magnifiques passées chez Fatma ! Impossible. La pension est charmante et possède une terrasse très chaleureuse. Fatma est une personne extrèmement intéressante avec qui il faut absolument prendre un café dès quelle le propose (ce qui arrive très souvent !). Elle cuisine merveilleusement. Elle connait Istanbul comme sa poche. La chambre est au dernier étage, elle est calme et douce. Elle a un accès direct sur la terrasse ce qui permet de bouquiner avant d'aller dormir ou de faire un peu de yoga le matin. Le quartier est au coeur de Beyoglu avec une foultitude de restaurants et de bonnes adresses à découvrir. Si vous hésitez encore à réserver, n'hésitez plus ! Quant à moi, je reviendrais le plus vite possible !

Ich bin unheimlich glücklich bei Fatma Abla gestrandet zu sein. Es ist immer was los und selbst wenn mankein türkisch kann,Fatma Abla versucht mit English und Händen und Füßen zu reden. Eine unglaublich sympathische und unterhaltsame Dame, die ich sehr schnell ins Herz geschlossen habe. Sonntags sind wir zusammen zum Bio Bazar gelaufen und an einigen Tagen kochen wir sogar was zusammen.  Mein Zimmer befindet sich im obersten Stock, wo ich komplett meine Ruhe habe. gegenüber von meinem Zimmer ist eine wunderschöne Terasse, die zum Yoga machen oder ein Buch lesen einlädt. Gäste sind auch immer willkommen. Fatma hat ihre eigenen Stil, welches dem ganzen Haus, bis auf den Eingangsbereich, einen unglaublichen charm gibt. Jedes Zimmer ist individuell und man muss sagen, dass bis her die Leute, die ich im Haus kennengelernt habe, echt toll sind. Wenn man sich für Fatma entscheidet, sollte man auf alle Fälle kulturoffen sein und sich diesem schönen antiken Stil und der Nostalgie einfach fallen lassen.
